GE09ram_02su:ram_1.1a: kasyacit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.2b: tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.5b: svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.6a: sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.7a: tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.7b: bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.8a: rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.9a: sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.10a: teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.11a: gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.12b: cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.14a: evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.15a: sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.16b: na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.17b: kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.22a: arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.23d: apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.24a: anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.24b: na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.24c: evaṃ śreṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.26b: guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.28a: etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.28b: dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.29a: eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi samparivartate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.29b: kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.30b: mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.32a: mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.32b: anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.33a: taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.35c: sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ purālayair jānapadaiś ca mānavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_1.35d: upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.2b: svareṇa mahatā rājā jīmūta iva nādayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.5a: idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.8a: so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.9a: anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.10a: taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.11a: anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.11b: trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.12a: anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.12b: gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.13a: iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.14b: ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.16a: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.16b: ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.17a: kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.18a: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.18b: bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.21b: mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.22a: priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.23a: tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.24a: yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.25a: saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.27a: śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.29a: vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.29b: diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.30a: balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.30b: āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.31a: abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.31b: striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyamprātaḥ samāhitāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.33c: taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_2.33d: hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam arhasi //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.2b: yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.3a: iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.4a: caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.5a: kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.6a: tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.6b: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīyatām iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.8a: atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.8b: prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.9a: mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.9b: upāsāṃcakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.10a: teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.15b: āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.16a: sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.16b: nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.17a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.19b: svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.21a: taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.22a: sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.22b: uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.23a: jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.23b: utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.24a: tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.25a: kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.25b: guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.26a: bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.28b: tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.29a: tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.30a: sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.31b: yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.31c: te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tacchrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya /
GE09ram_02su:ram_3.31d: narendram āmantrya gṛhāṇi gatvā devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.1a: gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.1b: mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.2a: śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyas tu me sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.4a: pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.4b: rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.5b: śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.6a: praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.6b: yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.7a: tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.7b: śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.9a: taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.10a: praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.11b: pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.12a: rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.13a: jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.13b: dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.14a: anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.15b: ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.16a: adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.17a: api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.18a: avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.19b: rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.20a: tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.20b: tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.21a: adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.24a: suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.25a: viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.25b: tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.26a: kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.27a: kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.27b: satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.29b: tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.30a: tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.31a: prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.32a: tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.34b: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.35b: bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.36b: evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.37a: yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.37b: tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.39a: vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.39b: jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.40a: kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.40b: yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.41a: amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.42a: ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhrātaram abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.42b: prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.43a: lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.43b: dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.44a: saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.44b: jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.45a: ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_4.45b: abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.3a: tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.5a: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.7a: sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambhāṣyābhiprasādya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.7b: priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.8a: prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.8b: upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.9a: prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.9b: pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.10a: ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.11a: tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.12a: suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.20b: vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rājakulaṃ yayau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.22a: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.22b: papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.23a: guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_5.23d: vidīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.2a: pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.3a: śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.9a: kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.10b: prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.13a: sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.13b: dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.14b: manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.15a: rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.18b: dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.20a: sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.21b: jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.22a: sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.23b: yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.26a: te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.27a: janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.27c: tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_6.27d: samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.1a: jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.4a: avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.4c: rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ samprayacchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.5a: atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.8a: dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.9b: śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.10a: uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.11b: calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyāḥ srota ivoṣṇage // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.12a: evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.13a: kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.14a: mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.15a: sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.18a: tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.18b: tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.19b: ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.20a: dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.22a: apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.24a: yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.24b: rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.25b: rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.26a: sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.26b: trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.27a: mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.27b: evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.28a: dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.28b: kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.29a: idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.29b: etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.30a: rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.30b: tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.30c: na me paraṃ kiṃcid itas tvayā punaḥ priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ vaco varam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_7.30d: tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ vṛṇu //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.1a: mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.2a: harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.4a: prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.5a: hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.6a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.6b: rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.7a: dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.7b: rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.8a: bhrātḥn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.9a: bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.9c: sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.10b: kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.11b: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.13a: bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.14a: na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.15a: tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.16b: anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.17a: sāhaṃ tvadarthe samprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.17b: sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.18a: dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.19a: bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.19b: saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.20a: goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.20b: aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.21a: tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃcit kariṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.21b: rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.22a: tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.22b: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.23a: evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.23b: yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.24a: sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.26b: rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.26c: yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_8.26d: ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje parasya cādyaiva vivāsakāraṇam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.1a: evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.1b: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.2a: adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.3a: idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.3b: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.4a: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.5a: hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.5b: yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.6a: śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.6b: kiṃcid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.7b: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.8a: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.9a: tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.10a: diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.10b: vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.11a: sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.12a: tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.13a: tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.13b: tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.13c: sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.14a: gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.14b: anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.15b: pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.16b: mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.17a: dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.17b: tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.18a: na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.18b: tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.19a: na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.20b: dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.21a: yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.21b: tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.22a: yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.22b: vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.23a: rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.24b: bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.24c: yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.25a: tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.26a: prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.27a: anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.27b: hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.29a: tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.30b: tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.31a: uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.31b: adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.32b: jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.34a: tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.34b: matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.35a: atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.35b: abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.36b: labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.37a: mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.37b: kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.39b: pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.40a: iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.40b: śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.42a: tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.44a: tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyavaśaṃ gatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.44b: saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.45a: iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.45b: vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.46a: athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.46b: asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ tadādhiśiśye patiteva kiṃnarī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_9.46d: narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.2a: tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.3a: sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.4a: kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.6a: na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.6c: yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.7a: bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇacetasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.8a: santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.8b: sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.9a: kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.9b: kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.10a: avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.10b: daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiñcanaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.11a: ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.11b: na te kaṃcid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.12b: yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.13a: tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.14a: nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kenacin na vimānitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.14b: abhiprāyas tu me kaścit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.15a: pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.15b: atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.16a: evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.17a: avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.17b: manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.18a: bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśyoddharasva me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.18b: etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.19a: balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.19b: kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.20a: tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.21a: yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.22a: candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.22b: jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.23b: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.24b: varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.26a: varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.26b: tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.28a: nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.29b: adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.30a: tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.30b: vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.31a: aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.32a: cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.32b: kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.33b: kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.34a: sadā te jananītulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.36b: aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.37a: kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.37b: jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.38a: parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.38b: apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.39a: tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.39b: na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.40a: tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.40b: api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.40c: sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat striyā gṛhīto hṛdaye 'timātrayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_10.40d: papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas tathā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.2b: punar ākārayāmāsa tam eva varam aṅganā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.3b: mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.4a: evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.4b: pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.5a: mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave /
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.6a: yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.6b: akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.10a: atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.10b: nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.11a: evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.12b: prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.13b: kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.13d: śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.13e: tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_11.13f: samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta duḥkhitaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.2a: pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.2b: śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.3a: āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.3b: satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.4a: saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.4b: pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.5a: tathā hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.6a: saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.7a: samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.8b: nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.9b: sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.10a: vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.10b: kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.11a: yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.11b: taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.13a: kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.14a: sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.14b: niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.15a: sa nunna iva tīkṣṇeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.16a: dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.16b: jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.17a: iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.17b: svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.18a: tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.19a: sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.20a: yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.20b: tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.21a: sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.21b: sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.23a: iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.23c: tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_12.23d: dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān upasthitān dvāram upetya viṣṭhitān //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.1a: te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.2a: amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.5b: yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.6b: tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.6c: kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.10a: pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.10b: prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.11b: vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.13b: apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.14a: na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.15b: abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.16a: ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.19a: brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.20a: stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.20b: pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.21a: na caiva saṃprasupto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.21b: iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.22a: sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.23b: sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.26c: sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.26d: tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva sārathiḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_13.26f: avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.8b: upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.11a: kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.11b: mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.12a: evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.12b: tataḥ saṃmānayāmāsa sītām idam uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.13a: devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.15a: yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.16a: hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.16b: saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āsva ramasva ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.18a: sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.20b: prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.21b: niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.22b: jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.24a: sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.24b: ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.24c: eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya rājaprasādād vipulāṅgam iṣyan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.24d: ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.24e: lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ cirāya //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.24f: sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.24g: mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā yayau //
GE09ram_02su:ram_14.24i: prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ mahāpatham //
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.3b: saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.4b: yathārhaṃ cāpi sampūjya sarvān eva narān yayau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.6a: yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.6b: tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.7a: alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.7b: yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.8a: ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.9a: etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.10a: na hi tasmān manaḥ kaścic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.11a: sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.11b: caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.12b: rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.13c: tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje /
GE09ram_02su:ram_15.13d: pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.1a: sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.2a: sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.4a: tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.4b: rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.7a: acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.8a: cintayāmāsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.8b: kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.9a: anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.9b: tasya mām adya samprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.11a: kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.11b: kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.11c: vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.12a: śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.12b: saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.13a: kaccin na kiṃcid bharate kumāre priyadarśane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.13b: śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātḥṇāṃ vā mamāśubham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.14a: atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.14b: muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.15b: kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.16a: kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃcid abhimānāt pitā mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.16b: ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.17a: etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.17c: ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.18a: bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.18b: niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.19a: tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.19b: kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.21a: purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.23a: yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.23b: ātmānaṃ ca naraśreṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.24a: sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.24b: tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.25a: sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.27b: śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.28a: evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.29a: idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.30a: manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.31a: hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.31b: niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.32a: alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.32b: svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.33a: ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.34a: kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.35a: tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.38a: sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikeyī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.39a: evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.40a: tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.40b: rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.41a: vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.42a: yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.42b: pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.43a: dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.45b: śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.46a: nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.46b: viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.47a: yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃcic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.47b: prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.48a: na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃcid asti mahattaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.48b: yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.50a: na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃcid āśaṃsase guṇam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.50b: yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.51a: yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.52a: bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.52b: tathā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.53a: sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.54a: vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.55a: sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.59a: na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.60a: dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.60c: praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim āgatām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_16.60d: na caiva rāmo 'tra jagāma vikriyāṃ suhṛjjanasyātmavipattiśaṅkayā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.1a: rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.1b: jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.3a: praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.4a: praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.4b: striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.5a: vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.6a: kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.6b: prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.7b: agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.8a: praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.10a: tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.11b: prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.13b: sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.14a: devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.14b: idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.15a: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.17a: tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.20a: yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.20b: na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.21a: eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.21b: aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.22a: na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.22b: api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.23a: ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.23b: ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.24a: tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.24b: kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.25a: yo hi māṃ sevate kaścid atha vāpy anuvartate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.25b: kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.26a: daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.27a: upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.27b: duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28a: sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28c: mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28d: yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ mṛgīm iva //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28e: sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28f: anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28g: idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28h: tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam ūṣare //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28i: yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā labheta kaścid guruduḥkhakarśitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28j: gatāham adyaiva paretasaṃsadaṃ vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai //
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28k: bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_17.28l: vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.1a: tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.1b: uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.2a: na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.2b: tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.3a: viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.3b: nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.5a: na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.6a: devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.6b: avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.7a: tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.7b: putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.8a: yāvad eva na jānāti kaścid artham imaṃ naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.8b: tāvad eva mayā sārdham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.9a: mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.10b: kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.11a: bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.11b: sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.12a: tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.13b: satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.14a: dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.14b: praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.15a: harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.15b: devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.16a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.17a: bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.17b: yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.18a: na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.18b: vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.19a: dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.19b: śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.20a: śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.20b: pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.21a: yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.21b: tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.22a: tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.22b: tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.23a: yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.23b: ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.24a: tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.25a: vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.26a: nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.26b: prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.27a: ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.27b: gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.28a: asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.28b: khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.30a: na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.31a: tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.31b: pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaścin nāma hīyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.31c: tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.32a: tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.32b: abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.33a: dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.33b: dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.34a: saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.34b: na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.35a: so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.35b: pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.36b: dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.37a: tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.37c: anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.38a: śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.38b: tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.38c: yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.38d: adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.38e: prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ parākramāj jigamiṣur eva daṇḍakān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_18.38f: athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.1a: atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.2a: āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.2b: uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.4b: mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.5a: tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.6b: mātḥṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.8a: tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.8b: satyaṃ neti manastāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.9b: anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.12a: buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.12b: tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.13a: kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.13b: rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.14a: kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.14b: yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.15a: jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.15b: bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.16b: ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.17b: brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.18a: yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.18b: vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.19a: kaścid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.19b: yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃcit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.20b: yasya kiṃcit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.20c: vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.21a: tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.21c: na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_19.21d: daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.1a: iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.2a: tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.3b: babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.4a: agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.4b: tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.5a: agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.5b: asthāne sambhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.6b: kathaṃ hy etad asambhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.7b: kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.8a: pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.8b: santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.9a: yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.9b: sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.10a: yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.10b: tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.11a: viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.13a: drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.14a: adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.14b: yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.16b: na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.17a: yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.17b: araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.18a: ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.19a: madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.22b: naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.23a: pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.23b: rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.24a: maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.24b: aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.25a: na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.26b: na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.27b: pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.29b: patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.30b: kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.31a: bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.32b: rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.33b: vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.34a: anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.34c: bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.34d: yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.34e: vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_20.34f: uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.1a: taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.2b: mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.3a: yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.3b: kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.4a: ka etacchraddadhecchrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.4b: guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.5a: tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.6a: kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.7a: tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.8a: kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.8b: bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.9a: bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.9b: sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.10a: yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.10b: śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.11a: evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubhadarśanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.12a: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.12b: bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.13a: mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.13b: rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.14a: imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.15a: evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.15c: āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.16a: naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyāṃ mṛgīṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.16b: yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.16c: tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.17a: jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.17b: bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.18b: bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.19a: yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.19b: śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃcid apramattā tathā kuru // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.20b: bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.21a: śuśrūṣām eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.21b: eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.22a: pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.23a: prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.24b: gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.24c: tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_21.24d: uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.1a: sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.2a: svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.2b: svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.3a: ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.3b: dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.4a: smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.4b: skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.4c: saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.5a: nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.6a: plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.6b: sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.7a: mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.7b: mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.8b: mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā sampūjitās tv iha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.9a: āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.10a: svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.10b: sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.11b: ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.12a: iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.13b: vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.14b: amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.15b: cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.16b: avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.17b: paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.17d: abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.17e: itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.17f: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje //
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.17g: tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_22.17h: jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.1a: abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.3a: vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.3b: tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.4a: devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.6a: atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.7b: āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.8a: adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.8b: procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.11a: vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvāṃ nararṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.12a: na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.13a: na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.14b: mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.15a: na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.16a: na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.17a: abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.17b: apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.18b: sīte tatrabhavāṃs tātaḥ pravrājayati māṃ vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.21c: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.22a: pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.22b: so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.22c: bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.23a: ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.23b: tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.24a: nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.25a: ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.25b: vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.26a: yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.27a: kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.28a: mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.28b: dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ sammānam arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.29a: vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.31a: vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.31b: sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.33a: aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.33c: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:ram_23.33d: yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasyacit tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.1a: evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.1b: praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.2a: āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.2b: svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.3a: bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.3b: ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.4a: na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.4b: iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.5a: yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.6b: naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.8a: anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.8b: nāsmi samprati vaktavyā vartitavyaṃ yathā mayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.9a: sukhaṃ vane nivatsyāmi yathaiva bhavane pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.10b: saha raṃsye tvayā vīra vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.11a: tvaṃ hi kartuṃ vane śakto rāma samparipālanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.11b: anyasyāpi janasyeha kiṃ punar mama mānada // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.12b: na te duḥkhaṃ kariṣyāmi nivasantī saha tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.13a: icchāmi saritaḥ śailān palvalāni vanāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.13b: draṣṭuṃ sarvatra nirbhītā tvayā nāthena dhīmatā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.14b: iccheyaṃ sukhinī draṣṭuṃ tvayā vīreṇa saṃgatā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.15b: evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ vāhaṃ tvayā saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.16a: svarge 'pi ca vinā vāso bhavitā yadi rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.16b: tvayā mama naravyāghra nāhaṃ tam api rocaye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.16c: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ sudurgamaṃ mṛgāyutaṃ vānaravāraṇair yutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.16d: vane nivatsyāmi yathā pitur gṛhe tavaiva pādāv upagṛhya saṃmatā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.16e: ananyabhāvām anuraktacetasaṃ tvayā viyuktāṃ maraṇāya niścitām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.16f: nayasva māṃ sādhu kuruṣva yācanāṃ na te mayāto gurutā bhaviṣyati //
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.16g: tathā bruvāṇām api dharmavatsalo na ca sma sītāṃ nṛvaro ninīṣati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_24.16h: uvāca caināṃ bahu saṃnivartane vane nivāsasya ca duḥkhitāṃ prati //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.1a: sa evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.1b: nivartanārthe dharmātmā vākyam etad uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.2a: sīte mahākulīnāsi dharme ca niratā sadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.2b: ihācara svadharmaṃ tvaṃ mā yathā manasaḥ sukham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.3a: sīte yathā tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tathā kāryaṃ tvayābale /
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.3b: vane doṣā hi bahavo vadatas tān nibodha me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.4b: bahudoṣaṃ hi kāntāraṃ vanam ity abhidhīyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.5b: sadā sukhaṃ na jānāmi duḥkham eva sadā vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.6b: siṃhānāṃ ninadā duḥkhāḥ śrotuṃ duḥkham ato vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.9a: atīva vātas timiraṃ bubhukṣā cātra nityaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.9b: bhayāni ca mahānty atra tato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.10a: sarīsṛpāś ca bahavo bahurūpāś ca bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.10b: caranti pṛthivīṃ darpād ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.11b: tiṣṭhanty āvṛtya panthānam ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.12a: pataṃgā vṛścikāḥ kīṭā daṃśāś ca maśakaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.12b: bādhante nityam abale sarvaṃ duḥkham ato vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.13a: drumāḥ kaṇṭakinaś caiva kuśakāśāś ca bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.14a: tad alaṃ te vanaṃ gatvā kṣamaṃ na hi vanaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.14c: vanaṃ tu netuṃ na kṛtā matis tadā babhūva rāmeṇa yadā mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_25.14d: na tasya sītā vacanaṃ cakāra tat tato 'bravīd rāmam idaṃ suduḥkhitā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.1a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sītā rāmasya duḥkhitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.2a: ye tvayā kīrtitā doṣā vane vastavyatāṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.2b: guṇān ity eva tān viddhi tava snehapuraskṛtān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.3a: tvayā ca saha gantavyaṃ mayā gurujanājñayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.3b: tvadviyogena me rāma tyaktavyam iha jīvitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.4a: na ca māṃ tvatsamīpasthām api śaknoti rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.5a: patihīnā tu yā nārī na sā śakṣyati jīvitum /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.5b: kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ rāma tvayā mama vidarśitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.6a: atha cāpi mahāprājña brāhmaṇānāṃ mayā śrutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.6b: purā pitṛgṛhe satyaṃ vastavyaṃ kila me vane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.8a: ādeśo vanavāsasya prāptavyaḥ sa mayā kila /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.8b: sā tvayā saha tatrāhaṃ yāsyāmi priya nānyathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.9b: kālaś cāyaṃ samutpannaḥ satyavāg bhavatu dvijaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.10a: vanavāse hi jānāmi duḥkhāni bahudhā kila /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.11a: kanyayā ca pitur gehe vanavāsaḥ śruto mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.12a: prasāditaś ca vai pūrvaṃ tvaṃ vai bahuvidhaṃ prabho /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.12b: gamanaṃ vanavāsasya kāṅkṣitaṃ hi saha tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.13a: kṛtakṣaṇāhaṃ bhadraṃ te gamanaṃ prati rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.13b: vanavāsasya śūrasya caryā hi mama rocate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.14b: bhartāram anugacchantī bhartā hi mama daivatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.15a: pretyabhāve 'pi kalyāṇaḥ saṃgamo me saha tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.15b: śrutir hi śrūyate puṇyā brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśasvinām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.16a: iha loke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.16b: adbhir dattā svadharmeṇa pretyabhāve 'pi tasya sā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.17a: evam asmāt svakāṃ nārīṃ suvṛttāṃ hi pativratām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.17b: nābhirocayase netuṃ tvaṃ māṃ keneha hetunā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.18a: bhaktāṃ pativratāṃ dīnāṃ māṃ samāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.19a: yadi māṃ duḥkhitām evaṃ vanaṃ netuṃ na cecchasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.19b: viṣam agniṃ jalaṃ vāham āsthāsye mṛtyukāraṇāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.20a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ taṃ sā yācate gamanaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.20b: nānumene mahābāhus tāṃ netuṃ vijanaṃ vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.21a: evam uktā tu sā cintāṃ maithilī samupāgatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.22a: cintayantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu nivartayitum ātmavān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_26.22b: krodhāviṣṭāṃ tu vaidehīṃ kākutstho bahv asāntvayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.3a: kiṃ tvāmanyata vaidehaḥ pitā me mithilādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.4b: tejo nāsti paraṃ rāme tapatīva divākare // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.5a: kiṃ hi kṛtvā viṣaṇṇas tvaṃ kuto vā bhayam asti te /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.6b: sāvitrīm iva māṃ viddhi tvam ātmavaśavartinīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.7a: na tv ahaṃ manasāpy anyaṃ draṣṭāsmi tvadṛte 'nagha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.8a: svayaṃ tu bhāryāṃ kaumārīṃ ciram adhyuṣitāṃ satīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.8b: śailūṣa iva māṃ rāma parebhyo dātum icchasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.9a: sa mām anādāya vanaṃ na tvaṃ prasthātum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.9b: tapo vā yadi vāraṇyaṃ svargo vā syāt saha tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.10a: na ca me bhavitā tatra kaścit pathi pariśramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.12b: rajo ramaṇa tan manye parārdhyam iva candanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.14a: pattraṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ yat tvam alpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.15a: na mātur na pitus tatra smariṣyāmi na veśmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.15b: ārtavāny upabhuñjānā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.16a: na ca tatra gataḥ kiṃcid draṣṭum arhasi vipriyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.16b: matkṛte na ca te śoko na bhaviṣyāmi durbharā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.17a: yas tvayā saha sa svargo nirayo yas tvayā vinā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.17b: iti jānan parāṃ prītiṃ gaccha rāma mayā saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.18a: atha mām evam avyagrāṃ vanaṃ naiva nayiṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.18b: viṣam adyaiva pāsyāmi mā viśaṃ dviṣatāṃ vaśam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.19a: paścād api hi duḥkhena mama naivāsti jīvitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.19b: ujjhitāyās tvayā nātha tadaiva maraṇaṃ varam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.20a: idaṃ hi sahituṃ śokaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.20b: kiṃ punar daśavarṣāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca duḥkhitā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.21a: iti sā śokasaṃtaptā vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.21b: cukrośa patim āyastā bhṛśam āliṅgya sasvaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.22a: sā viddhā bahubhir vākyair digdhair iva gajāṅganā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.24a: tāṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ visaṃjñām iva duḥkhitām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.25a: na devi tava duḥkhena svargam apy abhirocaye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.25b: na hi me 'sti bhayaṃ kiṃcit svayambhor iva sarvataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.26b: vāsaṃ na rocaye 'raṇye śaktimān api rakṣaṇe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.27a: yat sṛṣṭāsi mayā sārdhaṃ vanavāsāya maithili /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.27b: na vihātuṃ mayā śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.28a: dharmas tu gajanāsoru sadbhir ācaritaḥ purā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.28b: taṃ cāham anuvarte 'dya yathā sūryaṃ suvarcalā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.29a: eṣa dharmas tu suśroṇi pitur mātuś ca vaśyatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.29b: ataś cājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.29c: sa māṃ pitā yathā śāsti satyadharmapathe sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.30a: tathā vartitum icchāmi sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.31a: brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ratnāni bhikṣukebhyaś ca bhojanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.32a: anukūlaṃ tu sā bhartur jñātvā gamanam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.32c: tataḥ prahṛṣṭā paripūrṇamānasā yaśasvinī bhartur avekṣya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_27.32d: dhanāni ratnāni ca dātum aṅganā pracakrame dharmabhṛtāṃ manasvinī //
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.2a: mayādya saha saumitre tvayi gacchati tad vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.2b: ko bhariṣyati kausalyāṃ sumitrāṃ vā yaśasvinīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.3a: abhivarṣati kāmair yaḥ parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm iva /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.4a: sā hi rājyam idaṃ prāpya nṛpasyāśvapateḥ sutā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.5a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.6b: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca prayato nātra saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.7a: kausalyā bibhṛyād āryā sahasram api madvidhān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.9a: āhariṣyāmi te nityaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.10a: bhavāṃs tu saha vaidehyā girisānuṣu raṃsyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.10b: ahaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi jāgrataḥ svapataś ca te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.11a: rāmas tv anena vākyena suprītaḥ pratyuvāca tam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.12a: ye ca rājño dadau divye mahātmā varuṇaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.14b: sa tvam āyudham ādāya kṣipram āvraja lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.17a: tam uvācātmavān rāmaḥ prītyā lakṣmaṇam āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.17b: kāle tvam āgataḥ saumya kāṅkṣite mama lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.18a: ahaṃ pradātum icchāmi yad idaṃ māmakaṃ dhanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.19b: teṣām api ca me bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ copajīvinām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.19c: vasiṣṭhaputraṃ tu suyajñam āryaṃ tvam ānayāśu pravaraṃ dvijānām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_28.19d: abhiprayāsyāmi vanaṃ samastān abhyarcya śiṣṭān aparān dvijātīn //
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.1a: tataḥ śāsanam ājñāya bhrātuḥ śubhataraṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.3a: tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyāśu gatvā saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.3b: juṣṭaṃ tat prāviśal lakṣmyā ramyaṃ rāmaniveśanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.4a: tam āgataṃ vedavidaṃ prāñjaliḥ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.6a: anyaiś ca ratnair bahubhiḥ kākutsthaḥ pratyapūjayat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.7a: hāraṃ ca hemasūtraṃ ca bhāryāyai saumya hāraya /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.7b: raśanāṃ cādhunā sītā dātum icchati te sakhe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.9a: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma mātulo yaṃ dadau mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.10a: ity uktaḥ sa hi rāmeṇa suyajñaḥ pratigṛhya tat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.11a: atha bhrātaram avyagraṃ priyaṃ rāmaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.12a: agastyaṃ kauśikaṃ caiva tāv ubhau brāhmaṇottamau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.13a: kausalyāṃ ca ya āśīrbhir bhaktaḥ paryupatiṣṭhati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.14a: tasya yānaṃ ca dāsīś ca saumitre saṃpradāpaya /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.14b: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi yāvat tuṣyati sa dvijaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.15b: toṣayainaṃ mahārhaiś ca ratnair vastrair dhanais tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.16a: śālivāhasahasraṃ ca dve śate bhadrakāṃs tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.17a: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.19a: lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.19c: ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.21a: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.22a: tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.22b: ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaścid avārayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.22c: sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.23b: uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.24a: gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.25a: sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.26a: uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.26b: manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_29.26c: tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya moditaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.1a: dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.1b: jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.4a: na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.4b: āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.5a: padātiṃ varjitacchattraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.6a: yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.6b: tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.7a: aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.8a: yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.8b: tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.9b: varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.10a: adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.10b: na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.11b: kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.12a: ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.14a: pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.15a: te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.16a: udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.19a: vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.19b: asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.21b: śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.21d: jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.21e: tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.21f: vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham //
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.21g: pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_30.21h: sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.1b: praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.3a: ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.4a: sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.4b: sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.5b: vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.6b: ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.7a: sumantrānaya me dārān ye kecid iha māmakāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.7b: dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.8a: so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.8b: āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.9a: evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.9b: pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.11b: uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.12a: sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.13a: sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.14b: tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.15a: taṃ rāmo 'bhyapatat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.15b: visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.17a: taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.19a: āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.19b: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.20a: lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.20b: kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.21a: anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.21b: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.23b: ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.24a: evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.25b: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.26c: adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.27a: mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.28a: atha rāmas tathā śrutvā pitur ārtasya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.28b: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dīno vacanam abravīt // //
