GE09ram_02su:ram_31.29a: prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.31a: apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.31b: na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32a: naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32b: tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32c: puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya dīyatām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32d: ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32e: mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32f: śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32g: na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32h: yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte 'nagha //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32i: tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32j: na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32k: phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_31.32l: vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu nirvṛtiḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.4a: ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.4b: teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.5a: nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.5b: nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.6a: dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaścid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.6b: tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.7b: ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.8b: sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.9a: evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.9b: mukhaṃ cāpy agamacchoṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.9c: sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.10a: rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.11b: vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.11c: kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.12a: tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.12b: asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.13a: evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.13b: vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.14a: tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.14b: śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.15a: asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.15b: sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.16a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgarāḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.17a: tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.17b: tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.18a: krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.18b: sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.19a: sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.20a: ity evam atyajad rājā sagaro vai sudhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.20b: rāmaḥ kim akarot pāpaṃ yenaivam uparudhyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.21c: anuvrajiṣyāmy aham adya rāmaṃ rājyaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ dhanaṃ ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_32.21d: sahaiva rājñā bharatena ca tvaṃ yathā sukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva cirāya rājyam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.2a: tyaktabhogasya me rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.3a: yo hi dattvā dvipaśreṣṭhaṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kurute manaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.4a: tathā mama satāṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ dhvajinyā jagatpate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.5b: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi vasato mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.6a: atha cīrāṇi kaikeyī svayam āhṛtya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.7a: sa cīre puruṣavyāghraḥ kaikeyyāḥ pratigṛhya te /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.8a: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tatraiva vihāya vasane śubhe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.8b: tāpasāc chādane caiva jagrāha pitur agrataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.9b: samīkṣya cīraṃ saṃtrastā pṛṣatī vāgurām iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.10b: kathaṃ nu cīraṃ badhnanti munayo vanavāsinaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.11a: kṛtvā kaṇṭhe ca sā cīram ekam ādāya pāṇinā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.11b: tasthau hy akuśalā tatra vrīḍitā janakātmajā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.12a: tasyās tat kṣipram āgamya rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.13b: pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.14a: sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.14b: kaikeyi kuśacīreṇa na sītā gantum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.15a: nanu paryāptam etat te pāpe rāmavivāsanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.15b: kim ebhiḥ kṛpaṇair bhūyaḥ pātakair api te kṛtaiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.16a: evaṃ bruvantaṃ pitaraṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.17a: iyaṃ dhārmika kausalyā mama mātā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.17b: vṛddhā cākṣudraśīlā ca na ca tvāṃ devagarhite // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.18c: imāṃ mahendropamajātagarbhiṇīṃ tathā vidhātuṃ jananīṃ mamārhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_33.18d: yathā vanasthe mayi śokakarśitā na jīvitaṃ nyasya yamakṣayaṃ vrajet //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.1a: rāmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā muniveṣadharaṃ ca tam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.3a: sa muhūrtam ivāsaṃjño duḥkhitaś ca mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.4a: manye khalu mayā pūrvaṃ vivatsā bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.4b: prāṇino hiṃsitā vāpi tasmād idam upasthitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.5a: na tv evānāgate kāle dehāc cyavati jīvitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.5b: kaikeyyā kliśyamānasya mṛtyur mama na vidyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.7a: ekasyāḥ khalu kaikeyyāḥ kṛte 'yaṃ kliśyate janaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.7b: svārthe prayatamānāyāḥ saṃśritya nikṛtiṃ tv imām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.8a: evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ bāṣpeṇa pihitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.8b: rāmeti sakṛd evoktvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.9a: saṃjñāṃ tu pratilabhyaiva muhūrtāt sa mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.10a: aupavāhyaṃ rathaṃ yuktvā tvam āyāhi hayottamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.11a: evaṃ manye guṇavatāṃ guṇānāṃ phalam ucyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.11b: pitrā mātrā ca yat sādhur vīro nirvāsyate vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.15a: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.15b: varṣāṇy etāni saṃkhyāya vaidehyāḥ kṣipram ānaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.16a: narendreṇaivam uktas tu gatvā kośagṛhaṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.16b: prāyacchat sarvam āhṛtya sītāyai kṣipram eva tat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.17a: sā sujātā sujātāni vaidehī prasthitā vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.19a: tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pariṣvajya śvaśrūr vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.21a: sa tvayā nāvamantavyaḥ putraḥ pravrājito mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.21b: tava daivatam astv eṣa nirdhanaḥ sadhano 'pi vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.23a: kariṣye sarvam evāham āryā yad anuśāsti mām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.23b: abhijñāsmi yathā bhartur vartitavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.24b: dharmād vicalituṃ nāham alaṃ candrād iva prabhā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.25a: nātantrī vādyate vīṇā nācakro vartate rathaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.25b: nāpatiḥ sukham edhate yā syād api śatātmajā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.26a: mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.26b: amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.27b: ārye kim avamanyeyaṃ strīṇāṃ bhartā hi daivatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.30a: amba mā duḥkhitā bhūs tvaṃ paśya tvaṃ pitaraṃ mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.30b: kṣayo hi vanavāsasya kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.31a: suptāyās te gamiṣyanti navavarṣāṇi pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.31b: sā samagram iha prāptaṃ māṃ drakṣyasi suhṛdvṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.32a: etāvad abhinītārtham uktvā sa jananīṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.33a: tāś cāpi sa tathaivārtā mātḥn daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.34a: saṃvāsāt paruṣaṃ kiṃcid ajñānād vāpi yat kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.34b: tan me samanujānīta sarvāś cāmantrayāmi vaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_34.35a: jajñe 'tha tāsāṃ saṃnādaḥ krauñcīnām iva niḥsvanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.1a: atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.2a: taṃ cāpi samanujñāpya dharmajñaḥ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.3b: atha mātuḥ sumitrāyā jagrāha caraṇau punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.4a: taṃ vandamānaṃ rudatī mātā saumitrim abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.5b: rāme pramādaṃ mā kārṣīḥ putra bhrātari gacchati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.6a: vyasanī vā samṛddho vā gatir eṣa tavānagha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.6b: eṣa loke satāṃ dharmo yaj jyeṣṭhavaśago bhavet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.7a: idaṃ hi vṛttam ucitaṃ kulasyāsya sanātanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.7b: dānaṃ dīkṣā ca yajñeṣu tanutyāgo mṛdheṣu ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.8a: rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.8b: ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi gaccha tāta yathāsukham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.9a: tataḥ sumantraḥ kākutsthaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.9b: vinīto vinayajñaś ca mātalir vāsavaṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.10a: ratham āroha bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.10b: kṣipraṃ tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi yatra māṃ rāma vakṣyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.11a: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyāni vane tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.12a: taṃ rathaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ sītā hṛṣṭena cetasā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.15b: babhūva nagare mūrchā balamūrchā janasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.19a: saṃyaccha vājināṃ raśmīn sūta yāhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.19b: mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi rāmasya durdarśaṃ no bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.20b: yad devagarbhapratime vanaṃ yāti na bhidyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.21b: na jahāti ratā dharme merum arkaprabhā yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.22c: mahaty eṣā hi te siddhir eṣa cābhyudayo mahān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.23a: eṣa svargasya mārgaś ca yad enam anugacchasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.23b: evaṃ vadantas te soḍhuṃ na śekur bāṣpam āgatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.24a: atha rājā vṛtaḥ strībhir dīnābhir dīnacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.24b: nirjagāma priyaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīti bruvan gṛhāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.25b: yathā nādaḥ kareṇūnāṃ baddhe mahati kuñjare // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.26a: pitā ca rājā kākutsthaḥ śrīmān sannas tadā babhau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.28a: hā rāmeti janāḥ kecid rāmamāteti cāpare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.31a: na hi tat puruṣavyāghro duḥkhadaṃ darśanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.31b: mātuś ca sahituṃ śaktas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.31c: tathā rudantīṃ kausalyāṃ rathaṃ tam anudhāvatīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.32a: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.32b: asakṛt praikṣata tadā nṛtyantīm iva mātaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.33a: tiṣṭheti rājā cukrośa yāhi yāhīti rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.34b: ciraṃ duḥkhasya pāpiṣṭham iti rāmas tam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.35a: rāmasya sa vacaḥ kurvann anujñāpya ca taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.36a: nyavartata jano rājño rāmaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.36b: manasāpy aśruvegaiś ca na nyavartata mānuṣam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.37a: yam icchet punar āyāntaṃ nainaṃ dūram anuvrajet /
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.37b: ity amātyā mahārājam ūcur daśarathaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_35.37d: niśamya rājā kṛpaṇaḥ sabhāryo vyavasthitas taṃ sutam īkṣamāṇaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.1b: ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.2b: yo gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ cāsīt sa nāthaḥ kva nu gacchati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.3b: kruddhān prasādayan sarvān samaduḥkhaḥ kva gacchati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.4b: tathā yo vartate 'smāsu mahātmā kva nu gacchati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.5b: paritrātā janasyāsya jagataḥ kva nu gacchati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.7a: iti sarvā mahiṣyas tā vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.7b: ruruduś caiva duḥkhārtāḥ sasvaraṃ ca vicukruśuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.8a: sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.9b: vyasṛjan kavalān nāgā gāvo vatsān na pāyayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.10b: dāruṇāḥ somam abhyetya grahāḥ sarve vyavasthitāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.11b: viśākhāś ca sadhūmāś ca nabhasi pracakāśire // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.12a: akasmān nāgaraḥ sarvo jano dainyam upāgamat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.12b: āhāre vā vihāre vā na kaścid akaron manaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.13b: na hṛṣṭo lakṣyate kaścit sarvaḥ śokaparāyaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.14a: na vāti pavanaḥ śīto na śaśī saumyadarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.14b: na sūryas tapate lokaṃ sarvaṃ paryākulaṃ jagat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.15a: anarthinaḥ sutāḥ strīṇāṃ bhartāro bhrātaras tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.16a: ye tu rāmasya suhṛdaḥ sarve te mūḍhacetasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.16b: śokabhāreṇa cākrāntāḥ śayanaṃ na jahus tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.16c: tatas tv ayodhyā rahitā mahātmanā puraṃdareṇeva mahī saparvatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_36.16d: cacāla ghoraṃ bhayabhārapīḍitā sanāgayodhāśvagaṇā nanāda ca //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.1a: yāvat tu niryatas tasya rajorūpam adṛśyata /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.2a: yāvad rājā priyaṃ putraṃ paśyaty atyantadhārmikam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.3a: na paśyati rajo 'py asya yadā rāmasya bhūmipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.3b: tadārtaś ca viṣaṇṇaś ca papāta dharaṇītale // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.4a: tasya dakṣiṇam anvagāt kausalyā bāhum aṅganā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.5a: tāṃ nayena ca sampanno dharmeṇa vinayena ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.6a: kaikeyi mā mamāṅgāni sprākṣīs tvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.6b: na hi tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi na bhāryā na ca bāndhavī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.7a: ye ca tvām upajīvanti nāhaṃ teṣāṃ na te mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.7b: kevalārthaparāṃ hi tvāṃ tyaktadharmāṃ tyajāmy aham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.8a: agṛhṇāṃ yac ca te pāṇim agniṃ paryaṇayaṃ ca yat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.8b: anujānāmi tat sarvam asmiṃl loke paratra ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.9a: bharataś cet pratītaḥ syād rājyaṃ prāpyedam avyayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.9b: yan me sa dadyāt pitrarthaṃ mā mā tad dattam āgamat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.11a: hatveva brāhmaṇaṃ kāmāt spṛṣṭvāgnim iva pāṇinā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.13a: vilalāpa ca duḥkhārtaḥ priyaṃ putram anusmaran /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.14a: vāhanānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vahatāṃ taṃ mamātmajam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.14b: padāni pathi dṛśyante sa mahātmā na dṛśyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.15a: sa nūnaṃ kvacid evādya vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.15b: kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vāśmānam upadhāya śayiṣyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.18a: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi vidhavā rājyam āvasa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.18b: na hi taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vinā jīvitum utsahe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.21a: tām avekṣya purīṃ sarvāṃ rāmam evānucintayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.21b: vilapan prāviśad rājā gṛhaṃ sūrya ivāmbudam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.22b: rāmeṇa rahitaṃ veśma vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.23a: kausalyāyā gṛhaṃ śīghraṃ rāmamātur nayantu mām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.25a: tac ca dṛṣṭvā mahārājo bhujam udyamya vīryavān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.25b: uccaiḥ svareṇa cukrośa hā rāghava jahāsi mām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.26a: sukhitā bata taṃ kālaṃ jīviṣyanti narottamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.26b: pariṣvajanto ye rāmaṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.27a: na tvāṃ paśyāmi kausalye sādhu māṃ pāṇinā spṛśa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.27b: rāmaṃ me 'nugatā dṛṣṭir adyāpi na nivartate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_37.28a: taṃ rāmam evānuvicintayantaṃ samīkṣya devī śayane narendram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.1a: tataḥ samīkṣya śayane sannaṃ śokena pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.3b: trāsayiṣyati māṃ bhūyo duṣṭāhir iva veśmani // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.4a: atha sma nagare rāmaś caran bhaikṣaṃ gṛhe vaset /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.4b: kāmakāro varaṃ dātum api dāsaṃ mamātmajam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.5a: pātayitvā tu kaikeyyā rāmaṃ sthānād yatheṣṭataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.7b: tyaktānāṃ vanavāsāya kā nv avasthā bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.9a: apīdānīṃ sa kālaḥ syān mama śokakṣayaḥ śivaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.9b: sabhāryaṃ yat saha bhrātrā paśyeyam iha rāghavam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.11b: nandiṣyati purī hṛṣṭā samudra iva parvaṇi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.12b: puraskṛtya rathe sītāṃ vṛṣabho govadhūm iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.14a: kadā sumanasaḥ kanyā dvijātīnāṃ phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.15b: abhyupaiṣyati dharmajñas trivarṣa iva māṃ lalan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.16a: niḥsaṃśayaṃ mayā manye purā vīra kadaryayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.16b: pātu kāmeṣu vatseṣu mātḥṇāṃ śātitāḥ stanāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.17a: sāhaṃ gaur iva siṃhena vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.18a: na hi tāvad guṇair juṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.18b: ekaputrā vinā putram ahaṃ jīvitum utsahe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.19a: na hi me jīvite kiṃcit sāmarthyam iha kalpyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.19c: ayaṃ hi māṃ dīpayate samutthitas tanūjaśokaprabhavo hutāśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_38.19d: mahīm imāṃ raśmibhir uttamaprabho yathā nidāghe bhagavān divākaraḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.1a: vilapantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu kausalyāṃ pramadottamām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.1b: idaṃ dharme sthitā dharmyaṃ sumitrā vākyam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.2a: tavārye sadguṇair yuktaḥ putraḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.2b: kiṃ te vilapitenaivaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ruditena vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.3a: yas tavārye gataḥ putras tyaktvā rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.4a: śiṣṭair ācarite samyak śaśvat pretya phalodaye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.4b: rāmo dharme sthitaḥ śreṣṭho na sa śocyaḥ kadācana // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.6a: araṇyavāse yad duḥkhaṃ jānatī vai sukhocitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.7a: kīrtibhūtāṃ patākāṃ yo loke bhrāmayati prabhuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.8a: vyaktaṃ rāmasya vijñāya śaucaṃ māhātmyam uttamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.8b: na gātram aṃśubhiḥ sūryaḥ saṃtāpayitum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.11a: dadau cāstrāṇi divyāni yasmai brahmā mahaujase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.12a: pṛthivyā saha vaidehyā śriyā ca puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.13a: duḥkhajaṃ visṛjanty asraṃ niṣkrāmantam udīkṣya yam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.15a: putras te varadaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.16a: niśamya tal lakṣmaṇamātṛvākyaṃ rāmasya mātur naradevapatnyāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_39.16b: sadyaḥ śarīre vinanāśa śokaḥ śaradgato megha ivālpatoyaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.2a: nivartite 'pi ca balāt suhṛdvarge ca rājani /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.4a: sa yācyamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ svābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.5b: uvāca rāmaḥ snehena tāḥ prajāḥ svāḥ prajā iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.6a: yā prītir bahumānaś ca mayy ayodhyānivāsinām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.7b: kariṣyati yathāvad vaḥ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.8b: anurūpaḥ sa vo bhartā bhaviṣyati bhayāpahaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.9a: sa hi rājaguṇair yukto yuvarājaḥ samīkṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.9b: api cāpi mayā śiṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ vo bhartṛśāsanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.10a: na ca tapyed yathā cāsau vanavāsaṃ gate mayi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.11b: tathā tathā prakṛtayo rāmaṃ patim akāmayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.12a: bāṣpeṇa pihitaṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.12b: cakarṣeva guṇair baddhvā janaṃ punar ivāsanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.13a: te dvijās trividhaṃ vṛddhā jñānena vayasaujasā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.13c: vahanto javanā rāmaṃ bho bho jātyās turaṃgamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.14a: nivartadhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ hitā bhavata bhartari /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.14b: upavāhyas tu vo bhartā nāpavāhyaḥ purād vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.15a: evam ārtapralāpāṃs tān vṛddhān pralapato dvijān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.15b: avekṣya sahasā rāmo rathād avatatāra ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.17a: dvijātīṃs tu padātīṃs tān rāmaś cāritravatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.17b: na śaśāka ghṛṇācakṣuḥ parimoktuṃ rathena saḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.18a: gacchantam eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ saṃbhrāntamānasāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.18b: ūcuḥ paramasaṃtaptā rāmaṃ vākyam idaṃ dvijāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.19a: brāhmaṇyaṃ kṛtsnam etat tvāṃ brahmaṇyam anugacchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.21b: ebhiś chāyāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svaiś chattrair vājapeyikaiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.22a: yā hi naḥ satataṃ buddhir vedamantrānusāriṇī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.23a: hṛdayeṣv avatiṣṭhante vedā ye naḥ paraṃ dhanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.23b: vatsyanty api gṛheṣv eva dārāś cāritrarakṣitāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.24a: na punar niścayaḥ kāryas tvadgatau sukṛtā matiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.24b: tvayi dharmavyapekṣe tu kiṃ syād dharmam avekṣitum // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.26a: bahūnāṃ vitatā yajñā dvijānāṃ ya ihāgatāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.26b: teṣāṃ samāptir āyattā tava vatsa nivartane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_40.27b: yācamāneṣu teṣu tvaṃ bhaktiṃ bhakteṣu darśaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.1a: tatas tu tamasā tīraṃ ramyam āśritya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.1b: sītām udvīkṣya saumitrim idaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.2a: iyam adya niśā pūrvā saumitre prasthitā vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.2b: vanavāsasya bhadraṃ te sa notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.4a: adyāyodhyā tu nagarī rājadhānī pitur mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.4b: sastrīpuṃsā gatān asmāñ śociṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.5a: bharataḥ khalu dharmātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.7a: tvayā kāryaṃ naravyāghra mām anuvrajatā kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.8a: adbhir eva tu saumitre vatsyāmy adya niśām imām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.8b: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ vanye 'pi vividhe sati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.9a: evam uktvā tu saumitraṃ sumantram api rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.9b: apramattas tvam aśveṣu bhava saumyety uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.11a: upāsyatu śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrim upasthitām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.11b: rāmasya śayanaṃ cakre sūtaḥ saumitriṇā saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.12a: tāṃ śayyāṃ tamasātīre vīkṣya vṛkṣadalaiḥ kṛtām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.12b: rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃviveśa ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.13a: sabhāryaṃ saṃprasuptaṃ taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.14a: jāgrato hy eva tāṃ rātriṃ saumitrer udito raviḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.15b: avasat tatra tāṃ rātriṃ rāmaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.16a: utthāya tu mahātejāḥ prakṛtīs tā niśāmya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.18b: api prāṇān asiṣyanti na tu tyakṣyanti niścayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.19a: yāvad eva tu saṃsuptās tāvad eva vayaṃ laghu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.21a: paurā hy ātmakṛtād duḥkhād vipramocyā nṛpātmajaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.21b: na tu khalv ātmanā yojyā duḥkhena puravāsinaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.22a: abravīl lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ sākṣād dharmam iva sthitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.22b: rocate me mahāprājña kṣipram āruhyatām iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.23a: sūtas tataḥ saṃtvaritaḥ syandanaṃ tair hayottamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.24a: mohanārthaṃ tu paurāṇāṃ sūtaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.24b: udaṅmukhaḥ prayāhi tvaṃ ratham āsthāya sārathe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.25a: muhūrtaṃ tvaritaṃ gatvā nirvartaya rathaṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.25b: yathā na vidyuḥ paurā māṃ tathā kuru samāhitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.26a: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre sa sārathiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.28a: sa saṃtīrya mahābāhuḥ śrīmāñ śivam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.29a: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurās te rāghavaṃ vinā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.30b: ālokam api rāmasya na paśyanti sma duḥkhitāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.31a: tato mārgānusāreṇa gatvā kiṃcit kṣaṇaṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_41.32b: kim idaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daivenopahatā iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.2a: svaṃ svaṃ nilayam āgamya putradāraiḥ samāvṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.3a: na cāhṛṣyan na cāmodan vaṇijo na prasārayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.4a: naṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhyanandan vipulaṃ vā dhanāgamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.5a: gṛhe gṛhe rudantyaś ca bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.5b: vyagarhayanta duḥkhārtā vāgbhis totrair iva dvipān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.6a: kiṃ nu teṣāṃ gṛhaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ dāraiḥ kiṃ dhanena vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.6b: putrair vā kiṃ sukhair vāpi ye na paśyanti rāghavam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.7a: ekaḥ satpuruṣo loke lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.8a: āpagāḥ kṛtapuṇyās tāḥ padminyaś ca sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.8b: yeṣu snāsyati kākutstho vigāhya salilaṃ śuci // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.9b: āpagāś ca mahānūpāḥ sānumantaś ca parvatāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.10a: kānanaṃ vāpi śailaṃ vā yaṃ rāmo 'bhigamiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.10b: priyātithim iva prāptaṃ nainaṃ śakṣyanty anarcitum // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.11a: akāle cāpi mukhyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.12a: vidarśayanto vividhān bhūyaś citrāṃś ca nirjharān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.13a: yatra rāmo bhayaṃ nātra nāsti tatra parābhavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.13b: sa hi śūro mahābāhuḥ putro daśarathasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.13c: purā bhavati no dūrād anugacchāma rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.14b: sa hi nātho janasyāsya sa gatiḥ sa parāyaṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.15a: vayaṃ paricariṣyāmaḥ sītāṃ yūyaṃ tu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.15b: iti paurastriyo bhartḥn duḥkhārtās tat tad abruvan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.18a: kaikeyyā yadi ced rājyaṃ syād adharmyam anāthavat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.18b: na hi no jīvitenārthaḥ kutaḥ putraiḥ kuto dhanaiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.19a: yayā putraś ca bhartā ca tyaktāv aiśvaryakāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.19b: kaṃ sā parihared anyaṃ kaikeyī kulapāṃsanī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.20a: kaikeyyā na vayaṃ rājye bhṛtakā nivasema hi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.20b: jīvantyā jātu jīvantyaḥ putrair api śapāmahe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.21b: kas tāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ jīved adharmyāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.22a: na hi pravrajite rāme jīviṣyati mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.24b: bharate saṃnisṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ saunike paśavo yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.25a: tās tathā vilapantyas tu nagare nāgarastriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.25c: tathā striyo rāmanimittam āturā yathā sute bhrātari vā vivāsite /
GE09ram_02su:ram_42.25d: vilapya dīnā rurudur vicetasaḥ sutair hi tāsām adhiko hi so 'bhavat //
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.2a: tathaiva gacchatas tasya vyapāyād rajanī śivā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.2b: upāsya sa śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ viṣayāntaṃ vyagāhata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.3a: grāmān vikṛṣṭasīmāṃs tān puṣpitāni vanāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.3b: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ śarair iva hayottamaiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.4b: rājānaṃ dhig daśarathaṃ kāmasya vaśam āgatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.6a: yā putram īdṛśaṃ rājñaḥ pravāsayati dhārmikam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.9a: gatvā tu suciraṃ kālaṃ tataḥ śītajalāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.10a: gomatīṃ cāpy atikramya rāghavaḥ śīghragair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.11a: sa mahīṃ manunā rājñā dattām ikṣvākave purā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.12a: sūta ity eva cābhāṣya sārathiṃ tam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.13a: kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.13b: mṛgayāṃ paryaṭiṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.15a: sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_43.15b: taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayau vākyam udīrayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.3b: śiśumāraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.6a: lakṣaṇaś ca sumantraś ca bāḍham ity eva rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.9a: tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.10a: sa śrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ rāmaṃ viṣayam āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.11b: saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ samāgacchad guhena saḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.12a: tam ārtaḥ sampariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.12b: yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.13b: arghyaṃ copānayat kṣipraṃ vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.14a: svāgataṃ te mahābāho taveyam akhilā mahī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.14b: vayaṃ preṣyā bhavān bhartā sādhu rājyaṃ praśādhi naḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.15a: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca lehyaṃ cedam upasthitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.15b: śayanāni ca mukhyāni vājināṃ khādanaṃ ca te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.16a: guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.16b: arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.18a: diṣṭyā tvāṃ guha paśyāmi arogaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.18b: api te kuśalaṃ rāṣṭre mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.19a: yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃcit prītyā samupakalpitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.19b: sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.22a: ete hi dayitā rājñaḥ pitur daśarathasya me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.22b: etaiḥ suvihitair aśvair bhaviṣyāmy aham arcitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.23a: aśvānāṃ pratipānaṃ ca khādanaṃ caiva so 'nvaśāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.23b: guhas tatraiva puruṣāṃs tvaritaṃ dīyatām iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.25a: tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.26c: tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_44.26d: adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.1a: taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.2a: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.3a: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.4a: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.4b: bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.5a: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.5b: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.6a: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.7a: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.7b: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ sumahat prasahemahi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.8b: nātra bhītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.9a: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.9b: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.10a: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.10b: taṃ paśya sukhasaṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.11a: yo mantratapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.12a: asmin pravrajito rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.12b: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.14a: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.14b: nāśaṃse yadi jīvanti sarve te śarvarīm imām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.15a: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.15b: tad duḥkhaṃ yat tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.17b: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.18a: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.23c: tathā hi satyaṃ bruvati prajāhite narendraputre gurusauhṛdād guhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_45.23d: mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyasanābhipīḍito jvarāturo nāga iva vyathāturaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.2b: asau sukṛṣṇo vihagaḥ kokilas tāta kūjati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.3a: barhiṇānāṃ ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate nadatāṃ vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.4b: guham āmantrya sūtaṃ ca so 'tiṣṭhad bhrātur agrataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.5a: tataḥ kalāpān saṃnahya khaḍgau baddhvā ca dhanvinau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.5b: jagmatur yena tau gaṅgāṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.6a: rāmam eva tu dharmajñam upagamya vinītavat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.6b: kim ahaṃ karavāṇīti sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.7b: yānaṃ vihāya padbhyāṃ tu gamiṣyāmo mahāvanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.8a: ātmānaṃ tv abhyanujñātam avekṣyārtaḥ sa sārathiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.10a: na manye brahmacarye 'sti svadhīte vā phalodayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.10b: mārdavārjavayor vāpi tvāṃ ced vyasanam āgatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.11a: saha rāghava vaidehyā bhrātrā caiva vane vasan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.11b: tvaṃ gatiṃ prāpsyase vīra trīṃl lokāṃs tu jayann iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.12a: vayaṃ khalu hatā rāma ye tayāpy upavañcitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.13a: iti bruvann ātmasamaṃ sumantraḥ sārathis tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.13b: dṛṣṭvā dūragataṃ rāmaṃ duḥkhārto rurude ciram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.14a: tatas tu vigate bāṣpe sūtaṃ spṛṣṭodakaṃ śucim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.14b: rāmas tu madhuraṃ vākyaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca tam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.15b: yathā daśaratho rājā māṃ na śocet tathā kuru // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.16b: kāmabhārāvasannaś ca tasmād etad bravīmi te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.17a: yad yad ājñāpayet kiṃcit sa mahātmā mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.18b: yad eṣāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mano na pratihanyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.19a: tad yathā sa mahārājo nālīkam adhigacchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.19b: na ca tāmyati duḥkhena sumantra kuru tat tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.20b: brūyās tvam abhivādyaiva mama hetor idaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.21a: naivāham anuśocāmi lakṣmaṇo na ca maithilī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.21b: ayodhyāyāś cyutāś ceti vane vatsyāmaheti vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.22b: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca drakṣyasi kṣipram āgatān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.23a: evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ mātaraṃ ca sumantra me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.23b: anyāś ca devīḥ sahitāḥ kaikeyīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.24b: sītāyā mama cāryasya vacanāl lakṣmaṇasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.25a: brūyāś ca hi mahārājaṃ bharataṃ kṣipram ānaya /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.25b: āgataś cāpi bharataḥ sthāpyo nṛpamate pade // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.27a: bharataś cāpi vaktavyo yathā rājani vartase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.28a: yathā ca tava kaikeyī sumitrā cāviśeṣataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.28b: tathaiva devī kausalyā mama mātā viśeṣataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.29b: tat sarvaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā snehāt kākutstham abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.30a: yad ahaṃ nopacāreṇa brūyāṃ snehād aviklavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.30b: bhaktimān iti tat tāvad vākyaṃ tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.31a: kathaṃ hi tvadvihīno 'haṃ pratiyāsyāmi tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.32a: sarāmam api tāvan me rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.32b: vinā rāmaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidīryetāpi sā purī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.33a: dainyaṃ hi nagarī gacched dṛṣṭvā śūnyam imaṃ ratham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.34b: cintayantyo 'dya nūnaṃ tvāṃ nirāhārāḥ kṛtāḥ prajāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.35a: ārtanādo hi yaḥ paurair muktas tadvipravāsane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.35b: rathasthaṃ māṃ niśāmyaiva kuryuḥ śataguṇaṃ tataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.36a: ahaṃ kiṃ cāpi vakṣyāmi devīṃ tava suto mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.36b: nīto 'sau mātulakulaṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kṛthā iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.37a: asatyam api naivāhaṃ brūyāṃ vacanam īdṛśam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.37b: katham apriyam evāhaṃ brūyāṃ satyam idaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.38b: kathaṃ rathaṃ tvayā hīnaṃ pravakṣyanti hayottamāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.39a: yadi me yācamānasya tyāgam eva kariṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.41a: tvatkṛte na mayā prāptaṃ rathacaryākṛtaṃ sukham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.43a: tava śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā kariṣyāmi vane vasan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.43b: ayodhyāṃ devalokaṃ vā sarvathā prajahāmy aham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.44a: na hi śakyā praveṣṭuṃ sā mayāyodhyā tvayā vinā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.45a: ime cāpi hayā vīra yadi te vanavāsinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.46a: vanavāse kṣayaṃ prāpte mamaiṣa hi manorathaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.46b: yad anena rathenaiva tvāṃ vaheyaṃ purīṃ punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.47a: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi sahitasya tvayā vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.48b: bhaktaṃ bhṛtyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ tvaṃ na māṃ hātum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.49a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dīnaṃ yācamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.49b: rāmo bhṛtyānukampī tu sumantram idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.50a: jānāmi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ mayi te bhartṛvatsala /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.50b: śṛṇu cāpi yadarthaṃ tvāṃ preṣayāmi purīm itaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.51a: nagarīṃ tvāṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā jananī me yavīyasī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.51b: kaikeyī pratyayaṃ gacched iti rāmo vanaṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.52a: parituṣṭā hi sā devī vanavāsaṃ gate mayi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.53a: eṣa me prathamaḥ kalpo yad ambā me yavīyasī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.54a: mama priyārthaṃ rājñaś ca sarathas tvaṃ purīṃ vraja /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.54b: saṃdiṣṭaś cāsi yānarthāṃs tāṃs tān brūyās tathātathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.54c: ity uktvā vacanaṃ sūtaṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.55a: guhaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ rāmo hetumad abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.56a: tat kṣīraṃ rājaputrāya guhaḥ kṣipram upāharat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.58b: vratam ādiṣṭavān rāmaḥ sahāyaṃ guham abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.59a: apramatto bale kośe durge janapade tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.59b: bhavethā guha rājyaṃ hi durārakṣatamaṃ matam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.61a: sa tu dṛṣṭvā nadītīre nāvam ikṣvākunandanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.61b: titīrṣuḥ śīghragāṃ gaṅgām idaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.62a: āroha tvaṃ naravyāghra sthitāṃ nāvam imāṃ śanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.63a: sa bhrātuḥ śāsanaṃ śrutvā sarvam apratikūlayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.65a: anujñāya sumantraṃ ca sabalaṃ caiva taṃ guham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.65b: āsthāya nāvaṃ rāmas tu codayāmāsa nāvikān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.66a: tatas taiś coditā sā nauḥ karṇadhārasamāhitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.67a: madhyaṃ tu samanuprāpya bhāgīrathyās tv aninditā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.67b: vaidehī prāñjalir bhūtvā tāṃ nadīm idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.69a: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi samagrāṇy uṣya kānane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.69b: bhrātrā saha mayā caiva punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.70a: tatas tvāṃ devi subhage kṣemeṇa punar āgatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.71a: tvaṃ hi tripathagā devi brahmalokaṃ samīkṣase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.72a: sā tvāṃ devi namasyāmi praśaṃsāmi ca śobhane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.73a: gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi vastrāṇy annaṃ ca peśalam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.74a: tathā saṃbhāṣamāṇā sā sītā gaṅgām aninditā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.75a: tīraṃ tu samanuprāpya nāvaṃ hitvā nararṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.75b: prātiṣṭhata saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca paraṃtapaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.76b: agrato gaccha saumitre sītā tvām anugacchatu // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.77a: pṛṣṭhato 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvāṃ ca sītāṃ ca pālayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.77b: adya duḥkhaṃ tu vaidehī vanavāsasya vetsyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.77c: gataṃ tu gaṅgāparapāram āśu rāmaṃ sumantraḥ pratataṃ nirīkṣya /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.77d: adhvaprakarṣād vinivṛttadṛṣṭir mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyathitas tapasvī //
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.77e: tau tatra hatvā caturo mahāmṛgān varāham ṛśyaṃ pṛṣataṃ mahārurum /
GE09ram_02su:ram_46.77f: ādāya medhyaṃ tvaritaṃ bubhukṣitau vāsāya kāle yayatur vanaspatim //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.1a: sa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāsādya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.1b: rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭha iti hovāca lakṣmaṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.2a: adyeyaṃ prathamā rātrir yātā janapadād bahiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.2b: yā sumantreṇa rahitā tāṃ notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.5b: imāḥ saumitraye rāmo vyājahāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.6a: dhruvam adya mahārājo duḥkhaṃ svapiti lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.6b: kṛtakāmā tu kaikeyī tuṣṭā bhavitum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.7a: sā hi devī mahārājaṃ kaikeyī rājyakāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.7b: api na cyāvayet prāṇān dṛṣṭvā bharatam āgatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.8a: anāthaś caiva vṛddhaś ca mayā caiva vinākṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.8b: kiṃ kariṣyati kāmātmā kaikeyyā vaśam āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.9a: idaṃ vyasanam ālokya rājñaś ca mativibhramam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.9b: kāma evārdhadharmābhyāṃ garīyān iti me matiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.10a: ko hy avidvān api pumān pramadāyāḥ kṛte tyajet /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.10b: chandānuvartinaṃ putraṃ tāto mām iva lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.11a: sukhī bata sabhāryaś ca bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.11b: muditān kosalān eko yo bhokṣyaty adhirājavat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.12a: sa hi sarvasya rājyasya mukham ekaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.12b: tāte ca vayasātīte mayi cāraṇyam āśrite // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.13b: evam āpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.14b: kaikeyī saumya samprāptā rājyāya bharatasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.15b: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca samprabādheta matkṛte // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.16a: mā sma matkāraṇād devī sumitrā duḥkham āvaset /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.16b: ayodhyām ita eva tvaṃ kāle praviśa lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.17a: aham eko gamiṣyāmi sītayā saha daṇḍakān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.17b: anāthāyā hi nāthas tvaṃ kausalyāyā bhaviṣyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.18a: kṣudrakarmā hi kaikeyī dveṣād anyāyyam ācaret /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.18b: paridadyā hi dharmajñe bharate mama mātaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.19a: nūnaṃ jātyantare kasmin striyaḥ putrair viyojitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.19b: jananyā mama saumitre tad apy etad upasthitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.20b: viprāyujyata kausalyā phalakāle dhig astu mām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.21a: mā sma sīmantinī kācij janayet putram īdṛśam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.21b: saumitre yo 'ham ambāyā dadmi śokam anantakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.22a: manye prītiviśiṣṭā sā matto lakṣmaṇa śārikā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.22b: yasyās tac chrūyate vākyaṃ śuka pādam arer daśa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.23b: putreṇa kim aputrāyā mayā kāryam ariṃdama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.24a: alpabhāgyā hi me mātā kausalyā rahitā mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.25a: eko hy aham ayodhyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.25b: tareyam iṣubhiḥ kruddho nanu vīryam akāraṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.27a: etad anyac ca karuṇaṃ vilapya vijane bahu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.29a: dhruvam adya purī rāma ayodhyāyudhināṃ vara /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.30a: naitad aupayikaṃ rāma yad idaṃ paritapyase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.30b: viṣādayasi sītāṃ ca māṃ caiva puruṣarṣabha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.31a: na ca sītā tvayā hīnā na cāham api rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.31b: muhūrtam api jīvāvo jalān matsyāv ivoddhṛtau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.32a: na hi tātaṃ na śatrughnaṃ na sumitrāṃ paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.32b: draṣṭum iccheyam adyāhaṃ svargaṃ vāpi tvayā vinā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.32c: sa lakṣmaṇasyottamapuṣkalaṃ vaco niśamya caivaṃ vanavāsam ādarāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_47.32d: samāḥ samastā vidadhe paraṃtapaḥ prapadya dharmaṃ sucirāya rāghavaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.1a: te tu tasmin mahāvṛkṣa uṣitvā rajanīṃ śivām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.2b: jagmus taṃ deśam uddiśya vigāhya sumahad vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.3a: te bhūmim āgān vividhān deśāṃś cāpi manoramān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.4a: yathākṣemeṇa gacchan sa paśyaṃś ca vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.5a: prayāgam abhitaḥ paśya saumitre dhūmam unnatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.5b: agner bhagavataḥ ketuṃ manye saṃnihito muniḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.6a: nūnaṃ prāptāḥ sma sambhedaṃ gaṅgāyamunayor vayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.6b: tathā hi śrūyate śabdo vāriṇo vārighaṭṭitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.8a: dhanvinau tau sukhaṃ gatvā lambamāne divākare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.9a: rāmas tv āśramam āsādya trāsayan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.10a: tatas tv āśramam āsādya muner darśanakāṅkṣiṇau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.14a: pitrā pravrājyamānaṃ māṃ saumitrir anujaḥ priyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.14b: ayam anvagamad bhrātā vanam eva dṛḍhavrataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.16b: upānayata dharmātmā gām arghyam udakaṃ tataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.17b: rāmam āgatam abhyarcya svāgatenāha taṃ muniḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.18a: pratigṛhya ca tām arcām upaviṣṭaṃ sarāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.19a: cirasya khalu kākutstha paśyāmi tvām ihāgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.19b: śrutaṃ tava mayā cedaṃ vivāsanam akāraṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.20b: puṇyaś ca ramaṇīyaś ca vasatv iha bhavān sukham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.21a: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ bharadvājena rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.21b: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmaḥ sarvahite rataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.22a: āgamiṣyati vaidehīṃ māṃ cāpi prekṣako janaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.22b: anena kāraṇenāham iha vāsaṃ na rocaye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.24a: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.25a: daśakrośa itas tāta girir yasmin nivatsyasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.27b: kalyāṇāni samādhatte na pāpe kurute manaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.28a: ṛṣayas tatra bahavo vihṛtya śaradāṃ śatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.29a: praviviktam ahaṃ manye taṃ vāsaṃ bhavataḥ sukham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.29b: iha vā vanavāsāya vasa rāma mayā saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.30a: sa rāmaṃ sarvakāmais taṃ bharadvājaḥ priyātithim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.30b: sabhāryaṃ saha ca bhrātrā pratijagrāha dharmavit // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.31a: tasya prayāge rāmasya taṃ maharṣim upeyuṣaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.31b: prapannā rajanī puṇyā citrāḥ kathayataḥ kathāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.33b: uṣitāḥ smeha vasatim anujānātu no bhavān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.34a: rātryāṃ tu tasyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ bharadvājo 'bravīd idam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_48.35d: mṛgaiś ca mattair bahubhiś ca kuñjaraiḥ suramyam āsādya samāvasāśramam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.1b: maharṣim abhivādyātha jagmatus taṃ giriṃ prati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.2a: prasthitāṃś caiva tān prekṣya pitā putrān ivānvagāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.2b: tataḥ pracakrame vaktuṃ vacanaṃ sa mahāmuniḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.3b: tatra yūyaṃ plavaṃ kṛtvā taratāṃśumatīṃ nadīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.5a: krośamātraṃ tato gatvā nīlaṃ drakṣyatha kānanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.5c: sa panthāś citrakūṭasya gataḥ subahuśo mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.6b: iti panthānam āvedya maharṣiḥ sa nyavartata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.7a: upāvṛtte munau tasmin rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.7b: kṛtapuṇyāḥ sma saumitre munir yan no 'nukampate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.8b: sītām evāgrataḥ kṛtvā kālindīṃ jagmatur nadīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.9b: cakāra lakṣmaṇaś chittvā sītāyāḥ sukham āsanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.10a: tatra śriyam ivācintyāṃ rāmo dāśarathiḥ priyām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.11b: tīrajair bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ saṃterur yamunāṃ nadīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.12a: te tīrṇāḥ plavam utsṛjya prasthāya yamunāvanāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.13a: kausalyāṃ caiva paśyeyaṃ sumitrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.14b: bahūn medhyān mṛgān hatvā ceratur yamunāvane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.14c: vihṛtya te barhiṇapūganādite śubhe vane vāraṇavānarāyute /
GE09ram_02su:ram_49.14d: samaṃ nadīvapram upetya saṃmataṃ nivāsam ājagmur adīnadarśanāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.2a: saumitre śṛṇu vanyānāṃ valgu vyāharatāṃ svanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.3a: sa suptaḥ samaye bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ pratibodhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.3b: jahau nidrāṃ ca tandrīṃ ca prasaktaṃ ca pathi śramam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.4a: tata utthāya te sarve spṛṣṭvā nadyāḥ śivaṃ jalam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.5a: tataḥ samprasthitaḥ kāle rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.6a: ādīptān iva vaidehi sarvataḥ puṣpitān nagān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.6b: svaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kiṃśukān paśya mālinaḥ śiśirātyaye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.9a: eṣa krośati natyūhas taṃ śikhī pratikūjati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.11a: tatas tau pādacāreṇa gacchantau saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.12b: ayaṃ vāso bhavet tāvad atra saumya ramemahi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.13a: lakṣmaṇānaya dārūṇi dṛḍhāni ca varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.14a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitrir vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.15b: aiṇeyaṃ māṃsam āhṛtya śālāṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.16a: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgaṃ hatvā medhyaṃ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.17a: taṃ tu pakvaṃ samājñāya niṣṭaptaṃ chinnaśoṇitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.18a: ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ samāptāṅgaḥ śṛtaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgo yathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.18b: devatā devasaṃkāśa yajasva kuśalo hy asi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.19a: rāmaḥ snātvā tu niyato guṇavāñ japyakovidaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.19c: tāṃ vṛkṣaparṇacchadanāṃ manojñāṃ yathāpradeśaṃ sukṛtāṃ nivātām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.19d: vāsāya sarve viviśuḥ sametāḥ sabhāṃ yathā devagaṇāḥ sudharmām //
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.19f: vanottame vyālamṛgānunādite tathā vijahruḥ susukhaṃ jitendriyāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.19g: suramyam āsādya tu citrakūṭaṃ nadīṃ ca tāṃ mālyavatīṃ sutīrthām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_50.19h: nananda hṛṣṭo mṛgapakṣijuṣṭāṃ jahau ca duḥkhaṃ puravipravāsāt //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.3a: sa vanāni sugandhīni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.3b: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ grāmāṇi nagarāṇi ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.5a: sa śūnyām iva niḥśabdāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.5c: kaccin na sagajā sāśvā sajanā sajanādhipā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.6b: iti cintāparaḥ sūtas tvaritaḥ praviveśa ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.7b: kva rāma iti pṛcchantaḥ sūtam abhyadravan narāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.8a: teṣāṃ śaśaṃsa gaṅgāyām aham āpṛcchya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.9a: te tīrṇā iti vijñāya bāṣpapūrṇamukhā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.9b: aho dhig iti niḥśvasya hā rāmeti ca cukruśuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.10a: śuśrāva ca vacas teṣāṃ vṛndaṃ vṛndaṃ ca tiṣṭhatām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.10b: hatāḥ sma khalu ye neha paśyāma iti rāghavam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.11b: na drakṣyāmaḥ punar jātu dhārmikaṃ rāmam antarā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.12a: kiṃ samarthaṃ janasyāsya kiṃ priyaṃ kiṃ sukhāvaham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.14b: yatra rājā daśarathas tad evopayayau gṛham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.15a: so 'vatīrya rathāc chīghraṃ rājaveśma praviśya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.17a: saha rāmeṇa niryāto vinā rāmam ihāgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.17b: sūtaḥ kiṃ nāma kausalyāṃ śocantīṃ prativakṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.18a: yathā ca manye durjīvam evaṃ na sukaraṃ dhruvam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.18b: ācchidya putre niryāte kausalyā yatra jīvati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.19a: satyarūpaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājñaḥ strīṇāṃ niśāmayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.19b: pradīptam iva śokena viveśa sahasā gṛham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.20a: sa praviśyāṣṭamīṃ kakṣyāṃ rājānaṃ dīnam āturam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.21a: abhigamya tam āsīnaṃ narendram abhivādya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.22a: sa tūṣṇīm eva tac chrutvā rājā vibhrāntacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.23b: uddhṛtya bāhū cukrośa nṛpatau patite kṣitau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.24a: sumitrayā tu sahitā kausalyā patitaṃ patim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.26b: uttiṣṭha sukṛtaṃ te 'stu śoke na syāt sahāyatā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.27a: deva yasyā bhayād rāmaṃ nānupṛcchasi sārathim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.29a: evaṃ vilapatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kausalyāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.29b: patiṃ cāvekṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.29c: tatas tam antaḥpuranādam utthitaṃ samīkṣya vṛddhās taruṇāś ca mānavāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_51.29d: striyaś ca sarvā ruruduḥ samantataḥ puraṃ tadāsīt punar eva saṃkulam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.1a: pratyāśvasto yadā rājā mohāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.3a: rājā tu rajasā sūtaṃ dhvastāṅgaṃ samupasthitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.3c: kva nu vatsyati dharmātmā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.5b: sa vatsyati kathaṃ rāmo vijanaṃ vanam āśritaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.6b: kathaṃ kumārau vaidehyā sārdhaṃ vanam upasthitau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.7b: rājaputrau kathaṃ pādair avaruhya rathād gatau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.8a: siddhārthaḥ khalu sūta tvaṃ yena dṛṣṭau mamātmajau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.8b: vanāntaṃ praviśantau tāv aśvināv iva mandaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.8c: kim uvāca vaco rāmaḥ kim uvāca ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.9a: sumantra vanam āsādya kim uvāca ca maithilī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.9b: āsitaṃ śayitaṃ bhuktaṃ sūta rāmasya kīrtaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.13a: sarvam antaḥpuraṃ vācyaṃ sūta madvacanāt tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.14a: mātā ca mama kausalyā kuśalaṃ cābhivādanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.14b: devi devasya pādau ca devavat paripālaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.15a: bharataḥ kuśalaṃ vācyo vācyo madvacanena ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.15b: sarvāsv eva yathānyāyaṃ vṛttiṃ vartasva mātṛṣu // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.17a: ity evaṃ māṃ mahārāja bruvann eva mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.18a: lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho niḥśvasan vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.19b: rāmasya tu parityāge na hetum upalakṣaye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.21b: bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuś ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.24b: tena duḥkhena rudatī naiva māṃ kiṃcid abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.25b: mumoca sahasā bāṣpaṃ māṃ prayāntam udīkṣya sā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_52.25d: tathaiva sītā rudatī tapasvinī nirīkṣate rājarathaṃ tathaiva mām //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.1a: mama tv aśvā nivṛttasya na prāvartanta vartmani /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.1b: uṣṇam aśru vimuñcanto rāme samprasthite vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.2b: prasthito ratham āsthāya tad duḥkham api dhārayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.3a: guhena sārdhaṃ tatraiva sthito 'smi divasān bahūn /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.3b: āśayā yadi māṃ rāmaḥ punaḥ śabdāpayed iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.5a: na ca sarpanti sattvāni vyālā na prasaranti ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.7a: jalajāni ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni sthalajāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.7b: nādya bhānty alpagandhīni phalāni ca yathā puram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.8a: praviśantam ayodhyāṃ māṃ na kaścid abhinandati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.8b: narā rāmam apaśyanto niḥśvasanti muhur muhuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.9a: harmyair vimānaiḥ prāsādair avekṣya ratham āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.14b: bāṣpopahatayā rājā taṃ sūtam idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.15b: mayā na mantrakuśalair vṛddhaiḥ saha samarthitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.16a: na suhṛdbhir na cāmātyair mantrayitvā na naigamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.16b: mayāyam arthaḥ sammohāt strīhetoḥ sahasā kṛtaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.17a: bhavitavyatayā nūnam idaṃ vā vyasanaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.18a: sūta yady asti te kiṃcin mayāpi sukṛtaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.18b: tvaṃ prāpayāśu māṃ rāmaṃ prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.19a: yad yad yāpi mamaivājñā nivartayatu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.19b: na śakṣyāmi vinā rāmaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.20a: atha vāpi mahābāhur gato dūraṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.20b: mām eva ratham āropya śīghraṃ rāmāya darśaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.21b: yadi jīvāmi sādhv enaṃ paśyeyaṃ saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.22b: rāmaṃ yadi na paśyāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.23a: ato nu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yo 'ham ikṣvākunandanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.23b: imām avasthām āpanno neha paśyāmi rāghavam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.23c: hā rāma rāmānuja hā hā vaidehi tapasvini /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.24a: na māṃ jānīta duḥkhena mriyamāṇam anāthavat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.24c: aśobhanaṃ yo 'ham ihādya rāghavaṃ didṛkṣamāṇo na labhe salakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.24d: itīva rājā vilapan mahāyaśāḥ papāta tūrṇaṃ śayane sa mūrchitaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.24e: iti vilapati pārthive pranaṣṭe karuṇataraṃ dviguṇaṃ ca rāmahetoḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_53.24f: vacanam anuniśamya tasya devī bhayam agamat punar eva rāmamātā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.2a: naya māṃ yatra kākutsthaḥ sītā yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.2b: tān vinā kṣaṇam apy atra jīvituṃ notsahe hy aham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.3a: nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ daṇḍakān naya mām api /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.4b: idam āśvāsayan devīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.5a: tyaja śokaṃ ca mohaṃ ca sambhramaṃ duḥkhajaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.5b: vyavadhūya ca saṃtāpaṃ vane vatsyati rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.6a: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmasya pādau paricaran vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.7a: vijane 'pi vane sītā vāsaṃ prāpya gṛheṣv iva /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.8a: nāsyā dainyaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃcit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.9a: nagaropavanaṃ gatvā yathā sma ramate purā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.9b: tathaiva ramate sītā nirjaneṣu vaneṣv api // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.10b: rāmā rāme hy adhīnātmā vijane 'pi vane satī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.11a: tadgataṃ hṛdayaṃ hy asyās tadadhīnaṃ ca jīvitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.11b: ayodhyāpi bhavet tasyā rāmahīnā tathā vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.12a: pathi pṛcchati vaidehī grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.12b: gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā nadīnāṃ ca pādapān vividhān api // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.13b: na hi gacchati vaidehyāś candrāṃśusadṛśī prabhā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.17a: gajaṃ vā vīkṣya siṃhaṃ vā vyāghraṃ vā vanam āśritā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.18a: na śocyās te na cātmā te śocyo nāpi janādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.18b: idaṃ hi caritaṃ loke pratiṣṭhāsyati śāśvatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.18c: vidhūya śokaṃ parihṛṣṭamānasā maharṣiyāte pathi suvyavasthitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.18d: vane ratā vanyaphalāśanāḥ pituḥ śubhāṃ pratijñāṃ paripālayanti te //
GE09ram_02su:ram_54.18f: na caiva devī virarāma kūjitāt priyeti putreti ca rāghaveti ca //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.1a: vanaṃ gate dharmapare rāme ramayatāṃ vare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.1b: kausalyā rudatī svārtā bhartāram idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.2a: yadyapi triṣu lokeṣu prathitaṃ te mahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.2b: sānukrośo vadānyaś ca priyavādī ca rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.3a: kathaṃ naravaraśreṣṭha putrau tau saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.4a: sā nūnaṃ taruṇī śyāmā sukumārī sukhocitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.4b: katham uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca maithilī prasahiṣyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.9a: vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ me na saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.9b: apaśyantyā na taṃ yad vai phalatīdaṃ sahasradhā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.10a: yadi pañcadaśe varṣe rāghavaḥ punar eṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.10b: jahyād rājyaṃ ca kośaṃ ca bharatenopabhokṣyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.11a: evaṃ kanīyasā bhrātrā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ viśāṃ pate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.11b: bhrātā jyeṣṭho variṣṭhaś ca kimarthaṃ nāvamaṃsyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.12a: na pareṇāhṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyāghraḥ khāditum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.12b: evam eva naravyāghraḥ paralīḍhaṃ na maṃsyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.13a: havir ājyaṃ puroḍāśāḥ kuśā yūpāś ca khādirāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.14a: tathā hy āttam idaṃ rājyaṃ hṛtasārāṃ surām iva /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.16b: svayam eva hataḥ pitrā jalajenātmajo yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.17b: yadi te dharmanirate tvayā putre vivāsite // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.18a: gatir ekā patir nāryā dvitīyā gatir ātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.18b: tṛtīyā jñātayo rājaṃś caturthī neha vidyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.19a: tatra tvaṃ caiva me nāsti rāmaś ca vanam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.19b: na vanaṃ gantum icchāmi sarvathā hi hatā tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.19c: hataṃ tvayā rājyam idaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ hatas tathātmā saha mantribhiś ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.19d: hatā saputrāsmi hatāś ca paurāḥ sutaś ca bhāryā ca tava prahṛṣṭau //
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.19e: imāṃ giraṃ dāruṇaśabdasaṃśritāṃ niśamya rājāpi mumoha duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_55.19f: tataḥ sa śokaṃ praviveśa pārthivaḥ svaduṣkṛtaṃ cāpi punas tadāsmarat //
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.1a: evaṃ tu kruddhayā rājā rāmamātrā saśokayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.2b: yad anena kṛtaṃ pūrvam ajñānāc chabdavedhinā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.3a: amanās tena śokena rāmaśokena ca prabhuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.3b: dahyamānas tu śokābhyāṃ kausalyām āha bhūpatiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.4b: vatsalā cānṛśaṃsā ca tvaṃ hi nityaṃ pareṣv api // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.5a: bhartā tu khalu nārīṇāṃ guṇavān nirguṇo 'pi vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.7a: tad vākyaṃ karuṇaṃ rājñaḥ śrutvā dīnasya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.8a: sa mūrdhni baddhvā rudatī rājñaḥ padmam ivāñjalim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.9a: prasīda śirasā yāce bhūmau nipatitāsmi te /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.9b: yācitāsmi hatā deva hantavyāhaṃ na hi tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.10a: naiṣā hi sā strī bhavati ślāghanīyena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.10b: ubhayor lokayor vīra patyā yā saṃprasādyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.11a: jānāmi dharmaṃ dharmajña tvāṃ jāne satyavādinam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.11b: putraśokārtayā tat tu mayā kim api bhāṣitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.12a: śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.12b: śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.13b: soḍhum āpatitaḥ śokaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi na śakyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.15a: taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.16a: evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.17a: atha prahlādito vākyair devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_56.17b: śokena ca samākrānto nidrāyā vaśam eyivān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.1b: atha rājā daśarathaḥ sa cintām abhyapadyata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.2c: sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.4a: yad ācarati kalyāṇi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.4b: tad eva labhate bhadre kartā karmajam ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.5b: doṣaṃ vā yo na jānāti sa bāla iti hocyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.6a: kaścid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.6b: puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.7a: so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.7b: rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.8a: kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.8b: tad idaṃ me 'nusaṃprāptaṃ devi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.9a: sammohād iha bālena yathā syād bhakṣitaṃ viṣam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.10a: devy anūḍhā tvam abhavo yuvarājo bhavāmy aham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.11a: upāsya hi rasān bhaumāṃs taptvā ca jagad aṃśubhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.12a: uṣṇam antardadhe sadyaḥ snigdhā dadṛśire ghanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.14a: tasminn atisukhe kāle dhanuṣmān iṣumān rathī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.15a: nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.15b: anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃcij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.16a: athāndhakāre tv aśrauṣaṃ jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.17c: tatra vāg uṣasi vyaktā prādurāsīd vanaukasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.18a: hā heti patatas toye vāg abhūt tatra mānuṣī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.18b: katham asmadvidhe śastraṃ nipatet tu tapasvini // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.19b: iṣuṇābhihataḥ kena kasya vā kiṃ kṛtaṃ mayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.20a: ṛṣer hi nyastadaṇḍasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.20b: kathaṃ nu śastreṇa vadho madvidhasya vidhīyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.21b: ko vadhena mamārthī syāt kiṃ vāsyāpakṛtaṃ mayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.22b: na kaścit sādhu manyeta yathaiva gurutalpagam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.24a: tad etan mithunaṃ vṛddhaṃ cirakālabhṛtaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.24b: mayi pañcatvam āpanne kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.25a: vṛddhau ca mātāpitarāv ahaṃ caikeṣuṇā hataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.26a: tāṃ giraṃ karuṇāṃ śrutvā mama dharmānukāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.27a: taṃ deśam aham āgamya dīnasattvaḥ sudurmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.27b: apaśyam iṣuṇā tīre sarayvās tāpasaṃ hatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.28a: sa mām udvīkṣya netrābhyāṃ trastam asvasthacetasam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.28b: ity uvāca vacaḥ krūraṃ didhakṣann iva tejasā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.29a: kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ rājan vane nivasatā mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.29b: jihīrṣur ambho gurvarthaṃ yad ahaṃ tāḍitas tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.30a: ekena khalu bāṇena marmaṇy abhihate mayi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.30b: dvāv andhau nihatau vṛddhau mātā janayitā ca me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.31a: tau nūnaṃ durbalāv andhau matpratīkṣau pipāsitau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.32a: na nūnaṃ tapaso vāsti phalayogaḥ śrutasya vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.32b: pitā yan māṃ na jānāti śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.33a: jānann api ca kiṃ kuryād aśaktir aparikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.33b: bhidyamānam ivāśaktas trātum anyo nago nagam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.34a: pitus tvam eva me gatvā śīghram ācakṣva rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.34b: na tvām anudahet kruddho vanaṃ vahnir ivaidhitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.35a: iyam ekapadī rājan yato me pitur āśramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.35b: taṃ prasādaya gatvā tvaṃ na tvāṃ sa kupitaḥ śapet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.36a: viśalyaṃ kuru māṃ rājan marma me niśitaḥ śaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.36b: ruṇaddhi mṛdu sotsedhaṃ tīram amburayo yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.37a: na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.38b: tasya tv ānamyamānasya taṃ bāṇam aham uddharam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.38c: jalārdragātraṃ tu vilapya kṛcchrān marmavraṇaṃ saṃtatam ucchvasantam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_57.38d: tataḥ sarayvāṃ tam ahaṃ śayānaṃ samīkṣya bhadre subhṛśaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.1a: tad ajñānān mahat pāpaṃ kṛtvā saṃkulitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.1b: ekas tv acintayaṃ buddhyā kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ bhavet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.2a: tatas taṃ ghaṭam ādāya pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.2b: āśramaṃ tam ahaṃ prāpya yathākhyātapathaṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.3b: apaśyaṃ tasya pitarau lūnapakṣāv iva dvijau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.4b: tām āśāṃ matkṛte hīnāv udāsīnāv anāthavat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.5a: padaśabdaṃ tu me śrutvā munir vākyam abhāṣata /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.5b: kiṃ cirāyasi me putra pānīyaṃ kṣipram ānaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.6a: yannimittam idaṃ tāta salile krīḍitaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.6b: utkaṇṭhitā te māteyaṃ praviśa kṣipram āśramam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.7a: yad vyalīkaṃ kṛtaṃ putra mātrā te yadi vā mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.7b: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ tvayā tāta tapasvinā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.8a: tvaṃ gatis tv agatīnāṃ ca cakṣus tvaṃ hīnacakṣuṣām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.8b: samāsaktās tvayi prāṇāḥ kiṃcin nau nābhibhāṣase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.9a: munim avyaktayā vācā tam ahaṃ sajjamānayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.10b: ācacakṣe tv ahaṃ tasmai putravyasanajaṃ bhayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.12b: jighāṃsuḥ śvāpadaṃ kiṃcin nipāne vāgataṃ gajam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.13a: tatra śruto mayā śabdo jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.13b: dvipo 'yam iti matvā hi bāṇenābhihato mayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.14a: gatvā nadyās tatas tīram apaśyam iṣuṇā hṛdi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.15b: visṛṣṭo 'mbhasi nārācas tena te nihataḥ sutaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.16a: sa coddhṛtena bāṇena tatraiva svargam āsthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.16b: bhagavantāv ubhau śocann andhāv iti vilapya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.17b: śeṣam evaṃgate yat syāt tat prasīdatu me muniḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.18a: sa tac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ niḥśvasañ śokakarśitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.19a: yady etad aśubhaṃ karma na sma me kathayeḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.19b: phalen mūrdhā sma te rājan sadyaḥ śatasahasradhā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.20b: jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ sthānāc cyāvayed api vajriṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.21a: ajñānāddhi kṛtaṃ yasmād idaṃ tenaiva jīvasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.21b: api hy adya kulaṃ na syād rāghavāṇāṃ kuto bhavān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.22a: naya nau nṛpa taṃ deśam iti māṃ cābhyabhāṣata /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.22b: adya taṃ draṣṭum icchāvaḥ putraṃ paścimadarśanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.24a: athāham ekas taṃ deśaṃ nītvā tau bhṛśaduḥkhitau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.24b: asparśayam ahaṃ putraṃ taṃ muniṃ saha bhāryayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.25a: tau putram ātmanaḥ spṛṣṭvā tam āsādya tapasvinau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.26a: na nv ahaṃ te priyaḥ putra mātaraṃ paśya dhārmika /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.26b: kiṃ nu nāliṅgase putra sukumāra vaco vada // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.28a: ko māṃ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva snātvā hutahutāśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.29a: kandamūlaphalaṃ hṛtvā ko māṃ priyam ivātithim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.30a: imām andhāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ ca mātaraṃ te tapasvinīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.31a: tiṣṭha mā mā gamaḥ putra yamasya sadanaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.31b: śvo mayā saha gantāsi jananyā ca samedhitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.32a: ubhāv api ca śokārtāv anāthau kṛpaṇau vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.32b: kṣipram eva gamiṣyāvas tvayā hīnau yamakṣayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.33a: tato vaivasvataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāratīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.33b: kṣamatāṃ dharmarājo me bibhṛyāt pitarāv ayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.34b: tena satyena gacchāśu ye lokāḥ śastrayodhinām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.35a: yānti śūrā gatiṃ yāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.35b: hatās tv abhimukhāḥ putra gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ vraja // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.36a: yāṃ gatiṃ sagaraḥ śaibyo dilīpo janamejayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.36b: nahuṣo dhundhumāraś ca prāptās tāṃ gaccha putraka // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.37a: yā gatiḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ svādhyāyāt tapasā ca yā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.38a: dehanyāsakṛtāṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha putraka /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.38b: na hi tv asmin kule jāto gacchaty akuśalāṃ gatim // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.39b: tato 'smai kartum udakaṃ pravṛttaḥ saha bhāryayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.40a: sa tu divyena rūpeṇa muniputraḥ svakarmabhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.40b: āśvāsya ca muhūrtaṃ tu pitarau vākyam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.41a: sthānam asmi mahat prāpto bhavatoḥ paricāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.41b: bhavantāv api ca kṣipraṃ mama mūlam upaiṣyataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.42a: evam uktvā tu divyena vimānena vapuṣmatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.43a: sa kṛtvā tūdakaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasaḥ saha bhāryayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.44a: adyaiva jahi māṃ rājan maraṇe nāsti me vyathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.44b: yac chareṇaikaputraṃ māṃ tvam akārṣīr aputrakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.45a: tvayā tu yad avijñānān nihato me sutaḥ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.46a: putravyasanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad etan mama sāmpratam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.46b: evaṃ tvaṃ putraśokena rājan kālaṃ kariṣyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.47a: tasmān mām āgataṃ bhadre tasyodārasya tadvacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.47b: yad ahaṃ putraśokena saṃtyakṣyāmy adya jīvitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.48a: yadi māṃ saṃspṛśed rāmaḥ sakṛd adyālabheta vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.48b: na tan me sadṛśaṃ devi yan mayā rāghave kṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.49a: cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.50a: atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.50b: na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.51a: na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.51b: mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.53b: sugandhi mama nāthasya dhanyā drakṣyanti tanmukham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.54b: drakṣyanti sukhino rāmaṃ śukraṃ mārgagataṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.55a: ayam ātmabhavaḥ śoko mām anātham acetanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.56c: tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_58.56d: gate 'rdharātre bhṛśaduḥkhapīḍitas tadā jahau prāṇam udāradarśanaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_59.5b: tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_59.6a: tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_59.7a: atha saṃvepamānānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_59.7b: yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_59.8a: tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_59.9b: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca tyaktanidre babhūvatuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_59.10a: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_59.13c: atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_59.13d: bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann anāthavat //
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.1a: tam agnim iva saṃśāntam ambuhīnam ivārṇavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.3a: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.4a: vihāya māṃ gato rāmo bhartā ca svargato mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.5a: bhartāraṃ taṃ parityajya kā strī daivatam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.6a: na lubdho budhyate doṣān kiṃ pākam iva bhakṣayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.7b: sabhāryaṃ janakaḥ śrutvā paritapsyaty ahaṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.12b: rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.13a: na tu saṃkālanaṃ rājño vinā putreṇa mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.13b: sarvajñāḥ kartum īṣus te tato rakṣanti bhūmipam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.14a: tailadroṇyāṃ tu sacivaiḥ śāyitaṃ taṃ narādhipam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.14b: hā mṛto 'yam iti jñātvā striyas tāḥ paryadevayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.17c: gataprabhā dyaur iva bhāskaraṃ vinā vyapetanakṣatragaṇeva śarvarī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.17d: purī babhāse rahitā mahātmanā na cāsrakaṇṭhākulamārgacatvarā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.17e: narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_60.17f: tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.2b: kātyāyano gautamaś ca jābāliś ca mahāyaśāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.3a: ete dvijāḥ sahāmātyaiḥ pṛthag vācam udīrayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.4a: atītā śarvarī duḥkhaṃ yā no varṣaśatopamā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.5a: svargataś ca mahārājo rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.5b: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tejasvī rāmeṇaiva gataḥ saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.7b: arājakaṃ hi no rāṣṭraṃ na vināśam avāpnuyāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.9b: nārājake pituḥ putro bhāryā vā vartate vaśe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.10a: arājake dhanaṃ nāsti nāsti bhāryāpy arājake /
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.10b: idam atyāhitaṃ cānyat kutaḥ satyam arājake // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.11b: udyānāni ca ramyāṇi hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyagṛhāṇi ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.13b: utsavāś ca samājāś ca vardhante rāṣṭravardhanāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.15b: narā niryānty araṇyāni nārībhiḥ saha kāminaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.19b: na cāpy arājake senā śatrūn viṣahate yudhi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.20a: yathā hy anudakā nadyo yathā vāpy atṛṇaṃ vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.20b: agopālā yathā gāvas tathā rāṣṭram arājakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.21b: matsyā iva narā nityaṃ bhakṣayanti parasparam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.23a: aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃcana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.23b: rājā cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.24a: jīvaty api mahārāje tavaiva vacanaṃ vayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.25a: sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam araṇyabhūtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_61.25b: kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.1a: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.1b: mitrāmātyagaṇān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃs tān idaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.2a: yad asau mātulakule pure rājagṛhe sukhī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.3a: tac chīghraṃ javanā dūtā gacchantu tvaritair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.3b: ānetuṃ bhrātarau vīrau kiṃ samīkṣāmahe vayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.4a: gacchantv iti tataḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abruvan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.4b: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.5b: śrūyatām itikartavyaṃ sarvān eva bravīmi vaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.6a: puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ gatvā śīghraṃ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.6b: tyaktaśokair idaṃ vācyaḥ śāsanād bharato mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.7a: purohitas tvāṃ kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.7b: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.8a: mā cāsmai proṣitaṃ rāmaṃ mā cāsmai pitaraṃ mṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.8b: bhavantaḥ śaṃsiṣur gatvā rāghavāṇām imaṃ kṣayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.8c: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.9a: kṣipram ādāya rājñaś ca bharatasya ca gacchata /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.10a: te hastinapure gaṅgāṃ tīrtvā pratyaṅmukhā yayuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.13a: yayur madhyena vāhlīkān sudāmānaṃ ca parvatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.13b: viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prekṣamāṇā vipāśāṃ cāpi śālmalīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.14a: te śrāntavāhanā dūtā vikṛṣṭena satā pathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.14c: bhartuḥ priyārthaṃ kularakṣaṇārthaṃ bhartuś ca vaṃśasya parigrahārtham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_62.14d: aheḍamānās tvarayā sma dūtā rātryāṃ tu te tat puram eva yātāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.1a: yām eva rātriṃ te dūtāḥ praviśanti sma tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.1b: bharatenāpi tāṃ rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭo 'yam apriyaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.2a: vyuṣṭām eva tu tāṃ rātriṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ svapnam apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.3b: āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.4a: vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.4b: nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.5a: sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priyavādibhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.6a: tam abravīt priyasakho bharataṃ sakhibhir vṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.7a: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ suhṛdaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.7b: śṛṇu tvaṃ yannimittaṃ me dainyam etad upāgatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.9a: plavamānaś ca me dṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmin gomayahrade /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.9b: pibann añjalinā tailaṃ hasann iva muhur muhuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.10a: tatas tilodanaṃ bhuktvā punaḥ punar adhaḥśirāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.11a: svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.12a: avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.12b: ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva parvatān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.15a: evam etan mayā dṛṣṭam imāṃ rātriṃ bhayāvahām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.15b: ahaṃ rāmo 'tha vā rājā lakṣmaṇo vā mariṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.15c: naro yānena yaḥ svapne kharayuktena yāti hi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.16b: etannimittaṃ dīno 'haṃ tan na vaḥ pratipūjaye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.17a: śuṣyatīva ca me kaṇṭho na svastham iva me manaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.17b: jugupsann iva cātmānaṃ na ca paśyāmi kāraṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.17c: imāṃ hi duḥsvapnagatiṃ niśāmya tām anekarūpām avitarkitāṃ purā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_63.17d: bhayaṃ mahat taddhṛdayān na yāti me vicintya rājānam acintyadarśanam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.1a: bharate bruvati svapnaṃ dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.2a: samāgamya tu rājñā ca rājaputreṇa cārcitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.2b: rājñaḥ pādau gṛhītvā tu tam ūcur bharataṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.3a: purohitas tvā kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.3b: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.4a: atra viṃśatikoṭyas tu nṛpater mātulasya te /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.4b: daśakoṭyas tu sampūrṇās tathaiva ca nṛpātmaja // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.5a: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.5b: dūtān uvāca bharataḥ kāmaiḥ sampratipūjya tān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.6a: kaccit sukuśalī rājā pitā daśaratho mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.6b: kaccic cārogatā rāme lakṣmaṇe vā mahātmani // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.7b: arogā cāpi kausalyā mātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.8a: kaccit sumitrā dharmajñā jananī lakṣmaṇasya yā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.8b: śatrughnasya ca vīrasya sārogā cāpi madhyamā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.9b: arogā cāpi kaikeyī mātā me kim uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.9c: evam uktās tu te dūtā bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.10a: ūcuḥ sampraśritaṃ vākyam idaṃ taṃ bharataṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.10b: kuśalās te naravyāghra yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.11a: bharataś cāpi tān dūtān evam ukto 'bhyabhāṣata /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.12a: evam uktvā tu tān dūtān bharataḥ pārthivātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.12b: dūtaiḥ saṃcodito vākyaṃ mātāmaham uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.13b: punar apy aham eṣyāmi yadā me tvaṃ smariṣyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.14a: bharatenaivam uktas tu nṛpo mātāmahas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.14b: tam uvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śirasy āghrāya rāghavam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.15a: gaccha tātānujāne tvāṃ kaikeyī suprajās tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.15b: mātaraṃ kuśalaṃ brūyāḥ pitaraṃ ca paraṃtapa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.16a: purohitaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.16b: tau ca tāta maheṣvāsau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.17a: tasmai hastyuttamāṃś citrān kambalān ajināni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.18b: satkṛtya kaikeyī putraṃ kekayo dhanam ādiśat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.20b: kharāñ śīghrān susaṃyuktān mātulo 'smai dhanaṃ dadau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.22a: sa mātāmaham āpṛcchya mātulaṃ ca yudhājitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_64.23c: balena gupto bharato mahātmā sahāryakasyātmasamair amātyaiḥ /
