GE09ram_02su:ram_64.23d: ādāya śatrughnam apetaśatrur gṛhād yayau siddha ivendralokāt //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.3b: atyayāt sa mahāśailān vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ prati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.4b: yamunāṃ prāpya saṃtīrṇo balam āśvāsayat tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.5a: śītīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi klāntān āśvāsya vājinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.5b: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca prāyād ādāya codakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.6b: bhadro bhadreṇa yānena mārutaḥ kham ivātyayāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.7b: varūthaṃ ca yayau ramyaṃ grāmaṃ daśarathātmajaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.8a: tatra ramye vane vāsaṃ kṛtvāsau prāṅmukho yayau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.9a: sālāṃs tu priyakān prāpya śīghrān āsthāya vājinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.10a: vāsaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrthe tīrtvā cottānikāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.10b: anyā nadīś ca vividhāḥ pārvatīyais turaṃgamaiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.11a: tatāra ca naravyāghro lauhitye sa kapīvatīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.13b: ayodhyāṃ manunā rājñā nirmitāṃ sa dadarśa ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.14b: ayodhyām agrato dṛṣṭvā rathe sārathim abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.17a: ayodhyāyāṃ purā śabdaḥ śrūyate tumulo mahān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.17b: samantān naranārīṇāṃ tam adya na śṛṇomy aham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.20a: na hy atra yānair dṛśyante na gajair na ca vājibhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.21a: aniṣṭāni ca pāpāni paśyāmi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.21b: nimittāny amanojñāni tena sīdati me manaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.22b: dvāḥsthair utthāya vijayaṃ pṛṣṭas taiḥ sahito yayau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.23a: sa tv anekāgrahṛdayo dvāḥsthaṃ pratyarcya taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.23b: sūtam aśvapateḥ klāntam abravīt tatra rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.24a: śrutā no yādṛśāḥ pūrvaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ vināśane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.24b: ākārās tān ahaṃ sarvān iha paśyāmi sārathe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.25b: sastrīpuṃsaṃ ca paśyāmi janam utkaṇṭhitaṃ pure // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.25c: ity evam uktvā bharataḥ sūtaṃ taṃ dīnamānasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.26a: tāny aniṣṭāny ayodhyāyāṃ prekṣya rājagṛhaṃ yayau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.26c: dṛṣṭvā purīm indrapurīprakāśāṃ duḥkhena sampūrṇataro babhūva /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.27a: bahūni paśyan manaso 'priyāṇi yāny anyadā nāsya pure babhūvuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_65.27b: avākśirā dīnamanā na hṛṣṭaḥ pitur mahātmā praviveśa veśma // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.1a: apaśyaṃs tu tatas tatra pitaraṃ pitur ālaye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.1b: jagāma bharato draṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ mātur ālaye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.2a: anuprāptaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyī proṣitaṃ sutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.3b: bharataḥ prekṣya jagrāha jananyāś caraṇau śubhau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.6a: āryakas te sukuśalī yudhājin mātulas tava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.6b: pravāsāc ca sukhaṃ putra sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.7a: evaṃ pṛṣṭas tu kaikeyyā priyaṃ pārthivanandanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.8b: ambāyāḥ kuśalī tāto yudhājin mātulaś ca me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.9a: yan me dhanaṃ ca ratnaṃ ca dadau rājā paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.9b: pariśrāntaṃ pathy abhavat tato 'haṃ pūrvam āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.10b: yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi tad ambā vaktum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.11b: na cāyam ikṣvākujanaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratibhāti me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.12b: tam ahaṃ nādya paśyāmi draṣṭum icchann ihāgataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.13a: pitur grahīṣye caraṇau taṃ mamākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.13c: taṃ pratyuvāca kaikeyī priyavad ghoram apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.14b: yā gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ te pitā gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.15a: tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ dharmābhijanavāñ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.17a: etat suruciraṃ bhāti pitur me śayanaṃ purā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.17b: tad idaṃ na vibhāty adya vihīnaṃ tena dhīmatā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.18a: tam ārtaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣya patitaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.19b: tvadvidhā na hi śocanti santaḥ sadasi saṃmatāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.20a: sa ruditvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmau viparivṛtya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.21a: abhiṣekṣyati rāmaṃ tu rājā yajñaṃ nu yakṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.21b: ity ahaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpo hṛṣṭo yātrām ayāsiṣam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.22a: tad idaṃ hy anyathā bhūtaṃ vyavadīrṇaṃ mano mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.22b: pitaraṃ yo na paśyāmi nityaṃ priyahite ratam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.23a: amba kenātyagād rājā vyādhinā mayy anāgate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.23b: dhanyā rāmādayaḥ sarve yaiḥ pitā saṃskṛtaḥ svayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.24a: na nūnaṃ māṃ mahārājaḥ prāptaṃ jānāti kīrtimān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.24b: upajighreddhi māṃ mūrdhni tātaḥ saṃnamya satvaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.25b: yena māṃ rajasā dhvastam abhīkṣṇaṃ parimārjati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.26a: yo me bhrātā pitā bandhur yasya dāso 'smi dhīmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.27a: pitā hi bhavati jyeṣṭho dharmam āryasya jānataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.27b: tasya pādau grahīṣyāmi sa hīdānīṃ gatir mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.28a: ārye kim abravīd rājā pitā me satyavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.28c: iti pṛṣṭā yathātattvaṃ kaikeyī vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.29a: rāmeti rājā vilapan hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.29b: sa mahātmā paraṃ lokaṃ gato gatimatāṃ varaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.30a: imāṃ tu paścimāṃ vācaṃ vyājahāra pitā tava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.31a: siddhārthās tu narā rāmam āgataṃ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.31b: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.33b: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca samaṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.35a: sa hi rājasutaḥ putra cīravāsā mahāvanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.36a: tac chrutvā bharatas trasto bhrātuś cāritraśaṅkayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.37a: kaccin na brāhmaṇadhanaṃ hṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasyacit /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.37b: kaccin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.39a: athāsya capalā mātā tat svakarma yathātatham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.40a: kaścin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.40b: na rāmaḥ paradārāṃś ca cakṣurbhyām api paśyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.41b: yācitas te pitā rājyaṃ rāmasya ca vivāsanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.42a: sa svavṛttiṃ samāsthāya pitā te tat tathākarot /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.42b: rāmaś ca sahasaumitriḥ preṣitaḥ saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.43a: tam apaśyan priyaṃ putraṃ mahīpālo mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.44a: tvayā tv idānīṃ dharmajña rājatvam avalambyatām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.44b: tvatkṛte hi mayā sarvam idam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.45a: tat putra śīghraṃ vidhinā vidhijñair vasiṣṭhamukhyaiḥ sahito dvijendraiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_66.45b: saṃkālya rājānam adīnasattvam ātmānam urvyām abhiṣecayasva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.1a: śrutvā tu pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ bhrātarau ca vivāsitau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.2a: kiṃ nu kāryaṃ hatasyeha mama rājyena śocataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.2b: vihīnasyātha pitrā ca bhrātrā pitṛsamena ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.3a: duḥkhe me duḥkham akaror vraṇe kṣāram ivādadhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.3b: rājānaṃ pretabhāvasthaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ ca tāpasam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.4b: aṅgāram upagūhya sma pitā me nāvabuddhavān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.5b: duṣkaraṃ yadi jīvetāṃ prāpya tvāṃ jananīṃ mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.6a: nanu tv āryo 'pi dharmātmā tvayi vṛttim anuttamām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.7a: tathā jyeṣṭhā hi me mātā kausalyā dīrghadarśinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.7b: tvayi dharmaṃ samāsthāya bhaginyām iva vartate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.8b: prasthāpya vanavāsāya kathaṃ pāpe na śocasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.9b: pravrājya cīravasanaṃ kiṃ nu paśyasi kāraṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.10a: lubdhāyā vidito manye na te 'haṃ rāghavaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.10b: tathā hy anartho rājyārthaṃ tvayā nīto mahān ayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.12a: taṃ hi nityaṃ mahārājo balavantaṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.13b: damyo dhuram ivāsādya saheyaṃ kena caujasā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.13c: atha vā me bhavec chaktir yogair buddhibalena vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.14a: sakāmāṃ na kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ putragardhinīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.14c: ity evam uktvā bharato mahātmā priyetarair vākyagaṇais tudaṃs tām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_67.14d: śokāturaś cāpi nanāda bhūyaḥ siṃho yathā parvatagahvarasthaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.1a: tāṃ tathā garhayitvā tu mātaraṃ bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.2b: parityaktā ca dharmeṇa mā mṛtaṃ rudatī bhava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.3a: kiṃ nu te 'dūṣayad rājā rāmo vā bhṛśadhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.3b: yayor mṛtyur vivāsaś ca tvatkṛte tulyam āgatau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.4b: kaikeyi narakaṃ gaccha mā ca bhartuḥ salokatām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.5a: yat tvayā hīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoreṇa karmaṇā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.6a: tvatkṛte me pitā vṛtto rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.8a: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā mama mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.9a: na tvam aśvapateḥ kanyā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.10a: yat tvayā dhārmiko rāmo nityaṃ satyaparāyaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.10b: vanaṃ prasthāpito duḥkhāt pitā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.11a: yatpradhānāsi tat pāpaṃ mayi pitrā vinākṛte /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.12b: kṛtvā kaṃ prāpsyase tv adya lokaṃ nirayagāminī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.14b: tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvān na tu bāndhavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.16a: tāv ardhadivase śrāntau dṛṣṭvā putrau mahītale /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.19a: bhayaṃ kaccin na cāsmāsu kutaścid vidyate mahat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.20a: evam uktā tu surabhiḥ surarājena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.21a: śāntaṃ pāpaṃ na vaḥ kiṃcit kutaścid amarādhipa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.21b: ahaṃ tu magnau śocāmi svaputrau viṣame sthitau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.23a: mama kāyāt prasūtau hi duḥkhitau bhārapīḍitau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.23b: yau dṛṣṭvā paritapye 'haṃ nāsti putrasamaḥ priyaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.24b: kiṃ punar yā vinā rāmaṃ kausalyā vartayiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.25a: ekaputrā ca sādhvī ca vivatseyaṃ tvayā kṛtā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.25b: tasmāt tvaṃ satataṃ duḥkhaṃ pretya ceha ca lapsyase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.26a: ahaṃ hy apacitiṃ bhrātuḥ pituś ca sakalām imām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.26b: vardhanaṃ yaśasaś cāpi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.28b: papāta bhuvi saṃkruddho niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_68.28d: babhūva bhūmau patito nṛpātmajaḥ śacīpateḥ ketur ivotsavakṣaye //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.1b: kausalyā śabdam ājñāya sumitrām idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.2b: tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi bharataṃ dīrghadarśinam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.3a: evam uktvā sumitrāṃ sā vivarṇā malināmbarā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.4a: sa tu rāmānujaś cāpi śatrughnasahitas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.6a: idaṃ te rājyakāmasya rājyaṃ prāptam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.6b: samprāptaṃ bata kaikeyyā śīghraṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.7b: kaikeyī kaṃ guṇaṃ tatra paśyati krūradarśinī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.8a: kṣipraṃ mām api kaikeyī prasthāpayitum arhati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.9a: atha vā svayam evāhaṃ sumitrānucarā sukham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.10a: kāmaṃ vā svayam evādya tatra māṃ netum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.10b: yatrāsau puruṣavyāghras tapyate me tapaḥ sutaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.12a: evaṃ vilapamānāṃ tāṃ bharataḥ prāñjalis tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.13a: ārye kasmād ajānantaṃ garhase mām akilbiṣam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.13b: vipulāṃ ca mama prītiṃ sthirāṃ jānāsi rāghave // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.14a: kṛtā śāstrānugā buddhir mā bhūt tasya kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.15a: praiṣyaṃ pāpīyasāṃ yātu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.15b: hantu pādena gāṃ suptāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.16a: kārayitvā mahat karma bhartā bhṛtyam anarthakam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.16b: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syās tu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.17b: tatas tu druhyatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.19a: saṃśrutya ca tapasvibhyaḥ sattre vai yajñadakṣiṇām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.20b: mā sma kārṣīt satāṃ dharmaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.22a: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ chāgaṃ vṛthā so 'śnātu nirghṛṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.23a: putrair dāraiś ca bhṛtyaiś ca svagṛhe parivāritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.23b: sa eko mṛṣṭam aśnātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.24b: bhṛtyatyāge ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.25a: ubhe saṃdhye śayānasya yat pāpaṃ parikalpyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.25b: tac ca pāpaṃ bhavet tasya yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.26a: yad agnidāyake pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ gurutalpage /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.26b: mitradrohe ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.27a: devatānāṃ pitḥṇāṃ ca mātāpitros tathaiva ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.27b: mā sma kārṣīt sa śuśrūṣāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.28a: satāṃ lokāt satāṃ kīrtyāḥ sajjuṣṭāt karmaṇas tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.29b: evam āśvāsayann eva duḥkhārto nipapāta ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.30a: tathā tu śapathaiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ śapamānam acetanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.31a: mama duḥkham idaṃ putra bhūyaḥ samupajāyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.31b: śapathaiḥ śapamāno hi prāṇān uparuṇatsi me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.32a: diṣṭyā na calito dharmād ātmā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.32b: vatsa satyapratijño me satāṃ lokān avāpsyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.33b: mohāc ca śokasaṃrodhād babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_69.33d: muhur muhur niḥśvasataś ca dīrghaṃ sā tasya śokena jagāma rātriḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.1b: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.2a: alaṃ śokena bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.3a: vasiṣṭhasya vacaḥ śrutvā bharato dhāraṇāṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.4a: uddhṛtaṃ tailasaṃkledāt sa tu bhūmau niveśitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.6a: kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan proṣite mayy anāgate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.6b: vivāsya rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.7a: kva yāsyasi mahārāja hitvemaṃ duḥkhitaṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.8a: yogakṣemaṃ tu te rājan ko 'smin kalpayitā pure /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.8b: tvayi prayāte svas tāta rāme ca vanam āśrite // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.9a: vidhavā pṛthivī rājaṃs tvayā hīnā na rājate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.10b: abravīd vacanaṃ bhūyo vasiṣṭhas tu mahān ṛṣiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.13a: ye tv agrato narendrasya agnyagārād bahiṣkṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.13b: ṛtvigbhir yājakaiś caiva te hriyante yathāvidhi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.15a: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.15b: prakiranto janā mārgaṃ nṛpater agrato yayuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.17a: gandhān uccāvacāṃś cānyāṃs tatra dattvātha bhūmipam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.18a: tathā hutāśanaṃ hutvā jepus tasya tadartvijaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.18b: jaguś ca te yathāśāstraṃ tatra sāmāni sāmagāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.19a: śibikābhiś ca yānaiś ca yathārhaṃ tasya yoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.19b: nagarān niryayus tatra vṛddhaiḥ parivṛtās tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.20a: prasavyaṃ cāpi taṃ cakrur ṛtvijo 'gnicitaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.21a: krauñcīnām iva nārīṇāṃ ninādas tatra śuśruve /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.22a: tato rudantyo vivaśā vilapya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.22c: kṛtodakaṃ te bharatena sārdhaṃ nṛpāṅganā mantripurohitāś ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_70.22d: puraṃ praviśyāśruparītanetrā bhūmau daśāhaṃ vyanayanta duḥkham //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.2a: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau ratnaṃ dhanam annaṃ ca puṣkalam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.2b: bāstikaṃ bahuśuklaṃ ca gāś cāpi śataśas tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.3a: dāsīdāsaṃ ca yānaṃ ca veśmāni sumahānti ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.5b: citāmūle pitur vākyam idam āha suduḥkhitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.6a: tāta yasmin nisṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayā bhrātari rāghave /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.6b: tasmin vanaṃ pravrajite śūnye tyakto 'smy ahaṃ tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.7b: tām ambāṃ tāta kausalyāṃ tyaktvā tvaṃ kva gato nṛpa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.9a: sa tu dṛṣṭvā rudan dīnaḥ papāta dharaṇītale /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.12b: smṛtvā pitur guṇāṅgāni tāni tāni tadā tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.14a: sukumāraṃ ca bālaṃ ca satataṃ lālitaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.14b: kva tāta bharataṃ hitvā vilapantaṃ gato bhavān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.15a: nanu bhojyeṣu pāneṣu vastreṣv ābharaṇeṣu ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.15b: pravārayasi naḥ sarvāṃs tan naḥ ko 'dya kariṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.16b: vihīnā yā tvayā rājñā dharmajñena mahātmanā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.17a: pitari svargam āpanne rāme cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.18a: hīno bhrātrā ca pitrā ca śūnyām ikṣvākupālitām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.19a: tayor vilapitaṃ śrutvā vyasanaṃ cānvavekṣya tat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.20a: tato viṣaṇṇau śrāntau ca śatrughnabharatāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.21a: tataḥ prakṛtimān vaidyaḥ pitur eṣāṃ purohitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.21b: vasiṣṭho bharataṃ vākyam utthāpya tam uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_71.25b: amātyās tvarayanti sma tanayau cāparāḥ kriyāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.2a: gatir yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ duḥkhe kiṃ punar ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.2b: sa rāmaḥ sattvasampannaḥ striyā pravrājito vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.3a: balavān vīryasampanno lakṣmaṇo nāma yo 'py asau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.3b: kiṃ na mocayate rāmaṃ kṛtvāpi pitṛnigraham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.4a: pūrvam eva tu nigrāhyaḥ samavekṣya nayānayau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.4b: utpathaṃ yaḥ samārūḍho nāryā rājā vaśaṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.7a: tāṃ samīkṣya tadā dvāḥstho bhṛśaṃ pāpasya kāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.8a: yasyāḥ kṛte vane rāmo nyastadehaś ca vaḥ pitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.8b: seyaṃ pāpā nṛśaṃsā ca tasyāḥ kuru yathāmati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.9a: śatrughnaś ca tad ājñāya vacanaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.10a: tīvram utpāditaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhrātḥṇāṃ me tathā pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.10b: yayā seyaṃ nṛśaṃsasya karmaṇaḥ phalam aśnutām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.11b: gṛhītā balavat kubjā sā tadgṛham anādayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.14a: sānukrośāṃ vadānyāṃ ca dharmajñāṃ ca yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.14b: kausalyāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmaḥ sā hi no 'stu dhruvā gatiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.15a: sa ca roṣeṇa tāmrākṣaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.16a: tasyā hy ākṛṣyamāṇāyā mantharāyās tatas tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.16b: citraṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tad vyaśīryata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.17b: aśobhata tadā bhūyaḥ śāradaṃ gaganaṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.18a: sa balī balavat krodhād gṛhītvā puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.19a: tair vākyaiḥ paruṣair duḥkhaiḥ kaikeyī bhṛśaduḥkhitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.20a: tāṃ prekṣya bharataḥ kruddhaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.21a: hanyām aham imāṃ pāpāṃ kaikeyīṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.21b: yadi māṃ dhārmiko rāmo nāsūyen mātṛghātakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.22a: imām api hatāṃ kubjāṃ yadi jānāti rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.22b: tvāṃ ca māṃ caiva dharmātmā nābhibhāṣiṣyate dhruvam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.23b: nyavartata tato roṣāt tāṃ mumoca ca mantharām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.24a: sā pādamūle kaikeyyā mantharā nipapāta ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_72.24d: śanaiḥ samāśvāsayad ārtarūpāṃ krauñcīṃ vilagnām iva vīkṣamāṇām //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.2a: gato daśarathaḥ svargaṃ yo no gurutaro guruḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.2b: rāmaṃ pravrājya vai jyeṣṭhaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.3a: tvam adya bhava no rājā rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.4b: pratīkṣate tvāṃ svajanaḥ śreṇayaś ca nṛpātmaja // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.6b: bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.7a: jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.7b: naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.8a: rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.8b: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.9b: ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.11b: āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.12a: na sakāmāṃ kariṣyāmi svām imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.12b: vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.13a: kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.15a: evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.15b: yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.15c: anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.15d: praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo nipetur āryānananetrasambhavāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_73.15e: ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_74: panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ Rāmāyaṇa, Ayodhyākāṇḍa, 74
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.3b: samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.4a: sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.6a: latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.6b: janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.7a: avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu kecid vṛkṣān aropayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.7b: kecit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kvacit kvacit // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.8b: vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.9b: nimnabhāgāṃs tathā kecit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.10a: babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.10b: bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.15a: yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.20c: sacandratārāgaṇamaṇḍitaṃ yathā nabhaḥ kṣapāyām amalaṃ virājate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_74.20d: narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.2b: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.3a: sa tūryaghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva /
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.4a: tataḥ prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.4b: nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.5b: visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.7a: ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.7b: kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.11b: kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.12b: rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_75.14b: daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.3a: rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.3b: idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.4a: tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.5a: rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.5b: nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.6a: pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.7a: udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.10b: dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.11b: rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.12b: labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.13a: anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.14a: yaddhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.15a: rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.15b: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.16a: tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.17a: yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.17b: vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.19a: evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.20a: tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.20b: yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.21a: evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.21b: prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.22a: tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.23a: tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartḥn sarvān gṛhe gṛhe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.24a: te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.24b: saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.25a: sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.26c: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.26d: guruṃ mahāraṇyagataṃ yaśasvinaṃ prasādayiṣyan bharato 'bravīt tadā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.26e: tūrṇaṃ samutthāya sumantra gaccha balasya yogāya balapradhānān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.26f: ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.26g: sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.26h: śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca //
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.26i: tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_76.26j: ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca nāgān hayāṃś caiva kulaprasūtān //
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.6a: kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.7b: tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.9a: dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.9b: tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.10a: ity evaṃ kathayantas te samprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.11a: ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.11b: rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.12a: maṇikārāś ca ye kecit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.15b: śailūṣāś ca saha strībhir yānti kaivartakās tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.17b: sarve te vividhair yānaiḥ śanair bharatam anvayuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.19a: nirīkṣyānugatāṃ senāṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ śivodakām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.21a: dātuṃ ca tāvad icchāmi svar gatasya mahīpateḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.22b: nyaveśayaṃs tāṃś chandena svena svena pṛthakpṛthak // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.22c: niveśya gaṅgām anu tāṃ mahānadīṃ camūṃ vidhānaiḥ paribarhaśobhinīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_77.22d: uvāsa rāmasya tadā mahātmano vicintayāno bharato nivartanam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.1a: tato niviṣṭāṃ dhvajinīṃ gaṅgām anvāśritāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.3a: sa eṣa hi mahākāyaḥ kovidāradhvajo rathe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.3b: bandhayiṣyati vā dāśān atha vāsmān vadhiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.4a: atha dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ pitrā rājyād vivāsitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.5a: bhartā caiva sakhā caiva rāmo dāśarathir mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.6a: tiṣṭhantu sarvadāśāś ca gaṅgām anvāśritā nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.7a: nāvāṃ śatānāṃ pañcānāṃ kaivartānāṃ śataṃ śatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.7b: saṃnaddhānāṃ tathā yūnāṃ tiṣṭhantv ity abhyacodayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.8a: yadā tuṣṭas tu bharato rāmasyeha bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.8b: seyaṃ svastimayī senā gaṅgām adya tariṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.10a: tam āyāntaṃ tu samprekṣya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.11b: kuśalo daṇḍakāraṇye vṛddho bhrātuś ca te sakhā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.12a: tasmāt paśyatu kākutstha tvāṃ niṣādādhipo guhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.13a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sumantrād bharataḥ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.13b: uvāca vacanaṃ śīghraṃ guhaḥ paśyatu mām iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.14b: āgamya bharataṃ prahvo guho vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.15a: niṣkuṭaś caiva deśo 'yaṃ vañcitāś cāpi te vayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.15b: nivedayāmas te sarve svake dāśakule vasa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.16a: asti mūlaṃ phalaṃ caiva niṣādaiḥ samupāhṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.16b: ārdraṃ ca māṃsaṃ śuṣkaṃ ca vanyaṃ coccāvacaṃ mahat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_78.17b: arcito vividhaiḥ kāmaiḥ śvaḥ sasainyo gamiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.1a: evam uktas tu bharato niṣādādhipatiṃ guham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.2a: ūrjitaḥ khalu te kāmaḥ kṛto mama guroḥ sakhe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.2b: yo me tvam īdṛśīṃ senām eko 'bhyarcitum icchasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.3a: ity uktvā tu mahātejā guhaṃ vacanam uttamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.7b: iyaṃ te mahatī senā śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.8a: tam evam abhibhāṣantam ākāśa iva nirmalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.8b: bharataḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.9a: mā bhūt sa kālo yat kaṣṭaṃ na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.9b: rāghavaḥ sa hi me bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.10b: buddhir anyā na te kāryā guha satyaṃ bravīmi te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.11b: punar evābravīd vākyaṃ bharataṃ prati harṣitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.12a: dhanyas tvaṃ na tvayā tulyaṃ paśyāmi jagatītale /
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.12b: ayatnād āgataṃ rājyaṃ yas tvaṃ tyaktum ihecchasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.13a: śāśvatī khalu te kīrtir lokān anucariṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.13b: yas tvaṃ kṛcchragataṃ rāmaṃ pratyānayitum icchasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.15a: saṃniveśya sa tāṃ senāṃ guhena paritoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.15b: śatrughnena saha śrīmāñ śayanaṃ punar āgamat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.20c: guhena sārdhaṃ bharataḥ samāgato mahānubhāvaḥ sajanaḥ samāhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_79.20d: sudurmanās taṃ bharataṃ tadā punar guhaḥ samāśvāsayad agrajaṃ prati //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.3a: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.4a: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvo duḥkhānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.5a: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.5b: motsuko bhūr bravīmy etad apy asatyaṃ tavāgrataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.6a: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.6b: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.7a: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.7b: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvaiḥ svair jñātibhiḥ saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.8a: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.8b: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ prasahema vayaṃ yudhi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.10a: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.10b: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.11a: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.11b: taṃ paśya guha saṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.12a: mahatā tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.13a: asmin pravrājite rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.13b: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.15a: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.15b: nāśaṃse yadi te sarve jīveyuḥ śarvarīm imām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.16a: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.16b: duḥkhitā yā tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.17b: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.18a: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.22b: nivṛtte samaye hy asmin sukhitāḥ praviśemahi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.24a: prabhāte vimale sūrye kārayitvā jaṭā ubhau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_80.24d: vareṣucāpāsidharau paraṃtapau vyavekṣamāṇau saha sītayā gatau //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.1a: guhasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharato bhṛśam apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.1b: dhyānaṃ jagāma tatraiva yatra tac chrutam apriyam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.3b: papāta sahasā totrair hṛdi viddha iva dvipaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.5a: tataḥ sarvāḥ samāpetur mātaro bharatasya tāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.6a: tāś ca taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyaḥ paryavārayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.7a: vatsalā svaṃ yathā vatsam upagūhya tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.8a: putra vyādhir na te kaccic charīraṃ paribādhate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.9a: tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā putra jīvāmi rāme sabhrātṛke gate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.9b: vṛtte daśarathe rājñi nātha ekas tvam adya naḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.10a: kaccin na lakṣmaṇe putra śrutaṃ te kiṃcid apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.10b: putra vā hy ekaputrāyāḥ sahabhārye vanaṃ gate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.11a: sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya rudann eva mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.12a: bhrātā me kvāvasad rātriṃ kva sītā kva ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.12b: asvapac chayane kasmin kiṃ bhuktvā guha śaṃsa me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.14a: annam uccāvacaṃ bhakṣāḥ phalāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.15b: na hi tat pratyagṛhṇāt sa kṣatradharmam anusmaran // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.16a: na hy asmābhiḥ pratigrāhyaṃ sakhe deyaṃ tu sarvadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.16b: iti tena vayaṃ rājann anunītā mahātmanā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.18a: tatas tu jalaśeṣeṇa lakṣmaṇo 'py akarot tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.18b: vāgyatās te trayaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata samāhitāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.19a: saumitris tu tataḥ paścād akarot svāstaraṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.20a: tasmin samāviśad rāmaḥ svāstare saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.20b: prakṣālya ca tayoḥ pādāv apacakrāma lakṣmaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.21a: etat tad iṅgudīmūlam idam eva ca tat tṛṇam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.21b: yasmin rāmaś ca sītā ca rātriṃ tāṃ śayitāv ubhau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.21c: niyamya pṛṣṭhe tu talāṅgulitravāñ śaraiḥ supūrṇāv iṣudhī paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.21d: mahad dhanuḥ sajyam upohya lakṣmaṇo niśām atiṣṭhat parito 'sya kevalam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.21e: tatas tv ahaṃ cottamabāṇacāpadhṛk sthito 'bhavaṃ tatra sa yatra lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02su:ram_81.21f: atandribhir jñātibhir āttakārmukair mahendrakalpaṃ paripālayaṃs tadā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.1a: tac chrutvā nipuṇaṃ sarvaṃ bharataḥ saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.2a: abravīj jananīḥ sarvā iha tena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.2b: śarvarī śayitā bhūmāv idam asya vimarditam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.3b: jāto daśarathenorvyāṃ na rāmaḥ svaptum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.9a: aśraddheyam idaṃ loke na satyaṃ pratibhāti mā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.9b: muhyate khalu me bhāvaḥ svapno 'yam iti me matiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.10a: na nūnaṃ daivataṃ kiṃcit kālena balavattaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.10b: yatra dāśarathī rāmo bhūmāv evaṃ śayīta saḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.11b: dayitā śayitā bhūmau snuṣā daśarathasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.12a: iyaṃ śayyā mama bhrātur idaṃ hi parivartitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.12b: sthaṇḍile kaṭhine sarvaṃ gātrair vimṛditaṃ tṛṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.13a: manye sābharaṇā suptā sītāsmiñ śayane tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.13b: tatra tatra hi dṛśyante saktāḥ kanakabindavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.14b: tathā hy ete prakāśante saktāḥ kauśeyatantavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.15a: manye bhartuḥ sukhā śayyā yena bālā tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.15b: sukumārī satī duḥkhaṃ na vijānāti maithilī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.17b: sukhabhāgī ca duḥkhārhaḥ śayito bhuvi rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.18a: siddhārthā khalu vaidehī patiṃ yānugatā vanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.18b: vayaṃ saṃśayitāḥ sarve hīnās tena mahātmanā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.19b: gate daśarathe svarge rāme cāraṇyam āśrite // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.20a: na ca prārthayate kaścin manasāpi vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.23a: adya prabhṛti bhūmau tu śayiṣye 'haṃ tṛṇeṣu vā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.24a: tasyārtham uttaraṃ kālaṃ nivatsyāmi sukhaṃ vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.24b: taṃ pratiśravam āmucya nāsya mithyā bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.26b: api me devatāḥ kuryur imaṃ satyaṃ manoratham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.26c: prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mayā svayaṃ bahuprakāraṃ yadi na prapatsyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_82.26d: tato 'nuvatsyāmi cirāya rāghavaṃ vane vasan nārhati mām upekṣitum //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.1a: vyuṣya rātriṃ tu tatraiva gaṅgākūle sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.1b: bharataḥ kālyam utthāya śatrughnam idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.2b: śīghram ānaya bhadraṃ te tārayiṣyati vāhinīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.3b: ity evam abravīd bhrātrā śatrughno 'pi pracoditaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.4b: āgamya prāñjaliḥ kāle guho bharatam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.5b: kaccic ca saha sainyasya tava sarvam anāmayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.6a: guhasya tat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād udīritam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.7a: sukhā naḥ śarvarī rājan pūjitāś cāpi te vayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.7b: gaṅgāṃ tu naubhir bahvībhir dāśāḥ saṃtārayantu naḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.9a: uttiṣṭhata prabudhyadhvaṃ bhadram astu hi vaḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.10b: pañca nāvāṃ śatāny eva samāninyuḥ samantataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.13a: tām āruroha bharataḥ śatrughnaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.13b: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.14a: purohitaś ca tat pūrvaṃ gurave brāhmaṇāś ca ye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.16a: patākinyas tu tā nāvaḥ svayaṃ dāśair adhiṣṭhitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.16b: vahantyo janam ārūḍhaṃ tadā saṃpetur āśugāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.17a: nārīṇām abhipūrṇās tu kāścit kāścit tu vājinām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.17b: kaścit tatra vahanti sma yānayugyaṃ mahādhanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.18a: tāḥ sma gatvā paraṃ tīram avaropya ca taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.19b: tarantaḥ sma prakāśante sadhvajā iva parvatāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.20a: nāvaś cāruruhus tv anye plavais terus tathāpare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.20b: anye kumbhaghaṭais terur anye teruś ca bāhubhiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.21a: sā puṇyā dhvajinī gaṅgāṃ dāśaiḥ saṃtāritā svayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.21c: āśvāsayitvā ca camūṃ mahātmā niveśayitvā ca yathopajoṣam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_83.21d: draṣṭuṃ bharadvājam ṛṣipravaryam ṛtvigvṛtaḥ san bharataḥ pratasthe //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.1b: balaṃ sarvam avasthāpya jagāma saha mantribhiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.4b: saṃcacālāsanāt tūrṇaṃ śiṣyān arghyam iti bruvan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.6a: tābhyām arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca dattvā paścāt phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.6b: ānupūrvyāc ca dharmajñaḥ papraccha kuśalaṃ kule // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.7a: ayodhyāyāṃ bale kośe mitreṣv api ca mantriṣu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.7b: jānan daśarathaṃ vṛttaṃ na rājānam udāharat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.10a: kim ihāgamane kāryaṃ tava rājyaṃ praśāsataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.10b: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.11b: bhrātrā saha sabhāryo yaś ciraṃ pravrājito vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.13a: kaccin na tasyāpāpasya pāpaṃ kartum ihecchasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.14a: evam ukto bharadvājaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.15a: hato 'smi yadi mām evaṃ bhagavān api manyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.15b: matto na doṣam āśaṅker naivaṃ mām anuśādhi hi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.16a: na caitad iṣṭaṃ mātā me yad avocan madantare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.16b: nāham etena tuṣṭaś ca na tad vacanam ādade // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.17a: ahaṃ tu taṃ naravyāghram upayātaḥ prasādakaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.18a: tvaṃ mām evaṃ gataṃ matvā prasādaṃ kartum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.18b: śaṃsa me bhagavan rāmaḥ kva samprati mahīpatiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.18c: uvāca taṃ bharadvājaḥ prasādād bharataṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.20a: jāne caitan manaḥsthaṃ te dṛḍhīkaraṇam astv iti /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.20c: asau vasati te bhrātā citrakūṭe mahāgirau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.21a: śvas tu gantāsi taṃ deśaṃ vasādya saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.21b: etaṃ me kuru suprājña kāmaṃ kāmārthakovida // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.21c: tatas tathety evam udāradarśanaḥ pratītarūpo bharato 'bravīd vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_84.21d: cakāra buddhiṃ ca tadā mahāśrame niśānivāsāya narādhipātmajaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.1a: kṛtabuddhiṃ nivāsāya tathaiva sa munis tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.2a: abravīd bharatas tv enaṃ nanv idaṃ bhavatā kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.2b: pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ vane yad upapadyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.3b: jāne tvāṃ prītisaṃyuktaṃ tuṣyes tvaṃ yena kenacit // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.4a: senāyās tu tavaitasyāḥ kartum icchāmi bhojanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.4b: mama prītir yathārūpā tvam arho manujarṣabha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.5a: kimarthaṃ cāpi nikṣipya dūre balam ihāgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.7a: vājimukhyā manuṣyāś ca mattāś ca varavāraṇāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.7b: pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmiṃ bhagavann anuyānti mām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.8a: te vṛkṣān udakaṃ bhūmim āśrameṣūṭajāṃs tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.8b: na hiṃsyur iti tenāham eka evāgatas tataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.9b: tathā tu cakre bharataḥ senāyāḥ samupāgamam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.11a: āhvaye viśvakarmāṇam ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.11b: ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi tatra me saṃvidhīyatām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.12a: prāksrotasaś ca yā nadyaḥ pratyaksrotasa eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.12b: pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca samāyāntv adya sarvaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.13a: anyāḥ sravantu maireyaṃ surām anyāḥ suniṣṭhitām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.15a: śakraṃ yāś copatiṣṭhanti brahmāṇaṃ yāś ca bhāminīḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.16a: vanaṃ kuruṣu yad divyaṃ vāso bhūṣaṇapattravat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.16b: divyanārīphalaṃ śaśvat tat kauberam ihaiva tu // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.17a: iha me bhagavān somo vidhattām annam uttamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.17b: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.18b: surādīni ca peyāni māṃsāni vividhāni ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.21b: upaspṛśya vavau yuktyā supriyātmā sukhaḥ śivaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.24a: sa śabdo dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca prāṇināṃ śravaṇāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.25a: tasminn uparate śabde divye śrotrasukhe nṛṇām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.26a: babhūva hi samā bhūmiḥ samantāt pañcayojanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.27a: tasmin bilvāḥ kapitthāś ca panasā bījapūrakāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.27b: āmalakyo babhūvuś ca cūtāś ca phalabhūṣaṇāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.28b: ājagāma nadī divyā tīrajair bahubhir vṛtā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.34a: anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.34b: babhūvuś ca mudā yuktās taṃ dṛṣṭvā veśmasaṃvidhim // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.35a: tatra rājāsanaṃ divyaṃ vyajanaṃ chattram eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.37b: tataḥ senāpatiḥ paścāt praśāstā ca niṣedatuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.39b: ramyāś cāvasathā divyā brahmaṇas tu prasādajāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.42a: yābhir gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.45a: yāni mālyāni deveṣu yāni caitrarathe vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.47b: prahṛṣṭās tatra saṃpetuḥ kubjā bhūtvātha vāmanāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.48a: śiṃśapāmalakī jambūr yāś cānyāḥ kānane latāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.49a: surāṃ surāpāḥ pibata pāyasaṃ ca bubhukṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.49b: māṃsāni ca sumedhyāni bhakṣyantāṃ yāvad icchatha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.50b: apy ekam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ pramadāḥ sapta cāṣṭa ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.51c: hayān gajān kharān uṣṭrāṃs tathaiva surabheḥ sutān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.52a: ikṣūṃś ca madhujālāṃś ca bhojayanti sma vāhanān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.56b: anāthās taṃ vidhiṃ labdhvā vācam etām udairayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.57a: samprahṛṣṭā vinedus te narās tatra sahasraśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.58a: tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣāṃ tad annam amṛtopamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.58b: divyān udvīkṣya bhakṣyāṃs tān abhavad bhakṣaṇe matiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.59a: preṣyāś ceṭyaś ca vadhvaś ca balasthāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.59b: babhūvus te bhṛśaṃ tṛptāḥ sarve cāhatavāsasaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.60a: kuñjarāś ca kharoṣṭraś ca go'śvāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.60b: babhūvuḥ subhṛtās tatra nānyo hy anyam akalpayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.61b: rajasā dhvastakeśo vā naraḥ kaścid adṛśyata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.63b: dadṛśur vismitās tatra narā lauhīḥ sahasraśaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.64b: tāś ca kāmadughā gāvo drumāś cāsan madhuścyutaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.66a: sthālyaḥ kumbhyaḥ karambhyaś ca dadhipūrṇāḥ susaṃskṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.67a: hradāḥ pūrṇā rasālasya dadhnaḥ śvetasya cāpare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.68a: kalkāṃś cūrṇakaṣāyāṃś ca snānāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.70a: darpaṇān parimṛṣṭāṃś ca vāsasāṃ cāpi saṃcayān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.71a: āñjanīḥ kaṅkatān kūrcāṃś chattrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.73b: nirvāpārthaṃ paśūnāṃ te dadṛśus tatra sarvaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.74a: vyasmayanta manuṣyās te svapnakalpaṃ tad adbhutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.75a: ity evaṃ ramamāṇānāṃ devānām iva nandane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.76a: pratijagmuś ca tā nadyo gandharvāś ca yathāgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.76b: bharadvājam anujñāpya tāś ca sarvā varāṅganāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.76c: tathaiva mattā madirotkaṭā narās tathaiva divyāgurucandanokṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_85.76d: tathaiva divyā vividhāḥ sraguttamāḥ pṛthakprakīrṇā manujaiḥ pramarditāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.1a: tatas tāṃ rajanīm uṣya bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.2a: tam ṛṣiḥ puruṣavyāghraṃ prekṣya prāñjalim āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.3a: kaccid atra sukhā rātris tavāsmadviṣaye gatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.3b: samagras te janaḥ kaccid ātithye śaṃsa me 'nagha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.5b: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmaiś ca sāmātyo balavat tvayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.6b: api preṣyān upādāya sarve sma susukhoṣitāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.8b: ācakṣva katamo mārgaḥ kiyān iti ca śaṃsa me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.11a: uttaraṃ pārśvam āsādya tasya mandākinī nadī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.12a: anantaraṃ tat saritaś citrakūṭaś ca parvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.12b: tayoḥ parṇakuṭī tāta tatra tau vasato dhruvam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.14a: prayāṇam iti ca śrutvā rājarājasya yoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.15a: vepamānā kṛśā dīnā saha devyā sumitrayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.15b: kausalyā tatra jagrāha karābhyāṃ caraṇau muneḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.18b: viśeṣaṃ jñātum icchāmi mātḥṇāṃ tava rāghava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.19a: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.20b: pitur hi mahiṣīṃ devīṃ devatām iva paśyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.21b: kausalyā suṣuve rāmaṃ dhātāram aditir yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.22a: asyā vāmabhujaṃ śliṣṭā yaiṣā tiṣṭhati durmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.23a: etasyās tau sutau devyāḥ kumārau devavarṇinau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.24a: yasyāḥ kṛte naravyāghrau jīvanāśam ito gatau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.24b: rājā putravihīnaś ca svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.25b: yatomūlaṃ hi paśyāmi vyasanaṃ mahad ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.26b: sa niśaśvāsa tāmrākṣo nāgaḥ kruddha ivāsakṛt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.27a: bharadvājo maharṣis taṃ bruvantaṃ bharataṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.29a: abhivādya tu saṃsiddhaḥ kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.29b: āmantrya bharataḥ sainyaṃ yujyatām ity acodayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.32a: vividhāny api yānāni mahānti ca laghūni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_86.36b: mahad vanaṃ tat pravigāhamānā rarāja senā bharatasya tatra // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.2a: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca ruravaś ca samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.2b: dṛśyante vanarājīṣu giriṣv api nadīṣu ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.5b: anālakṣyā ciraṃ kālaṃ tasmin kāle babhūva bhūḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.6b: uvāca bharataḥ śrīmān vasiṣṭhaṃ mantriṇāṃ varam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.7a: yādṛśaṃ lakṣyate rūpaṃ yathā caiva śrutaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.7b: vyaktaṃ prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.8a: ayaṃ giriś citrakūṭas tathā mandākinī nadī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.11b: hayaiḥ samantād ākīrṇaṃ makarair iva sāgaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.15a: khurair udīrito reṇur divaṃ pracchādya tiṣṭhati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.15b: taṃ vahaty anilaḥ śīghraṃ kurvann iva mama priyam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.16b: etān saṃpatataḥ śīghraṃ paśya śatrughna kānane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.18a: atimātram ayaṃ deśo manojñaḥ pratibhāti mā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.19a: mṛgā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bahavaḥ pṛṣatā vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.20a: sādhu sainyāḥ pratiṣṭhantāṃ vicinvantu ca kānanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.21b: viviśus tad vanaṃ śūrā dhūmaṃ ca dadṛśus tataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.22a: te samālokya dhūmāgram ūcur bharatam āgatāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.22b: nāmanuṣye bhavaty agnir vyaktam atraiva rāghavau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.23b: anye rāmopamāḥ santi vyaktam atra tapasvinaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.24a: tac chrutvā bharatas teṣāṃ vacanaṃ sādhusaṃmatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.25a: yattā bhavantas tiṣṭhantu neto gantavyam agrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.25b: aham eva gamiṣyāmi sumantro gurur eva ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.26a: evam uktās tataḥ sarve tatra tasthuḥ samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.26b: bharato yatra dhūmāgraṃ tatra dṛṣṭiṃ samādadhāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.26c: vyavasthitā yā bharatena sā camūr nirīkṣamāṇāpi ca dhūmam agrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_87.26d: babhūva hṛṣṭā nacireṇa jānatī priyasya rāmasya samāgamaṃ tadā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.1b: vaidehyāḥ priyamākāṅkṣan svaṃ ca cittaṃ vilobhayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.3a: na rājyād bhraṃśanaṃ bhadre na suhṛdbhir vinābhavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.3b: mano me bādhate dṛṣṭvā ramaṇīyam imaṃ girim // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.10b: evamādibhir ākīrṇaḥ śriyaṃ puṣyaty ayaṃ giriḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.12a: śākhāvasaktān khaḍgāṃś ca pravarāṇy ambarāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.13a: jalaprapātair udbhedair nisyandaiś ca kvacit kvacit /
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.13b: sravadbhir bhāty ayaṃ śailaḥ sravan mada iva dvipaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.14b: ghrāṇatarpaṇam abhyetya kaṃ naraṃ na praharṣayet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.15b: lakṣmaṇena ca vatsyāmi na māṃ śokaḥ pradhakṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.16b: vicitraśikhare hy asmin ratavān asmi bhāmini // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.17b: pituś cānṛṇatā dharme bharatasya priyaṃ tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.18a: vaidehi ramase kaccic citrakūṭe mayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.19a: idam evāmṛtaṃ prāhū rājñāṃ rājarṣayaḥ pare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.25b: kāmibhir vanite paśya phalāni vividhāni ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.27a: imaṃ tu kālaṃ vanite vijahrivāṃs tvayā ca sīte saha lakṣmaṇena ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_88.27b: ratiṃ prapatsye kuladharmavardhinīṃ satāṃ pathi svair niyamaiḥ paraiḥ sthitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.6b: ṛṣayas tv avagāhante nadīṃ mandākinīṃ priye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.12b: adhikaṃ puravāsāc ca manye ca tava darśanāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.14a: sakhīvac ca vigāhasva sīte mandākinīm imām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.15a: tvaṃ paurajanavad vyālān ayodhyām iva parvatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.15b: manyasva vanite nityaṃ sarayūvad imāṃ nadīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.16b: tvaṃ cānukūlā vaidehi prītiṃ janayatho mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.17b: nāyodhyāyai na rājyāya spṛhaye 'dya tvayā saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.18a: imāṃ hi ramyāṃ gajayūthalolitāṃ nipītatoyāṃ gajasiṃhavānaraiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.18b: supuṣpitaiḥ puṣpadharair alaṃkṛtāṃ na so 'sti yaḥ syān na gatakramaḥ sukhī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.18c: itīva rāmo bahusaṃgataṃ vacaḥ priyāsahāyaḥ saritaṃ prati bruvan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_89.18d: cacāra ramyaṃ nayanāñjanaprabhaṃ sa citrakūṭaṃ raghuvaṃśavardhanaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.1b: sainyareṇuś ca śabdaś ca prādurāstāṃ nabhaḥspṛśau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.2a: etasminn antare trastāḥ śabdena mahatā tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.2b: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthā dudruvur diśaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.3a: sa taṃ sainyasamudbhūtaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrava rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.3b: tāṃś ca vipradrutān sarvān yūthapān anvavaikṣata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.4a: tāṃś ca vidravato dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca śrutvā sa niḥsvanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.5a: hanta lakṣmaṇa paśyeha sumitrā suprajās tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.5c: rājā vā rājamātro vā mṛgayām aṭate vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.6a: anyad vā śvāpadaṃ kiṃcit saumitre jñātum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.6b: sarvam etad yathātattvam acirāj jñātum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.7a: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ sālam āruhya puṣpitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.7b: prekṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ pūrvāṃ diśam avaikṣata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.9b: śaśaṃsa senāṃ rāmāya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.10a: agniṃ saṃśamayatv āryaḥ sītā ca bhajatāṃ guhām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.10b: sajyaṃ kuruṣva cāpaṃ ca śarāṃś ca kavacaṃ tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.11a: taṃ rāmaḥ puruṣavyāghro lakṣmaṇaṃ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.12a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.12b: didhakṣann iva tāṃ senāṃ ruṣitaḥ pāvako yathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.13a: sampannaṃ rājyam icchaṃs tu vyaktaṃ prāpyābhiṣecanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.13b: āvāṃ hantuṃ samabhyeti kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.14a: eṣa vai sumahāñ śrīmān viṭapī saṃprakāśate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.15a: bhajanty ete yathākāmam aśvān āruhya śīghragān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.15b: ete bhrājanti saṃhṛṣṭā gajān āruhya sādinaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.16b: api nau vaśam āgacchet kovidāradhvajo raṇe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.17a: api drakṣyāmi bharataṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.17b: tvayā rāghava samprāptaṃ sītayā ca mayā tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.18a: yannimittaṃ bhavān rājyāc cyuto rāghava śāśvatāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.18b: samprāpto 'yam arir vīra bharato vadhya eva me // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.18c: bharatasya vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.19a: pūrvāpakāriṇāṃ tyāge na hy adharmo vidhīyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.20a: adya putraṃ hataṃ saṃkhye kaikeyī rājyakāmukā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.20b: mayā paśyet suduḥkhārtā hastibhagnam iva drumam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.22a: adyemaṃ saṃyataṃ krodham asatkāraṃ ca mānada /
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.24b: śvāpadāḥ parikarṣantu narāṃś ca nihatān mayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_90.25b: sasainyaṃ bharataṃ hatvā bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.1b: rāmas tu parisāntvyātha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.2a: kim atra dhanuṣā kāryam asinā vā sacarmaṇā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.3a: prāptakālaṃ yad eṣo 'smān bharato draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.3b: asmāsu manasāpy eṣa nāhitaṃ kiṃcid ācaret // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.4a: vipriyaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ te bharatena kadā na kim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.4b: īdṛśaṃ vā bhayaṃ te 'dya bharataṃ yo 'tra śaṅkase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.5a: na hi te niṣṭhuraṃ vācyo bharato nāpriyaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.5b: ahaṃ hy apriyam uktaḥ syāṃ bharatasyāpriye kṛte // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.6a: kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃcid āpadi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.6b: bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇam ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.7a: yadi rājyasya hetos tvam imāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.7b: vakṣyāmi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyam asmai pradīyatām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.8a: ucyamāno hi bharato mayā lakṣmaṇa tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.8b: rājyam asmai prayaccheti bāḍham ity eva vakṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.9a: tathokto dharmaśīlena bhrātrā tasya hite rataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.10a: vrīḍitaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.10b: eṣa manye mahābāhur ihāsmān draṣṭum āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.13b: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma vṛddhas tātasya dhīmataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.14a: avatīrya tu sālāgrāt tasmāt sa samitiṃjayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.14b: lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.15a: bharatenātha saṃdiṣṭā sammardo na bhaved iti /
GE09ram_02su:ram_91.17a: sā citrakūṭe bharatena senā dharmaṃ puraskṛtya vidhūya darpam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.1a: niveśya senāṃ tu vibhuḥ padbhyāṃ pādavatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.2b: bharato bhrātaraṃ vākyaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.3a: kṣipraṃ vanam idaṃ saumya narasaṃghaiḥ samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.3b: lubdhaiś ca sahitair ebhis tvam anveṣitum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.4a: yāvan na rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ vā mahābalam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.4b: vaidehīṃ vā mahābhāgāṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.5a: yāvan na candrasaṃkāśaṃ drakṣyāmi śubham ānanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.5b: bhrātuḥ padmapalāśākṣaṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.6b: śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.7a: yāvan na rājye rājyārhaḥ pitṛpaitāmahe sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.9b: yasmin vasati kākutsthaḥ kubera iva nandane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.10b: yad adhyāste mahātejā rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.11b: padbhyām eva mahātejāḥ praviveśa mahad vanam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.13a: sa gireś citrakūṭasya sālam āsādya puṣpitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.14a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān mumoda sahabāndhavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.14b: atra rāma iti jñātvā gataḥ pāram ivāmbhasaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.14c: sa citrakūṭe tu girau niśāmya rāmāśramaṃ puṇyajanopapannam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_92.14d: guhena sārdhaṃ tvarito jagāma punar niveśyaiva camūṃ mahātmā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.1a: niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyām utsuko bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.2a: ṛṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ saṃdiśya mātḥn me śīghram ānaya /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.2b: iti tvaritam agre sa jagāma guruvatsalaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.3a: sumantras tv api śatrughnam adūrād anvapadyata /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.4b: bhrātuḥ parṇakuṭīṃ śrīmān uṭajaṃ ca dadarśa ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.5a: śālāyās tv agratas tasyā dadarśa bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.6a: dadarśa ca vane tasmin mahataḥ saṃcayān kṛtān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.7a: gacchan eva mahābāhur dyutimān bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.7b: śatrughnaṃ cābravīd dhṛṣṭas tān amātyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.8a: manye prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.8b: nātidūre hi manye 'haṃ nadīṃ mandākinīm itaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.9a: uccair baddhāni cīrāṇi lakṣmaṇena bhaved ayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.11a: yam evādhātum icchanti tāpasāḥ satataṃ vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.12b: āryaṃ drakṣyāmi saṃhṛṣṭo maharṣim iva rāghavam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.13a: atha gatvā muhūrtaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.13b: mandākinīm anuprāptas taṃ janaṃ cedam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.14b: janendro nirjanaṃ prāpya dhin me janma sajīvitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.15b: sarvān kāmān parityajya vane vasati rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.16b: rāmasya nipatiṣyāmi sītāyāś ca punaḥ punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.17a: evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tasmin vane daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.18b: viśālāṃ mṛdubhis tīrṇāṃ kuśair vedim ivādhvare // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.24a: nirīkṣya sa muhūrtaṃ tu dadarśa bharato gurum /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.30a: yaḥ saṃsadi prakṛtibhir bhaved yukta upāsitum /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.30b: vanyair mṛgair upāsīnaḥ so 'yam āste mamāgrajaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.31b: mṛgājine so 'yam iha pravaste dharmam ācaran // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.32a: adhārayad yo vividhāś citrāḥ sumanasas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.32b: so 'yaṃ jaṭābhāram imaṃ sahate rāghavaḥ katham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.33a: yasya yajñair yathādiṣṭair yukto dharmasya saṃcayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.34b: malena tasyāṅgam idaṃ katham āryasya sevyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.35a: mannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpto rāmaḥ sukhocitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.36b: pādāv aprāpya rāmasya papāta bharato rudan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.37b: uktvāryeti sakṛd dīnaṃ punar novāca kiṃcana // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.39a: śatrughnaś cāpi rāmasya vavande caraṇau rudan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.39b: tāv ubhau sa samāliṅgya rāmo 'py aśrūṇy avartayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.39c: tataḥ sumantreṇa guhena caiva samīyatū rājasutāv araṇye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.39d: divākaraś caiva niśākaraś ca yathāmbare śukrabṛhaspatibhyām //
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.39e: tān pārthivān vāraṇayūthapābhān samāgatāṃs tatra mahaty araṇye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_93.39f: vanaukasas te 'pi samīkṣya sarve 'py aśrūṇy amuñcan pravihāya harṣam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.1a: āghrāya rāmas taṃ mūrdhni pariṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.2a: kva nu te 'bhūt pitā tāta yad araṇyaṃ tvam āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.2b: na hi tvaṃ jīvatas tasya vanam āgantum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.3a: cirasya bata paśyāmi dūrād bharatam āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.3b: duṣpratīkam araṇye 'smin kiṃ tāta vanam āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.5a: sa kaccid brāhmaṇo vidvān dharmanityo mahādyutiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.6a: tāta kaccic ca kausalyā sumitrā ca prajāvatī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.6b: sukhinī kaccid āryā ca devī nandati kaikayī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.8a: kaccid agniṣu te yukto vidhijño matimān ṛjuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.8b: hutaṃ ca hoṣyamāṇaṃ ca kāle vedayate sadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.9b: sudhanvānam upādhyāyaṃ kaccit tvaṃ tāta manyase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.10b: kulīnāś ceṅgitajñāś ca kṛtās te tāta mantriṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.11a: mantro vijayamūlaṃ hi rājñāṃ bhavati rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.12a: kaccin nidrāvaśaṃ naiṣi kaccit kāle vibudhyase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.13a: kaccin mantrayase naikaḥ kaccin na bahubhiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.13b: kaccit te mantrito mantro rāṣṭraṃ na paridhāvati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.14b: kṣipram ārabhase kartuṃ na dīrghayasi rāghava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.15a: kaccit tu sukṛtāny eva kṛtarūpāṇi vā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.15b: vidus te sarvakāryāṇi na kartavyāni pārthivāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.16a: kaccin na tarkair yuktvā vā ye cāpy aparikīrtitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.16b: tvayā vā tava vāmātyair budhyate tāta mantritam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.17a: kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekam icchasi paṇḍitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.17b: paṇḍito hy arthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.18a: sahasrāṇy api mūrkhāṇāṃ yady upāste mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.18b: atha vāpy ayutāny eva nāsti teṣu sahāyatā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.19a: eko 'py amātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.19b: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.20a: kaccin mukhyā mahatsv eva madhyameṣu ca madhyamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.20b: jaghanyāś ca jaghanyeṣu bhṛtyāḥ karmasu yojitāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.21b: śreṣṭhāñ śreṣṭheṣu kaccit tvaṃ niyojayasi karmasu // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.22a: kaccit tvāṃ nāvajānanti yājakāḥ patitaṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.23b: śūram aiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.24a: kaccid dhṛṣṭaś ca śūraś ca dhṛtimān matimāñ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.24b: kulīnaś cānuraktaś ca dakṣaḥ senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.25a: balavantaś ca kaccit te mukhyā yuddhaviśāradāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.26a: kaccid balasya bhaktaṃ ca vetanaṃ ca yathocitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.27b: bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti so 'narthaḥ sumahān smṛtaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.29b: yathoktavādī dūtas te kṛto bharata paṇḍitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.30a: kaccid aṣṭādaśāny eṣu svapakṣe daśa pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.30b: tribhis tribhir avijñātair vetsi tīrthāni cārakaiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.31a: kaccid vyapāstān ahitān pratiyātāṃś ca sarvadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.32a: kaccin na lokāyatikān brāhmaṇāṃs tāta sevase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.33b: buddhimān vīkṣikīṃ prāpya nirarthaṃ pravadanti te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.34a: vīrair adhyuṣitāṃ pūrvam asmākaṃ tāta pūrvakaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.39b: kaccij janapadaḥ sphītaḥ sukhaṃ vasati rāghava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.40b: vārttāyāṃ saṃśritas tāta loko hi sukham edhate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.41a: teṣāṃ guptiparīhāraiḥ kaccit te bharaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.41b: rakṣyā hi rājñā dharmeṇa sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.42a: kaccit striyaḥ sāntvayasi kaccit tāś ca surakṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.42b: kaccin na śraddadhāsyāsāṃ kaccid guhyaṃ na bhāṣase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.42c: kaccin nāgavanaṃ guptaṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca tṛpyasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.45a: āyas te vipulaḥ kaccit kaccid alpataro vyayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.45b: apātreṣu na te kaccit kośo gacchati rāghava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.46b: yodheṣu mitravargeṣu kaccid gacchati te vyayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.47b: apṛṣṭaḥ śāstrakuśalair na lobhād badhyate śuciḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.48a: gṛhītaś caiva pṛṣṭaś ca kāle dṛṣṭaḥ sakāraṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.48b: kaccin na mucyate coro dhanalobhān nararṣabha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.49a: vyasane kaccid āḍhyasya durgatasya ca rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.51a: kaccid vṛddhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vaidyamukhyāṃś ca rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.51b: dānena manasā vācā tribhir etair bubhūṣase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.52a: kaccid gurūṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca tāpasān devatātithīn /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.52b: caityāṃś ca sarvān siddhārthān brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.53a: kaccid arthena vā dharmaṃ dharmaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.53b: ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.54a: kaccid arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jayatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.54b: vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.58b: kaccit tvaṃ varjayasy etān rājadoṣāṃś caturdaśa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_94.59a: kaccit svādukṛtaṃ bhojyam eko nāśnāsi rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.1a: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.1b: kiṃ me dharmād vihīnasya rājadharmaḥ kariṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.2b: jyeṣṭhaputre sthite rājan na kanīyān bhaven nṛpaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.3a: sa samṛddhāṃ mayā sārdham ayodhyāṃ gaccha rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.4a: rājānaṃ mānuṣaṃ prāhur devatve saṃmato mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.5a: kekayasthe ca mayi tu tvayi cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.5b: divam ārya gato rājā yāyajūkaḥ satāṃ mataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.6b: ahaṃ cāyaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtodakau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.7a: priyeṇa kila dattaṃ hi pitṛlokeṣu rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.7b: akṣayyaṃ bhavatīty āhur bhavāṃś caiva pituḥ priyaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.8a: tāṃ śrutvā karuṇāṃ vācaṃ pitur maraṇasaṃhitām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.9a: pragṛhya bāhū rāmo vai puṣpitāgro yathā drumaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.9b: vane paraśunā kṛttas tathā bhuvi papāta ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.10a: tathā hi patitaṃ rāmaṃ jagatyāṃ jagatīpatim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.11b: rudantaḥ saha vaidehyā siṣicuḥ salilena vai // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.12a: sa tu saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā netrābhyām āsram utsṛjan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.13a: kiṃ nu tasya mayā kāryaṃ durjātena mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.13b: yo mṛto mama śokena na mayā cāpi saṃskṛtaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.14a: aho bharata siddhārtho yena rājā tvayānagha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.16b: ko nu śāsiṣyati punas tāte lokāntaraṃ gate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.17a: purā prekṣya suvṛttaṃ māṃ pitā yāny āha sāntvayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.17b: vākyāni tāni śroṣyāmi kutaḥ karṇasukhāny aham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.18a: evam uktvā sa bharataṃ bhāryām abhyetya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.19a: sīte mṛtas te śvaśuraḥ pitrā hīno 'si lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.20a: sāntvayitvā tu tāṃ rāmo rudantīṃ janakātmajām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.20b: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ tatra duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.22a: sītā purastād vrajatu tvam enām abhito vraja /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.22b: ahaṃ paścād gamiṣyāmi gatir hy eṣā sudāruṇā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.23b: mṛdur dāntaś ca śāntaś ca rāme ca dṛḍhabhaktimān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.24a: sumantras tair nṛpasutaiḥ sārdham āśvāsya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.25a: te sutīrthāṃ tataḥ kṛcchrād upāgamya yaśasvinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.26b: siṣicus tūdakaṃ rājñe tata etad bhavatv iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.27b: diśaṃ yāmyām abhimukho rudan vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.28a: etat te rājaśārdūla vimalaṃ toyam akṣayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.29b: pituś cakāra tejasvī nivāpaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.30b: nyasya rāmaḥ suduḥkhārto rudan vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.31a: idaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārāja prīto yadaśanā vayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.31b: yadannaḥ puruṣo bhavati tadannās tasya devatāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.34a: teṣāṃ tu rudatāṃ śabdāt pratiśrutkābhavad girau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.34b: bhrātḥṇāṃ saha vaidehyā siṃhānāṃ nardatām iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.35a: abruvaṃś cāpi rāmeṇa bharataḥ saṃgato dhruvam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.35b: teṣām eva mahāñ śabdaḥ śocatāṃ pitaraṃ mṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.36a: atha vāsān parityajya taṃ sarve 'bhimukhāḥ svanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.37a: hayair anye gajair anye rathair anye svalaṃkṛtaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.37b: sukumārās tathaivānye padbhir eva narā yayuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.39a: bhrātḥṇāṃ tvaritās te tu draṣṭukāmāḥ samāgamam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.41b: āvāsayanto gandhena jagmur anyad vanaṃ tataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.43b: tathā puṃskokilāḥ krauñcā visaṃjñā bhejire diśaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.44a: tena śabdena vitrastair ākāśaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.44b: manuṣyair āvṛtā bhūmir ubhayaṃ prababhau tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.45b: paryaṣvajata dharmajñaḥ pitṛvan mātṛvac ca saḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.45c: sa tatra kāṃścit pariṣasvaje narān narāś ca kecit tu tam abhyavādayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.45d: cakāra sarvān savayasyabāndhavān yathārham āsādya tadā nṛpātmajaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.45e: tataḥ sa teṣāṃ rudatāṃ mahātmanāṃ bhuvaṃ ca khaṃ cānuvinādayan svanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_95.45f: guhā girīṇāṃ ca diśaś ca saṃtataṃ mṛdaṅgaghoṣapratimo viśuśruve //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.1a: vasiṣṭhaḥ purataḥ kṛtvā dārān daśarathasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.2a: rājapatnyaś ca gacchantyo mandaṃ mandākinīṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.3b: sumitrām abravīd dīnā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.4b: vane prāk kevalaṃ tīrthaṃ ye te nirviṣayīkṛtāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.5a: itaḥ sumitre putras te sadā jalam atandritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.5b: svayaṃ harati saumitrir mama putrasya kāraṇāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.7a: taṃ bhūmau pitur ārtena nyastaṃ rāmeṇa vīkṣya sā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.11a: ato duḥkhataraṃ loke na kiṃcit pratibhāti mā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.11b: yatra rāmaḥ pitur dadyād iṅgudīkṣodam ṛddhimān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.12b: kathaṃ duḥkhena hṛdayaṃ na sphoṭati sahasradhā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.13a: evam ārtāṃ sapatnyas tā jagmur āśvāsya tāṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.13b: dadṛśuś cāśrame rāmaṃ svargāc cyutam ivāmaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.15a: tāsāṃ rāmaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇāñ śubhān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.17a: saumitrir api tāḥ sarvā mātḥn samprekṣya duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.18a: yathā rāme tathā tasmin sarvā vavṛtire striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.20a: tāṃ pariṣvajya duḥkhārtāṃ mātā duhitaraṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.21b: rāmapatnī kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ samprāptā nirjane vane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.22b: kāñcanaṃ rajasā dhvastaṃ kliṣṭaṃ candram ivāmbudaiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.23a: mukhaṃ te prekṣya māṃ śoko dahaty agnir ivāśrayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24b: pādāv āsādya jagrāha vasiṣṭhasya sa rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24c: purohitasyāgnisamasya tasya vai bṛhaspater indra ivāmarādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24d: pragṛhya pādau susamṛddhatejasaḥ sahaiva tenopaviveśa rāghavaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24e: tato jaghanyaṃ sahitaiḥ sa mantribhiḥ purapradhānaiś ca sahaiva sainikaiḥ
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24f: janena dharmajñatamena dharmavān upopaviṣṭo bharatas tadāgrajam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24g: upopaviṣṭas tu tadā sa vīryavāṃs tapasviveṣeṇa samīkṣya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24h: śriyā jvalantaṃ bharataḥ kṛtāñjalir yathā mahendraḥ prayataḥ prajāpatim //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24i: kim eṣa vākyaṃ bharato 'dya rāghavaṃ praṇamya satkṛtya ca sādhu vakṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24j: itīva tasyāryajanasya tattvato babhūva kautūhalam uttamaṃ tadā //
GE09ram_02su:ram_96.24k: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiś ca lakṣmaṇo mahānubhāvo bharataś ca dhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97: vṛtāḥ suhṛdbhiś ca virejur adhvare yathā sadasyaiḥ sahitās trayo 'gnayaḥ Rāmāyaṇa, Ayodhyākāṇḍa, 97
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.1a: taṃ tu rāmaḥ samāśvāsya bhrātaraṃ guruvatsalam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.2a: kim etad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ pravyāhṛtaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.2b: yasmāt tvam āgato deśam imaṃ cīrajaṭājinī // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.3b: hitvā rājyaṃ praviṣṭas tvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.4b: pragṛhya balavad bhūyaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.5a: āryaṃ tātaḥ parityajya kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.6a: striyā niyuktaḥ kaikeyyā mama mātrā paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.8a: tasya me dāsabhūtasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.9a: imāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā vidhavā mātaraś ca yāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.10a: tadānupūrvyā yuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ cātmani mānada /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.10b: rājyaṃ prāpnuhi dharmeṇa sakāmān suhṛdaḥ kuru // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.11a: bhavatv avidhavā bhūmiḥ samagrā patinā tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.12a: ebhiś ca sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ śirasā yācito mayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.12b: bhrātuḥ śiṣyasya dāsasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.13a: tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ pitryaṃ sarvaṃ sacivamaṇḍalam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.14b: rāmasya śirasā pādau jagrāha bharataḥ punaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.15a: taṃ mattam iva mātaṃgaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.16b: rājyahetoḥ kathaṃ pāpam ācaret tvadvidho janaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.17a: na doṣaṃ tvayi paśyāmi sūkṣmam apy arisūdana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.17b: na cāpi jananīṃ bālyāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.18b: tāvad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jananyām api gauravam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.21b: vyādiśya ca mahātejā divaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.22a: sa ca pramāṇaṃ dharmātmā rājā lokagurus tava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.22b: pitrā dattaṃ yathābhāgam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.23b: upabhokṣye tv ahaṃ dattaṃ bhāgaṃ pitrā mahātmanā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.23c: yad abravīn māṃ naralokasatkṛtaḥ pitā mahātmā vibudhādhipopamaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_97.23d: tad eva manye paramātmano hitaṃ na sarvalokeśvarabhāvam avyayam //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.2b: mandākinyāṃ hutaṃ japyaṃ kṛtvā rāmam upāgaman // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.3a: tūṣṇīṃ te samupāsīnā na kaścit kiṃcid abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.3b: bharatas tu suhṛnmadhye rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.4a: sāntvitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.4b: tad dadāmi tavaivāhaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.6b: anugantuṃ na śaktir me gatiṃ tava mahīpate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.7a: sujīvaṃ nityaśas tasya yaḥ parair upajīvyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.7b: rāma tena tu durjīvaṃ yaḥ parān upajīvati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.8a: yathā tu ropito vṛkṣaḥ puruṣeṇa vivardhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.9a: sa yadā puṣpito bhūtvā phalāni na vidarśayet /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.9b: sa tāṃ nānubhavet prītiṃ yasya hetoḥ prabhāvitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.10a: eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.10b: yadi tvam asmān ṛṣabho bhartā bhṛtyān na śādhi hi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.11a: śreṇayas tvāṃ mahārāja paśyantv agryāś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.13a: tasya sādhv ity amanyanta nāgarā vividhā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.14a: tam evaṃ duḥkhitaṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ yaśasvinam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.17a: yathā phalānāṃ pakvānāṃ nānyatra patanād bhayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.17b: evaṃ narasya jātasya nānyatra maraṇād bhayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.19b: āyūṃṣi kṣapayanty āśu grīṣme jalam ivāṃśavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.20a: ātmānam anuśoca tvaṃ kim anyam anuśocasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.20b: āyus te hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.21a: sahaiva mṛtyur vrajati saha mṛtyur niṣīdati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.21b: gatvā sudīrgham adhvānaṃ saha mṛtyur nivartate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.22a: gātreṣu valayaḥ prāptāḥ śvetāś caiva śiroruhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.22b: jarayā puruṣo jīrṇaḥ kiṃ hi kṛtvā prabhāvayet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.23a: nandanty udita āditye nandanty astam ite ravau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.24a: hṛṣyanty ṛtumukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ navam ihāgatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.25a: yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahārṇave /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.25b: sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ kālam āsādya kaṃcana // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.26a: evaṃ bhāryāś ca putrāś ca jñātayaś ca vasūni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.26b: sametya vyavadhāvanti dhruvo hy eṣāṃ vinābhavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.27a: nātra kaścid yathā bhāvaṃ prāṇī samabhivartate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.27b: tena tasmin na sāmarthyaṃ pretasyāsty anuśocataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.28a: yathā hi sārthaṃ gacchantaṃ brūyāt kaścit pathi sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.28b: aham apy āgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhato bhavatām iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.29a: evaṃ pūrvair gato mārgaḥ pitṛpaitāmaho dhruvaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.29b: tam āpannaḥ kathaṃ śoced yasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.30b: ātmā sukhe niyoktavyaḥ sukhabhājaḥ prajāḥ smṛtāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.31a: dharmātmā sa śubhaiḥ kṛtsnaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.31b: dhūtapāpo gataḥ svargaṃ pitā naḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.32b: arthādānāc ca dhārmeṇa pitā nas tridivaṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.33a: iṣṭvā bahuvidhair yajñair bhogāṃś cāvāpya puṣkalān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.33b: uttamaṃ cāyur āsādya svar gataḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.34a: sa jīrṇaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ parityajya pitā hi naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.35a: taṃ tu naivaṃvidhaḥ kaścit prājñaḥ śocitum arhati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.37a: sa svastho bhava mā śoco yātvā cāvasa tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.37b: tathā pitrā niyukto 'si vaśinā vadatāṃ vara // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.39a: na mayā śāsanaṃ tasya tyaktuṃ nyāyyam ariṃdama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.39b: tat tvayāpi sadā mānyaṃ sa vai bandhuḥ sa naḥ pitā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.40a: evam uktvā tu virate rāme vacanam arthavat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.40b: uvāca bharataś citraṃ dhārmiko dhārmikaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.41a: ko hi syād īdṛśo loke yādṛśas tvam ariṃdama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.41b: na tvāṃ pravyathayed duḥkhaṃ prītir vā na praharṣayet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.42a: saṃmataś cāsi vṛddhānāṃ tāṃś ca pṛcchasi saṃśayān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.42b: yathā mṛtas tathā jīvan yathāsati tathā sati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.43a: yasyaiṣa buddhilābhaḥ syāt paritapyeta kena saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.43b: sa evaṃ vyasanaṃ prāpya na viṣīditum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.44b: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca buddhimāṃś cāsi rāghava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.45a: na tvām evaṃ guṇair yuktaṃ prabhavābhavakovidam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.46a: proṣite mayi yat pāpaṃ mātrā matkāraṇāt kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.46b: kṣudrayā tad aniṣṭaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.48b: jānan dharmam adharmiṣṭhaṃ kuryāṃ karma jugupsitam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.49a: guruḥ kriyāvān vṛddhaś ca rājā pretaḥ piteti ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.49b: tātaṃ na parigarheyaṃ daivataṃ ceti saṃsadi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.50a: ko hi dharmārthayor hīnam īdṛśaṃ karma kilbiṣam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.50b: striyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ san kuryād dharmajña dharmavit // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.51b: rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.52a: sādhvartham abhisaṃdhāya krodhān mohāc ca sāhasāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.52b: tātasya yad atikrāntaṃ pratyāharatu tad bhavān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.53a: pitur hi samatikrāntaṃ putro yaḥ sādhu manyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.53b: tad apatyaṃ mataṃ loke viparītam ato 'nyathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.54a: tad apatyaṃ bhavān astu mā bhavān duṣkṛtaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.55a: kaikeyīṃ māṃ ca tātaṃ ca suhṛdo bāndhavāṃś ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.55b: paurajānapadān sarvāṃs trātu sarvam idaṃ bhavān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.56a: kva cāraṇyaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ kva jaṭāḥ kva ca pālanam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.56b: īdṛśaṃ vyāhataṃ karma na bhavān kartum arhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.57a: atha kleśajam eva tvaṃ dharmaṃ caritum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.57b: dharmeṇa caturo varṇān pālayan kleśam āpnuhi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.58a: caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.58b: āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.59a: śrutena bālaḥ sthānena janmanā bhavato hy aham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.59b: sa kathaṃ pālayiṣyāmi bhūmiṃ bhavati tiṣṭhati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.60a: hīnabuddhiguṇo bālo hīnaḥ sthānena cāpy aham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.60b: bhavatā ca vinā bhūto na vartayitum utsahe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.61a: idaṃ nikhilam avyagraṃ pitryaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.63a: abhiṣiktas tvam asmābhir ayodhyāṃ pālane vraja /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.63b: vijitya tarasā lokān marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.64a: ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan /
