GE09ram_02su:ram_98.64b: suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.65b: adya bhītāḥ pālayantāṃ durhṛdas te diśo daśa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.66a: ākrośaṃ mama mātuś ca pramṛjya puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.66b: adya tatra bhavantaṃ ca pitaraṃ rakṣa kilbiṣāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.67b: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.68a: atha vā pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vanam eva bhavān itaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.68b: gamiṣyati gamiṣyāmi bhavatā sārdham apy aham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.68c: tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyatā prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.68d: na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān matiṃ pitus tadvacane pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.68e: tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.68f: na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.68g: tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_98.68h: tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.1a: punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.2a: upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvam evam abhāṣathāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.3a: purā bhrātaḥ pitā naḥ sa mātaraṃ te samudvahan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.4a: devāsure ca saṃgrāme jananyai tava pārthivaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.4b: samprahṛṣṭo dadau rājā varam ārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.5a: tataḥ sā saṃpratiśrāvya tava mātā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.6a: tava rājyaṃ naravyāghra mama pravrājanaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.6b: tac ca rājā tathā tasyai niyuktaḥ pradadau varam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.7a: tena pitrāham apy atra niyuktaḥ puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.8a: so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.9a: bhavān api tathety eva pitaraṃ satyavādinam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.10a: ṛṇān mocaya rājānaṃ matkṛte bharata prabhum /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.11a: śrūyate hi purā tāta śrutir gītā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.11b: gayena yajamānena gayeṣv eva pitḥn prati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.12a: puṃnāmnā narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.12b: tasmāt putra iti proktaḥ pitḥn yat pāti vā sutaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.13b: teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaścid gayāṃ vrajet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.14b: tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.16b: ābhyāṃ tu sahito rājan vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.17a: tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ vanyānām aham api rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.17b: gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya samprahṛṣṭaḥ saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.17c: chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ varṣatraṃ bharata karotu mūrdhni śītām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.17d: eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye //
GE09ram_02su:ram_99.17e: śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ saumitrir mama viditaḥ pradhānamitram
GE09ram_02su:ram_100: catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ satyasthaṃ bharata carāma mā viṣādam Rāmāyaṇa, Ayodhyākāṇḍa, 100
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.1b: uvāca rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmāpetam idaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.2a: sādhu rāghava mā bhūt te buddhir evaṃ nirarthakā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.3a: kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kim āpyaṃ kasya kenacit /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.3b: yad eko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.4a: tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.4b: unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kāciddhi kasyacit // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.5a: yathā grāmāntaraṃ gacchan naraḥ kaścit kvacid vaset /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.6a: evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ pitā mātā gṛhaṃ vasu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.7a: pitryaṃ rājyaṃ samutsṛjya sa nārhati narottama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.9b: vihara tvam ayodhyāyāṃ yathā śakras triviṣṭape // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.10a: na te kaścid daśaratas tvaṃ ca tasya na kaścana /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.10b: anyo rājā tvam anyaś ca tasmāt kuru yad ucyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.11a: gataḥ sa nṛpatis tatra gantavyaṃ yatra tena vai /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.11b: pravṛttir eṣā martyānāṃ tvaṃ tu mithyā vihanyase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.12a: arthadharmaparā ye ye tāṃs tāñ śocāmi netarān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.12b: te hi duḥkham iha prāpya vināśaṃ pretya bhejire // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.13b: annasyopadravaṃ paśya mṛto hi kim aśiṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.14a: yadi bhuktam ihānyena deham anyasya gacchati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.14b: dadyāt pravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na tat pathy aśanaṃ bhavet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.15a: dānasaṃvananā hy ete granthā medhāvibhiḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.15b: yajasva dehi dīkṣasva tapas tapyasva saṃtyaja // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.16a: sa nāsti param ity eva kuru buddhiṃ mahāmate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_100.16b: pratyakṣaṃ yat tad ātiṣṭha parokṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuru // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.1a: jābāles tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyātmanāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.2a: bhavān me priyakāmārthaṃ vacanaṃ yad ihoktavān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.4b: cāritram eva vyākhyāti śuciṃ vā yadi vāśucim // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.5a: anāryas tv āryasaṃkāśaḥ śaucāddhīnas tathā śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.7b: bahu maṃsyati māṃ loke durvṛttaṃ lokadūṣaṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.8a: kasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ kena vā svargam āpnuyām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.9a: kāmavṛttas tv ayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.9b: yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.10b: tasmāt satyātmakaṃ rājyaṃ satye lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.11a: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca satyam eva hi menire /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.11b: satyavādī hi loke 'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.12b: dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.13a: satyam eveśvaro loke satyaṃ padmā samāśritā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.13b: satyamūlāni sarvāṇi satyān nāsti paraṃ padam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.14a: dattam iṣṭaṃ hutaṃ caiva taptāni ca tapāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.15a: ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.15b: majjaty eko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.16a: so 'haṃ pitur nideśaṃ tu kimarthaṃ nānupālaye /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.17a: naiva lobhān na mohād vā na cājñānāt tamo'nvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.18b: naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.19a: pratyagātmam imaṃ dharmaṃ satyaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.20a: kṣātraṃ dharmam ahaṃ tyakṣye hy adharmaṃ dharmasaṃhitam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.20b: kṣudrair nṛśaṃsair lubdhaiś ca sevitaṃ pāpakarmabhiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.21a: kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā sampradhārya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.21b: anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.22a: bhūmiḥ kīrtir yaśo lakṣmīḥ puruṣaṃ prārthayanti hi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.22b: svargasthaṃ cānubadhnanti satyam eva bhajeta tat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.23a: śreṣṭhaṃ hy anāryam eva syād yad bhavān avadhārya mām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.23b: āha yuktikarair vākyair idaṃ bhadraṃ kuruṣva ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.24a: kathaṃ hy ahaṃ pratijñāya vanavāsam imaṃ guroḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.24b: bharatasya kariṣyāmi vaco hitvā guror vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.26b: mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pitḥn devāṃś ca tarpayan // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.28a: karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yac chubham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.28b: agnir vāyuś ca somaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.29a: śataṃ kratūnām āhṛtya devarāṭ tridivaṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.29b: tapāṃsy ugrāṇi cāsthāya divaṃ yātā maharṣayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.29c: satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca bhūtānukampāṃ priyavāditāṃ ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.29d: dvijātidevātithipūjanaṃ ca panthānam āhus tridivasya santaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.29e: dharme ratāḥ satpuruṣaiḥ sametās tejasvino dānaguṇapradhānāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_101.29f: ahiṃsakā vītamalāś ca loke bhavanti pūjyā munayaḥ pradhānāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.1a: kruddham ājñāya rāmaṃ tu vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.1c: nivartayitukāmas tu tvām etad vākyam abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.2a: sarvaṃ salilam evāsīt pṛthivī yatra nirmitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.2b: tataḥ samabhavad brahmā svayambhūr daivataiḥ saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.3a: sa varāhas tato bhūtvā projjahāra vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.3b: asṛjac ca jagat sarvaṃ saha putraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.4b: tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.5a: vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivasvataḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.5b: sa tu prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.6a: yasyeyaṃ prathamaṃ dattā samṛddhā manunā mahī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.6b: tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.7a: ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān kukṣir eveti viśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.8a: vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.9a: nānāvṛṣṭir babhūvāsmin na durbhikṣaṃ satāṃ vare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.9c: anaraṇyān mahābāhuḥ pṛthū rājā babhūva ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.10b: sa satyavacanād vīraḥ saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.13a: susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.13c: bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.14b: haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.14c: tāṃs tu sarvān prativyūhya yuddhe rājā pravāsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.15a: sa ca śailavare ramye babhūvābhirato muniḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.15b: dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.16b: tam ṛṣiṃ samupāgamya kālindī tv abhyavādayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.17a: sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.17b: tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.18a: sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.18b: gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.19a: sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.19b: iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.20a: asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.20b: jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.22a: bhagīrathāt kakutsthas tu kākutsthā yena tu smṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.22b: kakutsthasya tu putro 'bhūd raghur yena tu rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.23a: raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.23b: kalmāṣapādaḥ saudāsa ity evaṃ prathito bhuvi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.24b: yas tu tad vīryam āsādya sahaseno vyanīnaśat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.25a: śaṅkhaṇasya tu putro 'bhūc chūraḥ śrīmān sudarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.26a: śīghragasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ praśuśrukaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.28a: ajaś ca suvrataś caiva nābhāgasya sutāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.28b: ajasya caiva dharmātmā rājā daśarathaḥ sutaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.29a: tasya jyeṣṭho 'si dāyādo rāma ity abhiviśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.29b: tad gṛhāṇa svakaṃ rājyam avekṣasva jagan nṛpa // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.30a: ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ rājā bhavati pūrvajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.30c: sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_102.30d: prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.1a: vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.2b: ācāryaś caiva kākutstha pitā mātā ca rāghava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.3a: pitā hy enaṃ janayati puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.3b: prajñāṃ dadāti cācāryas tasmāt sa gurur ucyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.4a: sa te 'haṃ pitur ācāryas tava caiva paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.4b: mama tvaṃ vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.5a: imā hi te pariṣadaḥ śreṇayaś ca samāgatāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.5b: eṣu tāta caran dharmaṃ nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.6b: asyās tu vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.8a: evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.9a: yan mātāpitarau vṛttaṃ tanaye kurutaḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.9b: na supratikaraṃ tat tu mātrā pitrā ca yat kṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.10b: nityaṃ ca priyavādena tathā saṃvardhanena ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.11a: sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.11b: ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.12a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharataḥ pratyanantaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.13a: iha me sthaṇḍile śīghraṃ kuśān āstara sārathe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.13b: āryaṃ pratyupavekṣyāmi yāvan me na prasīdati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.14b: śeṣye purastāc chālāyā yāvan na pratiyāsyati // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.15a: sa tu rāmam avekṣantaṃ sumantraṃ prekṣya durmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.16b: kiṃ māṃ bharata kurvāṇaṃ tāta pratyupavekṣyasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.17a: brāhmaṇo hy ekapārśvena narān roddhum ihārhati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.18b: puravaryām itaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ yāhi rāghava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.19a: āsīnas tv eva bharataḥ paurajānapadaṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.19b: uvāca sarvataḥ prekṣya kim āryaṃ nānuśāsatha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.20a: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.21a: eṣo 'pi hi mahābhāgaḥ pitur vacasi tiṣṭhati /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.21b: ata eva na śaktāḥ smo vyāvartayitum añjasā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.22a: teṣām ājñāya vacanaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.23a: etac caivobhayaṃ śrutvā samyak saṃpaśya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.23b: uttiṣṭha tvaṃ mahābāho māṃ ca spṛśa tathodakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.24a: athotthāya jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā bharato vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.24b: śṛṇvantu me pariṣado mantriṇaḥ śreṇayas tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.25a: na yāce pitaraṃ rājyaṃ nānuśāsāmi mātaram /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.26a: yadi tv avaśyaṃ vastavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca pitur vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.26b: aham eva nivatsyāmi caturdaśa vane samāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.27a: dharmātmā tasya tathyena bhrātur vākyena vismitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.28a: vikrītam āhitaṃ krītaṃ yat pitrā jīvatā mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.28b: na tal lopayituṃ śakyaṃ mayā vā bharatena vā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.29a: upadhir na mayā kāryo vanavāse jugupsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.29b: yuktam uktaṃ ca kaikeyyā pitrā me sukṛtaṃ kṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.31b: bhrātrā saha bhaviṣyāmi pṛthivyāḥ patir uttamaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_103.32a: vṛto rājā hi kaikeyyā mayā tadvacanaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.2a: antarhitās tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.3a: sa dhanyo yasya putrau dvau dharmajñau dharmavikramau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.3b: śrutvā vayaṃ hi sambhāṣām ubhayoḥ spṛhayāmahe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.4b: bharataṃ rājaśārdūlam ity ūcuḥ saṃgatā vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.5b: grāhyaṃ rāmasya vākyaṃ te pitaraṃ yady avekṣase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.6a: sadānṛṇam imaṃ rāmaṃ vayam icchāmahe pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.6b: anṛṇatvāc ca kaikeyyāḥ svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.7b: rājarṣayaś caiva tathā sarve svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.9a: srastagātras tu bharataḥ sa vācā sajjamānayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.9b: kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ punar abravīt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.10b: kartum arhasi kākutstha mama mātuś ca yācanām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.11a: rakṣituṃ sumahad rājyam aham ekas tu notsahe /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.12a: jñātayaś ca hi yodhāś ca mitrāṇi suhṛdaś ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.12b: tvām eva pratikāṅkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.13a: idaṃ rājyaṃ mahāprājña sthāpaya pratipadya hi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.14a: ity uktvā nyapatad bhrātuḥ pādayor bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.15a: tam aṅke bhrātaraṃ kṛtvā rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.16a: āgatā tvām iyaṃ buddhiḥ svajā vainayikī ca yā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.16b: bhṛśam utsahase tāta rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm api // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.17a: amātyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca buddhimadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.18a: lakṣmīś candrād apeyād vā himavān vā himaṃ tyajet /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.18b: atīyāt sāgaro velāṃ na pratijñām ahaṃ pituḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.19a: kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.19b: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.22a: so 'dhiruhya naravyāghraḥ pāduke hy avaruhya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.22c: sa pāduke te bharataḥ pratāpavān svalaṃkṛte samparigṛhya dharmavit /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.22d: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ cakāra caivottamanāgamūrdhani //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.22e: athānupūrvyāt pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ gurūṃś ca mantriprakṛtīs tathānujau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.22f: vyasarjayad rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ sthitaḥ svadharme himavān ivācalaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.22g: taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭhyo duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_104.22h: sa tv eva mātḥn abhivādya sarvā rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.1a: tataḥ śirasi kṛtvā tu pāduke bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.2a: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābāliś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.3a: mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.4b: prayayau tasya pārśvena sasainyo bharatas tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.5b: āśramaṃ yatra sa munir bharadvājaḥ kṛtālayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.6a: sa tam āśramam āgamya bharadvājasya buddhimān /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.7a: tato hṛṣṭo bharadvājo bharataṃ vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.7b: api kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta rāmeṇa ca samāgatam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.8a: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.9a: sa yācyamāno guruṇā mayā ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.10a: pituḥ pratijñāṃ tām eva pālayiṣyāmi tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.10b: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi yā pratijñā pitur mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.11a: evam ukto mahāprājño vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.13a: evam ukto vasiṣṭhena rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.13b: pāduke hemavikṛte mama rājyāya te dadau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.14b: ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.15a: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.16b: yad āryaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhet tu nimne vṛṣṭim ivodakam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.17a: amṛtaḥ sa mahābāhuḥ pitā daśarathas tava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.17b: yasya tvam īdṛśaḥ putro dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.18a: tam ṛṣiṃ tu mahātmānam uktavākyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.19a: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.19b: bharatas tu yayau śrīmān ayodhyāṃ saha mantribhiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.20a: yānaiś ca śakaṭaiś caiva hayair nāgaiś ca sā camūḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.21a: tatas te yamunāṃ divyāṃ nadīṃ tīrtvormimālinīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.21b: dadṛśus tāṃ punaḥ sarve gaṅgāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_105.24a: sārathe paśya vidhvastā ayodhyā na prakāśate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.8a: tyaktāṃ yajñāyudhaiḥ sarvair abhirūpaiś ca yājakaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.9a: goṣṭhamadhye sthitām ārtām acarantīṃ navaṃ tṛṇam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.10b: viyuktāṃ maṇibhir jātyair navāṃ muktāvalīm iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.11a: sahasā calitāṃ sthānān mahīṃ puṇyakṣayād gatām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.16b: bhūmau bāṇair viniṣkṛttāṃ patitāṃ jyām ivāyudhāt // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.19a: bharatas tu rathasthaḥ sañ śrīmān daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.20a: kiṃ nu khalv adya gambhīro mūrchito na niśamyate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.22b: nedānīṃ śrūyate puryām asyāṃ rāme vivāsite // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.24a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jalpan viveśa vasatiṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_106.24b: tena hīnāṃ narendreṇa siṃhahīnāṃ guhām iva // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.1a: tato nikṣipya mātḥn sa ayodhyāyāṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.2b: tatra duḥkham idaṃ sarvaṃ sahiṣye rāghavaṃ vinā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.3a: gataś ca hi divaṃ rājā vanasthaś ca gurur mama /
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.3b: rāmaṃ pratīkṣe rājyāya sa hi rājā mahāyaśāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.4a: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.4b: abruvan mantriṇaḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaś ca purohitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.5a: sadṛśaṃ ślāghanīyaṃ ca yad uktaṃ bharata tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.7b: abravīt sārathiṃ vākyaṃ ratho me yujyatām iti // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.9a: āruhya tu rathaṃ śīghraṃ śatrughnabharatāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.11b: prayayau bharate yāte sarve ca puravāsinaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.12a: rathasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.12b: nandigrāmaṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ śirasy ādhāya pāduke // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.13a: tatas tu bharataḥ kṣipraṃ nandigrāmaṃ praviśya saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.13b: avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gurūn idam uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.13c: etad rājyaṃ mama bhrātrā dattaṃ saṃnyāsavat svayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.15a: kṣipraṃ saṃyojayitvā tu rāghavasya punaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.15b: caraṇau tau tu rāmasya drakṣyāmi sahapādukau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.17b: rājyaṃ cedam ayodhyāṃ ca dhūtapāpo bhavāmi ca // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.18b: prītir mama yaśaś caiva bhaved rājyāc caturguṇam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_107.19a: evaṃ tu vilapan dīno bharataḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.2b: rāmam āśritya niratās tān alakṣayad utsukān // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.3a: nayanair bhṛkuṭībhiś ca rāmaṃ nirdiśya śaṅkitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.3b: anyonyam upajalpantaḥ śanaiś cakrur mithaḥ kathāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.4a: teṣām autsukyam ālakṣya rāmas tv ātmani śaṅkitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.5a: na kaccid bhagavan kiṃcit pūrvavṛttam idaṃ mayi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.6a: pramādāc caritaṃ kaccit kiṃcin nāvarajasya me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.7b: pramadābhyucitāṃ vṛttiṃ sītā yuktaṃ na vartate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.8a: atharṣir jarayā vṛddhas tapasā ca jarāṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.10a: tvannimittam idaṃ tāvat tāpasān prati vartate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.10b: rakṣobhyas tena saṃvignāḥ kathayanti mithaḥ kathāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.12a: dhṛṣṭaś ca jitakāśī ca nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣādakaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.12b: avaliptaś ca pāpaś ca tvāṃ ca tāta na mṛṣyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.13a: tvaṃ yadā prabhṛti hy asminn āśrame tāta vartase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.14a: darśayanti hi bībhatsaiḥ krūrair bhīṣaṇakair api /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.14b: nānā rūpair virūpaiś ca rūpair asukhadarśanaiḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.15b: pratighnanty aparān kṣipram anāryāḥ purataḥ sthitāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.16a: teṣu teṣv āśramasthāneṣv abuddham avalīya ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.19a: tat purā rāma śārīrām upahiṃsāṃ tapasviṣu /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.19b: darśayanti hi duṣṭās te tyakṣyāma imam āśramam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.21a: kharas tvayy api cāyuktaṃ purā tāta pravartate /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.21b: sahāsmābhir ito gaccha yadi buddhiḥ pravartate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.22a: sakalatrasya saṃdeho nityaṃ yat tasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.22b: samarthasyāpi hi sato vāso duḥkham ihādya te // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.23a: ity uktavantaṃ rāmas taṃ rājaputras tapasvinam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.24b: sa jagāmāśramaṃ tyaktvā kulaiḥ kulapatiḥ saha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.25a: rāmaḥ saṃsādhya tv ṛṣigaṇam anugamanād deśāt tasmāt kulapatim abhivādyarṣim /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.25b: samyakprītais tair anumata upadiṣṭārthaḥ puṇyaṃ vāsāya svanilayam upasaṃpede // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.25c: āśramaṃ tv ṛṣivirahitaṃ prabhuḥ kṣaṇam api na jahau sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_108.25d: rāghavaṃ hi satatam anugatās tāpasāś cārṣacaritadhṛtaguṇāḥ //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.1b: na tatrārocayad vāsaṃ kāraṇair bahubhis tadā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.2a: iha me bharato dṛṣṭo mātaraś ca sanāgarāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.2b: sā ca me smṛtir anveti tān nityam anuśocataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.4a: tasmād anyatra gacchāma iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.4b: prātiṣṭhata sa vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca saṃgataḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.5a: so 'trer āśramam āsādya taṃ vavande mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.5b: taṃ cāpi bhagavān atriḥ putravat pratyapadyata // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.6a: svayam ātithyam ādiśya sarvam asya susatkṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.6b: saumitriṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ sītāṃ ca samasāntvayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.7a: patnīṃ ca samanuprāptāṃ vṛddhām āmantrya satkṛtām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.9b: daśa varṣāṇy anāvṛṣṭyā dagdhe loke nirantaram // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.10a: yayā mūlaphale sṛṣṭe jāhnavī ca pravartitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.10b: ugreṇa tapasā yuktā niyamaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.12b: daśarātraṃ kṛtvā rātriḥ seyaṃ māteva te 'nagha // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.14a: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tathety uktvā sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.14b: sītām uvāca dharmajñām idaṃ vacanam uttamam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.15a: rājaputri śrutaṃ tv etan muner asya samīritam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.16a: anasūyeti yā loke karmabhiḥ khyātim āgatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.16b: tāṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvam abhigamyāṃ tapasvinīm // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.17a: sītā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavasya hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.19a: tāṃ tu sītā mahābhāgām anasūyāṃ pativratām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.20a: abhivādya ca vaidehī tāpasīṃ tām aninditām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.21a: tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dharmacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.21b: sāntvayanty abravīd dhṛṣṭā diṣṭyā dharmam avekṣase // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.22a: tyaktvā jñātijanaṃ sīte mānam ṛddhiṃ ca mānini /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.22b: avaruddhaṃ vane rāmaṃ diṣṭyā tvam anugacchasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.23a: nagarastho vanastho vā pāpo vā yadi vāśubhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.23b: yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.24a: duḥśīlaḥ kāmavṛtto vā dhanair vā parivarjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.25a: nāto viśiṣṭaṃ paśyāmi bāndhavaṃ vimṛśanty aham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.25b: sarvatra yogyaṃ vaidehi tapaḥ kṛtam ivāvyayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.26a: na tv evam avagacchanti guṇadoṣam asatstriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.27a: prāpnuvanty ayaśaś caiva dharmabhraṃśaṃ ca maithili /
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.27b: akāryavaśam āpannāḥ striyo yāḥ khalu tadvidhāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_109.28b: striyaḥ svarge cariṣyanti yathā puṇyakṛtas tathā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.1a: sā tv evam uktā vaidehī anasūyānasūyayā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.2a: naitad āścaryam āryāyā yan māṃ tvam anubhāṣase /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.2b: viditaṃ tu mamāpy etad yathā nāryāḥ patir guruḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.3a: yady apy eṣa bhaved bhartā mamārye vṛttavarjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.3b: advaidham upacartavyas tathāpy eṣa mayā bhavet // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.4a: kiṃ punar yo guṇaślāghyaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.5a: yāṃ vṛttiṃ vartate rāmaḥ kausalyāyāṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.5b: tām eva nṛpanārīṇām anyāsām api vartate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.6a: sakṛd dṛṣṭāsv api strīṣu nṛpeṇa nṛpavatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.6b: mātṛvad vartate vīro mānam utsṛjya dharmavit // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.7a: āgacchantyāś ca vijanaṃ vanam evaṃ bhayāvaham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.7b: samāhitaṃ hi me śvaśrvā hṛdaye yat sthitaṃ mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.8a: pāṇipradānakāle ca yat purā tv agnisaṃnidhau /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.8b: anuśiṣṭā jananyāsmi vākyaṃ tad api me dhṛtam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.9a: navīkṛtaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ vākyais te dharmacāriṇi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.10b: tathā vṛttiś ca yātā tvaṃ patiśuśrūṣayā divam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.11a: variṣṭhā sarvanārīṇām eṣā ca divi devatā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.11b: rohiṇī ca vinā candraṃ muhūrtam api dṛśyate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.13b: śirasy āghrāya covāca maithilīṃ harṣayanty uta // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.14a: niyamair vividhair āptaṃ tapo hi mahad asti me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.14b: tat saṃśritya balaṃ sīte chandaye tvāṃ śucivrate // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.14c: upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca vacanaṃ tava maithili /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.15a: prītā cāsmy ucitaṃ kiṃ te karavāṇi bravīhi me /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.16a: sā tv evam uktā dharmajñā tayā prītatarābhavat /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.16b: saphalaṃ ca praharṣaṃ te hanta sīte karomy aham // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.17a: idaṃ divyaṃ varaṃ mālyaṃ vastram ābharaṇāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.18a: mayā dattam idaṃ sīte tava gātrāṇi śobhayet /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.19b: śobhayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ yathā śrīr viṣṇum avyayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.20a: sā vastram aṅgarāgaṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni srajas tathā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.21a: pratigṛhya ca tat sītā prītidānaṃ yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.22b: vacanaṃ praṣṭum ārebhe kathāṃ kāṃcid anupriyām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.23a: svayaṃvare kila prāptā tvam anena yaśasvinā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.23b: rāghaveṇeti me sīte kathā śrutim upāgatā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.24a: tāṃ kathāṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa ca maithili /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.24b: yathānubhūtaṃ kārtsnyena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.25a: evam uktā tu sā sītā tāṃ tato dharmacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.25b: śrūyatām iti coktvā vai kathayāmāsa tāṃ kathām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.27b: ahaṃ kilotthitā bhittvā jagatīṃ nṛpateḥ sutā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.29a: anapatyena ca snehād aṅkam āropya ca svayam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.29b: mameyaṃ tanayety uktvā sneho mayi nipātitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.30b: evam etan narapate dharmeṇa tanayā tava // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.31a: tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā pitā me mithilādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.31b: avāpto vipulām ṛddhiṃ mām avāpya narādhipaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.33a: patisaṃyogasulabhaṃ vayo dṛṣṭvā tu me pitā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.34a: sadṛśāc cāpakṛṣṭāc ca loke kanyāpitā janāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.36a: ayonijāṃ hi māṃ jñātvā nādhyagacchat sa cintayan /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.36b: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca mahīpālaḥ patiṃ mama // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.37a: tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā cintayānasya saṃtatam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.39a: asaṃcālyaṃ manuṣyaiś ca yatnenāpi ca gauravāt /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.39b: tan na śaktā namayituṃ svapneṣv api narādhipāḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.40a: tad dhanuḥ prāpya me pitrā vyāhṛtaṃ satyavādinā /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.41a: idaṃ ca dhanur udyamya sajyaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.41b: tasya me duhitā bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.42a: tac ca dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ gauravād girisaṃnibham /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.42b: abhivādya nṛpā jagmur aśaktās tasya tolane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.44b: viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā mama pitrā supūjitaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.45b: ity uktas tena vipreṇa tad dhanuḥ samupānayat // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.47a: tena pūrayatā vegān madhye bhagnaṃ dvidhā dhanuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.49a: dīyamānāṃ na tu tadā pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.50a: tataḥ śvaśuram āmantrya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.50b: mama pitrā ahaṃ dattā rāmāya viditātmane // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.51b: bhāryārthe lakṣmaṇasyāpi dattā pitrā mama svayam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.52a: evaṃ dattāsmi rāmāya tadā tasmin svayaṃvare /
GE09ram_02su:ram_110.52b: anuraktā ca dharmeṇa patiṃ vīryavatāṃ varam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.1a: anasūyā tu dharmajñā śrutvā tāṃ mahatīṃ kathām /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.2b: yathā svayaṃvaraṃ vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ hi śrutaṃ mayā // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.3a: rame 'haṃ kathayā te tu dṛḍhaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇi /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.3b: ravir astaṃ gataḥ śrīmān upohya rajanīṃ śivām // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.7b: viprakṛṣṭe 'pi ye deśe na prakāśanti vai diśaḥ // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.11a: alaṃkuru ca tāvat tvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mama maithili /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.12b: praṇamya śirasā tasyai rāmaṃ tv abhimukhī yayau // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.13a: tathā tu bhūṣitāṃ sītāṃ dadarśa vadatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.14a: nyavedayat tataḥ sarvaṃ sītā rāmāya maithilī /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.15a: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavad rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.16a: tatas tāṃ śarvarīṃ prītaḥ puṇyāṃ śaśinibhānanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.18a: tāv ūcus te vanacarās tāpasā dharmacāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.19a: eṣa panthā maharṣīṇāṃ phalāny āharatāṃ vane /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.19b: anena tu vanaṃ durgaṃ gantuṃ rāghava te kṣamam // //
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.19c: itīva taiḥ prāñjalibhis tapasvibhir dvijaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:ram_111.19d: vanaṃ sabhāryaḥ praviveśa rāghavaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ sūrya ivābhramaṇḍalam //
